column2: During the First Succession war the Aalzorg system was abandoned after being rendered mostly uninhabitable due to the fighting, and was removed from many maps.
column3: During the First Succession war the Aalzorg system was abandoned after being rendered mostly uninhabitable due to the fighting, and was removed from many maps.

column2: Abadan has been affiliated with the Free Worlds League for much of it's history. Abadan is home to facilities owned by two defense manufacturers, Adam Tech Industries and Austen-Armstrong Industries.
column3: Abadan has been affiliated with the Free Worlds League for much of it's history. Abadan is home to facilities owned by two defense manufacturers, Adam Tech Industries and Austen-Armstrong Industries.

column2: The planet Abagnar is a simple agricultural world of little significance; most of the planetary population lived in or around the capital city, Hancock City, and the only notable establishment is the School of Medicines and Medical Procedures.
column3: The planet Abagnar is a simple agricultural world of little significance; most of the planetary population lived in or around the capital city, Hancock City, and the only notable establishment is the School of Medicines and Medical Procedures.

column2: An unremarkable system that has been Lyran controlled for many centuries, noted only for the mining facilities built to withstand the high gravity and rocky terrain, as well as being located only a week's travel from the jump point.
column3: An unremarkable system that has been Lyran controlled for many centuries, noted only for the mining facilities built to withstand the high gravity and rocky terrain, as well as being located only a week's travel from the jump point.

column2: The capital city of Cottontown on the planet of Abbeville perfectly describes this simple agricultural world, devoted almost entirely to the production of agricultural and trading goods for export.
column3: The capital city of Cottontown on the planet of Abbeville perfectly describes this simple agricultural world, devoted almost entirely to the production of agricultural and trading goods for export.

column2: The low gravity water world of Abejorral is a popular destination for many members of the aristocracy, with it's small population devoted almost entirely to a service based economy.
column3: The low gravity water world of Abejorral is a popular destination for many members of the aristocracy, with it's small population devoted almost entirely to a service based economy.

column2: Formed by the Rims World Republic before the Starleague and later annexed by the Lyran Commonwealth in the ending days of the Star League. Extensive mining operations cover the planet. Outside of mining this system is a quiet backwater.
column3: Formed by the Rims World Republic before the Starleague and later annexed by the Lyran Commonwealth in the ending days of the Star League. Extensive mining operations cover the planet. Outside of mining this system is a quiet backwater.

column2: Abiy Adi III is the third planet in the Abiy Adi system. Abiy Adi is a dry and arid world orbited by a single moon, Amarigna, and the surface of Abiy Adi is home to a factory owned and operated by Luthien Armor Works (LAW).
column3: Abiy Adi III is the third planet in the Abiy Adi system. Abiy Adi is a dry and arid world orbited by a single moon, Amarigna, and the surface of Abiy Adi is home to a factory owned and operated by Luthien Armor Works (LAW).

column2: Large quantities of germanium present prompted Hunter's Paradise and Gillfillan's Gold to collectively form a colony on Able's Glory. Outside of mining the colony is mostly used as a safe jump point for jump ship traffic.
column3: Large quantities of germanium present prompted Hunter's Paradise and Gillfillan's Gold to collectively form a colony on Able's Glory. Outside of mining the colony is mostly used as a safe jump point for jump ship traffic.

column2: During the Third Succession war the Aboukir system was abandoned after being depopulated in the fighting.
column3: During the Third Succession war the Aboukir system was abandoned after being depopulated in the fighting.

column2: Settled at some point during the Star League era, this minor system contains numerous moons rich in minerals.
column3: Settled at some point during the Star League era, this minor system contains numerous moons rich in minerals.

column2: Forming a part of the St. Ives Commonality region of the Capellan Confederation, Abruzzi was conquered or annexed by the Federated Suns during the Second Succession War.
column3: Forming a part of the St. Ives Commonality region of the Capellan Confederation, Abruzzi was conquered or annexed by the Federated Suns during the Second Succession War.

column2: Abushiri was settled by the Rim Worlds Republic during the Star League era, then conquered by the Lyran Commonwealth, before succumbing to the fighting in the Third Succession war and being abandoned.
column3: Abushiri was settled by the Rim Worlds Republic during the Star League era, then conquered by the Lyran Commonwealth, before succumbing to the fighting in the Third Succession war and being abandoned.

column2: The Acala system changed hands between the Federated Suns and the Capellan Confederation at least twice after the system was settled and was on the border between the two nations for most of the history of the two states.
column3: The Acala system changed hands between the Federated Suns and the Capellan Confederation at least twice after the system was settled and was on the border between the two nations for most of the history of the two states.

column2: The Acamar system has ten planets and a substantial asteroid belt named Illeudian, which is the site of a number of mining operations due to the massive mineral deposits located in the system. Acamar VIII is more commonly referred to as Acamar.
column3: The Acamar system has ten planets and a substantial asteroid belt named Illeudian, which is the site of a number of mining operations due to the massive mineral deposits located in the system. Acamar VIII is more commonly referred to as Acamar.

column2: Accrington was settled prior to the beginning of the Age of War, with the system forming a part of the interstellar proto-nation known as the Federation of Skye and subsequently the Lyran Commonwealth.
column3: Accrington was settled prior to the beginning of the Age of War, with the system forming a part of the interstellar proto-nation known as the Federation of Skye and subsequently the Lyran Commonwealth.

column2: The Achilles system was settled during the Star League era but vanished from most maps by the time of the Third Succession War.
column3: The Achilles system was settled during the Star League era but vanished from most maps by the time of the Third Succession War.

column2: Achnoly vanished from maps during the Second Succession War, indicating that the system had been abandoned, depopulated, or rendered too insignificant to merit further recording on maps.
column3: Achnoly vanished from maps during the Second Succession War, indicating that the system had been abandoned, depopulated, or rendered too insignificant to merit further recording on maps.

column2: Achton vanished from maps during the Third Succession War, indicating that the system had been abandoned, depopulated, or rendered too insignificant to merit further recording on maps.
column3: Achton vanished from maps during the Third Succession War, indicating that the system had been abandoned, depopulated, or rendered too insignificant to merit further recording on maps.

column2: Acoma vanished from maps during the First Succession War, depopulated due to the viscous and unrelenting fighting at the time.
column3: Acoma vanished from maps during the First Succession War, depopulated due to the viscous and unrelenting fighting at the time.

column2: The Aconcagua system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra, and subsequently became part of the Free Worlds League. Boreholes on the fifth planet allow access to rich deposits within the mantle, though high gravity makes mining dangerous.
column3: The Aconcagua system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra, and subsequently became part of the Free Worlds League. Boreholes on the fifth planet allow access to rich deposits within the mantle, though high gravity makes mining dangerous.

column2: The Acrux (Alpha Crucis) system is a multiple star system that is a part of the region of the Free Worlds League which was commonly referred to as the Bolan Thumb.
column3: The Acrux (Alpha Crucis) system is a multiple star system that is a part of the region of the Free Worlds League which was commonly referred to as the Bolan Thumb.

column2: The Acubens system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra, when habitable bands suitable for agriculture were discovered on the icy second planet orbiting a large gas giant.
column3: The Acubens system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra, when habitable bands suitable for agriculture were discovered on the icy second planet orbiting a large gas giant.

column2: On Addasar, glaciers have carved out beautiful fjords in the tropics and a Magistracy settlement perches in the peaks, where they mine some of the rarest gemstones in the Periphery.
column3: On Addasar, glaciers have carved out beautiful fjords in the tropics and a Magistracy settlement perches in the peaks, where they mine some of the rarest gemstones in the Periphery.

column2: Addhara is a recently formed colony, a large population of sheep like animals were discovered here and soon their meat became a regional delicacy. Also their wool makes nice hats. Agromech's are needed to herd them as they grow to 3 meters.
column3: Addhara is a recently formed colony, a large population of sheep like animals were discovered here and soon their meat became a regional delicacy. Also their wool makes nice hats. Agromech's are needed to herd them as they grow to 3 meters.

column2: The Addicks system has changed hands repeatedly since it was colonized at some point prior to the Age of War. Addicks IV is the main planet in the system, known for it's major manufacturing capabilities.
column3: The Addicks system has changed hands repeatedly since it was colonized at some point prior to the Age of War. Addicks IV is the main planet in the system, known for it's major manufacturing capabilities.

column2: Ad Duwayd is not a very hospitable planet. Geothermal vents allow for extensive under ice fisheries. Large silo like structures are built through the ice. Most of the population live in these large under ice facilities.
column3: Ad Duwayd is not a very hospitable planet. Geothermal vents allow for extensive under ice fisheries. Large silo like structures are built through the ice. Most of the population live in these large under ice facilities.

column2: Before the Star League, Adelaide's claim to fame was the longest individual hour of any Lyran system at 89 min an hour. Not much has changed.
column3: Before the Star League, Adelaide's claim to fame was the longest individual hour of any Lyran system at 89 min an hour. Not much has changed.

column2: Adelson is a world basking in the blue glow of its B class star. This causes the plants to grow orange, yellow and red. Being an agricultural center, many call it the Red Basket.
column3: Adelson is a world basking in the blue glow of its B class star. This causes the plants to grow orange, yellow and red. Being an agricultural center, many call it the Red Basket.

column2: Adhafera is filled with sweatshops and other textile manufacturing. The rivers are dyed different colors by the factories. Every year the citizens celebrate with a rainbow festival and the rivers are dyed rainbow. Don't eat the fish.
column3: Adhafera is filled with sweatshops and other textile manufacturing. The rivers are dyed different colors by the factories. Every year the citizens celebrate with a rainbow festival and the rivers are dyed rainbow. Don't eat the fish.

column2: Originally named Adhara the planetary government had to change the name to Trip after too many misshipping accidents. Negotiations for the 1000 tons of Agromech shears misdelivered is still a hot topic of debate amongst locals.
column3: Originally named Adhara the planetary government had to change the name to Trip after too many misshipping accidents. Negotiations for the 1000 tons of Agromech shears misdelivered is still a hot topic of debate amongst locals.

column2: Adherlwin's manufacturing and mining operations made it a target of SLDF in the Star League days. Not important enough for a garrison the world was conquered and the SLDF moved on. Eventually it was reincorporated into the Magistracy of Canopus.
column3: Adherlwin's manufacturing and mining operations made it a target of SLDF in the Star League days. Not important enough for a garrison the world was conquered and the SLDF moved on. Eventually it was reincorporated into the Magistracy of Canopus.

column2: Abandoned due to a nuclear winter caused by strikes during the Second Succession war.
column3: Abandoned due to a nuclear winter caused by strikes during the Second Succession war.

column2: The surface of Adrar is ruined and polluted after an early attempt at independence was quelled, harshly, by Capellan forces. The remaining population struggles to sustain an agricultural industry in the wreckage.
column3: The surface of Adrar is ruined and polluted after an early attempt at independence was quelled, harshly, by Capellan forces. The remaining population struggles to sustain an agricultural industry in the wreckage.

column2: Adrian was initially founded as a Buddhist temple. Now it is a tourism location since most of the world has been turned into buddhist temples and gardens. Pilgrims make journeys here from across the Inner Sphere.
column3: Adrian was initially founded as a Buddhist temple. Now it is a tourism location since most of the world has been turned into buddhist temples and gardens. Pilgrims make journeys here from across the Inner Sphere.

column2: Aea is a wet, lush, tropical world with an atmosphere dense with foul-smelling sulfurous volcanic outgassing. ComStar maintains an HPG facility on the planet; support of that facility is the only reason the system still boasts colonists.
column3: Aea is a wet, lush, tropical world with an atmosphere dense with foul-smelling sulfurous volcanic outgassing. ComStar maintains an HPG facility on the planet; support of that facility is the only reason the system still boasts colonists.

column2: Aea is a wet, lush, tropical world with an atmosphere dense with foul-smelling sulfurous volcanic outgassing. ComStar maintains an HPG facility on the planet; support of that facility is the only reason the system still boasts colonists.
column3: Aea is a wet, lush, tropical world with an atmosphere dense with foul-smelling sulfurous volcanic outgassing. ComStar maintains an HPG facility on the planet; support of that facility is the only reason the system still boasts colonists.

column2: A very recent colony of Polygamists was formed here. While mainly a farming world, many pirate hideouts are present on the two habitable moons, leading to a nice blackmarket on planet, where it's said even people are bought and sold.
column3: A very recent colony of Polygamists was formed here. While mainly a farming world, many pirate hideouts are present on the two habitable moons, leading to a nice blackmarket on planet, where it's said even people are bought and sold.

column2: “Yes that Afarsin! You may recognize our planet from the SLDF videos of Battlemechs playing volleyball! Come enjoy our beaches and you too could have fun in the sun!” -Excerpt from Afarsin’s tourism board. When not playing volleyball the locals farm
column3: “Yes that Afarsin! You may recognize our planet from the SLDF videos of Battlemechs playing volleyball! Come enjoy our beaches and you too could have fun in the sun!” -Excerpt from Afarsin’s tourism board. When not playing volleyball the locals farm

column2: Recently rediscovered, Afleir went uncharted on maps for over 200 years. The locals just thought their habit of eating people scared non pirates off. The pirates have made a good living smuggling in “food” for the local populace.
column3: Recently rediscovered, Afleir went uncharted on maps for over 200 years. The locals just thought their habit of eating people scared non pirates off. The pirates have made a good living smuggling in “food” for the local populace.

column2: Amish and Mennonites colonized the planet, unfortunately a local apex predator hunted them until they were forced to use modern technology. Now the planet exists with enclaves of Amish and Mennonites, but is heavily modernized.
column3: Amish and Mennonites colonized the planet, unfortunately a local apex predator hunted them until they were forced to use modern technology. Now the planet exists with enclaves of Amish and Mennonites, but is heavily modernized.

column2: Initially colonized for religious freedom, after a few hundred years the Draconis Combine annexed the system. Later it became the seat of Ishikawajima-Harima Battle Armor Industries, who owned 2 factories producing arms and armor for the DC.
column3: Initially colonized for religious freedom, after a few hundred years the Draconis Combine annexed the system. Later it became the seat of Ishikawajima-Harima Battle Armor Industries, who owned 2 factories producing arms and armor for the DC.

column2: Destroyed during the Second Succession War, Aggstein was abandoned. Recently pirate activity has prompted the Federated Suns to re-explore the system to verify the House Liao is not preparing a surprise attack on other systems in the area.
column3: Destroyed during the Second Succession War, Aggstein was abandoned. Recently pirate activity has prompted the Federated Suns to re-explore the system to verify the House Liao is not preparing a surprise attack on other systems in the area.

column2: Known for its production of alcohol, Agliana has many aquatic resources it exports. Not the least of which is ice. Alcoholic ice is a favorite of worlds around the Inner Sphere, with Solaris being a major importer.
column3: Known for its production of alcohol, Agliana has many aquatic resources it exports. Not the least of which is ice. Alcoholic ice is a favorite of worlds around the Inner Sphere, with Solaris being a major importer.

column2: Abandoned during the Third Succession War, rumours abound of some colonists attempting to restart a colony here.
column3: Abandoned during the Third Succession War, rumours abound of some colonists attempting to restart a colony here.

column2: On Ahlat, a tiny Taurian installation mines rare isotopes at one pole, while at the other, a rickety collection of scuttled ships are chained together into a pirate stronghold. Sometimes, in sealed caves in the tropics, there's a not-so-secret market.
column3: On Ahlat, a tiny Taurian installation mines rare isotopes at one pole, while at the other, a rickety collection of scuttled ships are chained together into a pirate stronghold. Sometimes, in sealed caves in the tropics, there's a not-so-secret market.

column2: Abandoned after the 3rd Succession War, Aigle was removed from most maps of the known Inner Sphere.
column3: Abandoned after the 3rd Succession War, Aigle was removed from most maps of the known Inner Sphere.

column2: Natives from the agricultural world of Aiguebelle follow a complex code of law that takes years to learn thoroughly. Unsurprisingly many leave when given the chance, breaking 1-hx75b, the law against leaving.
column3: Natives from the agricultural world of Aiguebelle follow a complex code of law that takes years to learn thoroughly. Unsurprisingly many leave when given the chance, breaking 1-hx75b, the law against leaving.

column2: Home of the Aitutaki Academy, this economic and agricultural powerhouse was one of the main worlds of the Principality of Regulus. After the Free Worlds League took over, the planet was still a hotbed of dissent, many SAFE agents were assigned here.
column3: Home of the Aitutaki Academy, this economic and agricultural powerhouse was one of the main worlds of the Principality of Regulus. After the Free Worlds League took over, the planet was still a hotbed of dissent, many SAFE agents were assigned here.

column2: Home to the Diplan Mechyards, the whole population lives in the Diplan Mechworks Fortress, or is involved in mining. Criminals are sent outside for a breath of fresh air, as the atmosphere is poisonous and uninhabitable.
column3: Home to the Diplan Mechyards, the whole population lives in the Diplan Mechworks Fortress, or is involved in mining. Criminals are sent outside for a breath of fresh air, as the atmosphere is poisonous and uninhabitable.

column2: Akfata is a remarkably boring system. It's main product is agriculture and some mining. Some people enjoy a slower, quieter pace of life and so it has a large population and tech level. It isn't quite backwater but close.
column3: Akfata is a remarkably boring system. It's main product is agriculture and some mining. Some people enjoy a slower, quieter pace of life and so it has a large population and tech level. It isn't quite backwater but close.

column2: Alamagordo was once a bustling, growing colony. Unfortunately, the world is a flash-point for conflicts between Liao and Marik, and repeated conquests reduced the infrastructure to rubble. The remaining residents eke out a living by farming.
column3: Alamagordo was once a bustling, growing colony. Unfortunately, the world is a flash-point for conflicts between Liao and Marik, and repeated conquests reduced the infrastructure to rubble. The remaining residents eke out a living by farming.

column2: Alarion is the administrative capital of the Alarion Province and is home to a number of industries including JumpShip and WarShip manufacturers, such as Bowie Industries and the Alarion Naval Academy.
column3: Alarion is the administrative capital of the Alarion Province and is home to a number of industries including JumpShip and WarShip manufacturers, such as Bowie Industries and the Alarion Naval Academy.

column2: Albalii is an excellent example of arid terraforming. When first colonized, the interiors of the planet were deserts, using dropships and vast amounts of purified seawater, the interiors of the continents were turned into lush crop producing havens.
column3: Albalii is an excellent example of arid terraforming. When first colonized, the interiors of the planet were deserts, using dropships and vast amounts of purified seawater, the interiors of the continents were turned into lush crop producing havens.

column2: There are reports of a habitable planet in this system, and also pirate ghost stories! As of yet no effort has been made to find Morituri's Ghost Awesome. Although some say if you listen to the wind at night, you can hear him howling...
column3: There are reports of a habitable planet in this system, and also pirate ghost stories! As of yet no effort has been made to find Morituri's Ghost Awesome. Although some say if you listen to the wind at night, you can hear him howling...

column2: A quiet agricultural system, it's sole claim to fame is a ancient monument to the SLDF troopers who conducted a HALO insertion to eliminate a pirate band who took a whole city hostage hundreds of years ago.
column3: A quiet agricultural system, it's sole claim to fame is a ancient monument to the SLDF troopers who conducted a HALO insertion to eliminate a pirate band who took a whole city hostage hundreds of years ago.

column2: Home to the Holden Mining Corporation, and Prefecture capital of the Albiero Prefecture, this world contains vast iron and copper deposits. Recent wars and tech loss have caused many mines to close, and the population is slowly diminishing.
column3: Home to the Holden Mining Corporation, and Prefecture capital of the Albiero Prefecture, this world contains vast iron and copper deposits. Recent wars and tech loss have caused many mines to close, and the population is slowly diminishing.

column2: There is not a world here, keep looking. Definitely not a “Pentagon World” whatever that means. Also what is a Burrock? I haven’t ever seen one have you!? Leave freebirth, or so help me I’ll send the ghost of Kerensky after you!
column3: There is not a world here, keep looking. Definitely not a “Pentagon World” whatever that means. Also what is a Burrock? I haven’t ever seen one have you!? Leave freebirth, or so help me I’ll send the ghost of Kerensky after you!

column2: The Albion system was settled during the Star League era and vanished from maps during the Third Succession War indicating that the system had been abandoned or depopulated.
column3: The Albion system was settled during the Star League era and vanished from maps during the Third Succession War indicating that the system had been abandoned or depopulated.

column2: Here there be Vikings! But don't worry they left the Inner Sphere to get away from war. Still.... Vikings.
column3: Here there be Vikings! But don't worry they left the Inner Sphere to get away from war. Still.... Vikings.

column2: Due to an extreme axial tilt, Alchiba is split into two very different biomes. The northern half is temperate and has the entire world's agriculture sector, while the southern half is exclusively for mining. No industry outside these exist on Alchiba
column3: Due to an extreme axial tilt, Alchiba is split into two very different biomes. The northern half is temperate and has the entire world's agriculture sector, while the southern half is exclusively for mining. No industry outside these exist on Alchiba

column2: Minerals attracted the first colonizers to Alcor. Unfortunately Alcor doesn't have a diverse enough biome to support extended farming. So Alcor out of necessity became a trading hub. This arrangement has worked well over the last 800 years.
column3: Minerals attracted the first colonizers to Alcor. Unfortunately Alcor doesn't have a diverse enough biome to support extended farming. So Alcor out of necessity became a trading hub. This arrangement has worked well over the last 800 years.

column2: Alcyone has been traded between the different factions since its inception in 2036. Farmers have learned to stay away from the cities as they become host to invading armies every few decades.
column3: Alcyone has been traded between the different factions since its inception in 2036. Farmers have learned to stay away from the cities as they become host to invading armies every few decades.

column2: Throughout its history, Aldebaran has been a contested world. Until recently, House Liao was able to maintain control through all the invasions. However in 3028 House Davion finally succeeded in wresting control and have held firm to counter attacks.
column3: Throughout its history, Aldebaran has been a contested world. Until recently, House Liao was able to maintain control through all the invasions. However in 3028 House Davion finally succeeded in wresting control and have held firm to counter attacks.

column2: Aldertaine is known for their popular children's drink, Aldertiane Blue. Aldertaine corporations pay lots of money to Comstar to have their commercials played beside cartoons across the Innersphere. Rumors of permanent blue teeth are unfounded.
column3: Aldertaine is known for their popular children's drink, Aldertiane Blue. Aldertaine corporations pay lots of money to Comstar to have their commercials played beside cartoons across the Innersphere. Rumors of permanent blue teeth are unfounded.

column2: Formerly a Terran world, Alrecht was abandoned during the First Succession War due to most of the population being wiped out.
column3: Formerly a Terran world, Alrecht was abandoned during the First Succession War due to most of the population being wiped out.

column2: Alegro was named for the 21st century drug Allegra. The local dialect changed it eventually to Alegro. It was named this because it was the only drug found to stop the psychosis caused by the local mushroom spores.
column3: Alegro was named for the 21st century drug Allegra. The local dialect changed it eventually to Alegro. It was named this because it was the only drug found to stop the psychosis caused by the local mushroom spores.

column2: Formed during a mass exodus from what used to be Russia, this colony is known for its potato based economy. It's also has the best damn vodka in Lyran space and Katrina Steiner is known to keep a bottle in her bar at all times.
column3: Formed during a mass exodus from what used to be Russia, this colony is known for its potato based economy. It's also has the best damn vodka in Lyran space and Katrina Steiner is known to keep a bottle in her bar at all times.

column2: Known for its pastoral beauty and high culture, Alexandria has been a hub of the arts since the Star league. Unfortunately this also made it a target during the Succession wars, and is now constantly under siege from one aggressor or another.
column3: Once a populous and profitable mining colony, local strife abruptly depopulated Alexandria, as well as poisoning most of the native life.

column2: Once a populous and profitable mining colony, local strife abruptly depopulated Alexandria, as well as poisoning most of the native life.
column3: Known for its pastoral beauty and high culture, Alexandria has been a hub of the arts since the Star league. Unfortunately this also made it a target during the Succession wars, and is now constantly under siege from one aggressor or another.

column2: The Alexandrian Covenant is a group of systems that moved away from the Magistracy of Canopus and settled 3 different systems. Not much is known about these systems and only recent exploration expeditions have confirmed their existence.
column3: The Alexandrian Covenant is a group of systems that moved away from the Magistracy of Canopus and settled 3 different systems. Not much is known about these systems and only recent exploration expeditions have confirmed their existence.

column2: Discovered by a misjump that damaged their jumpship's K-F drive. Alfirk has remained isolated for hundreds of years. Only Comstar has had any contact with Alfirk. Comstar helped cure a plague and promoted isolationism based on their view of the IS.
column3: Discovered by a misjump that damaged their jumpship's K-F drive. Alfirk has remained isolated for hundreds of years. Only Comstar has had any contact with Alfirk. Comstar helped cure a plague and promoted isolationism based on their view of the IS.

column2: A strategic world for both the Star League and the DC. Algate has housed a military company almost since its founding. The world itself is mainly an agricultural center, with many comparing it to Kansas on Earth.
column3: A strategic world for both the Star League and the DC. Algate has housed a military company almost since its founding. The world itself is mainly an agricultural center, with many comparing it to Kansas on Earth.

column2: As the capital system of the Algedi Prefecture, Algedi is a major trade and manufacturing system. As such it is heavily defended and boast a large Bazaar in the capital city Algiers, where it is said you can find anything your heart desires.
column3: As the capital system of the Algedi Prefecture, Algedi is a major trade and manufacturing system. As such it is heavily defended and boast a large Bazaar in the capital city Algiers, where it is said you can find anything your heart desires.

column2: A recent addition to the Hegemony, Algenib was colonized for the vast mineral wealth found under it's ice sheets. After colonization it was found that the ice was actually Earth standard fresh water and ice shipping operation soon commenced.
column3: A recent addition to the Hegemony, Algenib was colonized for the vast mineral wealth found under it's ice sheets. After colonization it was found that the ice was actually Earth standard fresh water and ice shipping operation soon commenced.

column2: Settled to take advantage of the rich supply of fish, the discovery of rich fertile soil led to it being developed for agricultural concerns, and Algol would go on to be an major exporter to every planet within a jump of itself.
column3: Settled to take advantage of the rich supply of fish, the discovery of rich fertile soil led to it being developed for agricultural concerns, and Algol would go on to be an major exporter to every planet within a jump of itself.

column2: A binary star system with a K class star orbiting an A class supergiant. The planet's economy is based on mining and ore extraction. To protect themselves from the intense solar radiation, most of the Alborabians live in underground cities.
column3: A binary star system with a K class star orbiting an A class supergiant. The planet's economy is based on mining and ore extraction. To protect themselves from the intense solar radiation, most of the Alborabians live in underground cities.

column2: Algot is a beautiful Terran world with a reputation for being bad for ones health - due to a plague centuries ago. Ironically it has one of the highest life expectancies in the Federated Suns.
column3: Algot is a beautiful Terran world with a reputation for being bad for ones health - due to a plague centuries ago. Ironically it has one of the highest life expectancies in the Federated Suns.

column2: Alhena is a world that travels between two suns via an eccentric orbit, leading to long winters and short summers. The lack of arable land on the surface and a lack of free water on the surface meant that Alhena needs to import most of their food.
column3: Alhena is a world that travels between two suns via an eccentric orbit, leading to long winters and short summers. The lack of arable land on the surface and a lack of free water on the surface meant that Alhena needs to import most of their food.

column2: The Al Hillah system was settled during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and before the Age of War.
column3: The Al Hillah system was settled during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and before the Age of War.

column2: Alioth's most distinctive feature is its atmosphere, which can best be described as hyper-oxygenated. The high oxygen content allows plant life to flourish on the world, making it a true breadbasket.
column3: Alioth's most distinctive feature is its atmosphere, which can best be described as hyper-oxygenated. The high oxygen content allows plant life to flourish on the world, making it a true breadbasket.

column2: The Al Jafr system was home to at least one habitable world, and was located in the Timbuktu Theater of the Lyran Commonwealth.
column3: The Al Jafr system was home to at least one habitable world, and was located in the Timbuktu Theater of the Lyran Commonwealth.

column2: Al Jubaylah is a farming world. Most the world is plains and to maximize farmable land the cities and rich live in the few mountainous areas. The ruling Mullahs are even handed and it is a prosperous world whose citizens enjoy freedoms most do not.
column3: Al Jubaylah is a farming world. Most the world is plains and to maximize farmable land the cities and rich live in the few mountainous areas. The ruling Mullahs are even handed and it is a prosperous world whose citizens enjoy freedoms most do not.

column2: Alkaid is situated four months away from the nearest jump point and has a single moon named Vishnu. Alkaid has been home to a substantial chemical industry for centuries, hosting such companies as Toloy Chemicals.
column3: Alkaid is situated four months away from the nearest jump point and has a single moon named Vishnu. Alkaid has been home to a substantial chemical industry for centuries, hosting such companies as Toloy Chemicals.

column2: Alkalurops is a world laden with a dense atmosphere that frequently spawns hurricanes and tornadoes. The colonists (mostly miners and natural gas exporters) constructed most of their homes in the caves and cliffs of the planet's mountain ranges.
column3: Alkalurops is a world laden with a dense atmosphere that frequently spawns hurricanes and tornadoes. The colonists (mostly miners and natural gas exporters) constructed most of their homes in the caves and cliffs of the planet's mountain ranges.

column2: Alkes is covered with vast, deep oceans. A large axial tilt and a highly elliptical orbit make for extremes of temperature, driving a highly unpredictable and notoriously unpleasant weather system.
column3: Alkes is covered with vast, deep oceans. A large axial tilt and a highly elliptical orbit make for extremes of temperature, driving a highly unpredictable and notoriously unpleasant weather system.

column2: Alktral's only major landmass features rocky terrain and several active volcanoes. No indigenous lifeforms exist here, and the only human habitation was centered around small-scale mining operations which is now abandoned.
column3: Alktral's only major landmass features rocky terrain and several active volcanoes. No indigenous lifeforms exist here, and the only human habitation was centered around small-scale mining operations which is now abandoned.

column2: An agricultural world which grows the native plumberry - a thumb-sized purple fruit which tasted like a cross between a blueberry and a lemon. The plumberry wine industry employs millions of seasonal workers.
column3: An agricultural world which grows the native plumberry - a thumb-sized purple fruit which tasted like a cross between a blueberry and a lemon. The plumberry wine industry employs millions of seasonal workers.

column2: A desert world with a nitrogen/oxygen atmosphere. The planet's only ocean surrounds its northern ice-cap.
column3: A desert world with a nitrogen/oxygen atmosphere. The planet's only ocean surrounds its northern ice-cap.

column2: Allerton is a large world with a hefty manufacturing base dedicated to light vehicles and scout Mechs. Once devastated during the First Succession War, it's economic output is only just now returning to historic levels.
column3: Allerton is a large world with a hefty manufacturing base dedicated to light vehicles and scout Mechs. Once devastated during the First Succession War, it's economic output is only just now returning to historic levels.

column2: Alloway is rocky and barren, except for a 200km-wide equatorial band of lush jungle that teems with native life. Human settlements are mostly concentrated on the edges of this band.
column3: Alloway is rocky and barren, except for a 200km-wide equatorial band of lush jungle that teems with native life. Human settlements are mostly concentrated on the edges of this band.

column2: Alloway is rocky and barren, except for a 200km-wide equatorial band of lush jungle that teems with native life. Human settlements are mostly concentrated on the edges of this band.
column3: Alloway is rocky and barren, except for a 200km-wide equatorial band of lush jungle that teems with native life. Human settlements are mostly concentrated on the edges of this band.

column2: Alma Alta system was settled during or just after the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the Protectorate of Donegal when the Protectorate joined with the Tamar Pact and Federation of Skye to form the Lyran Commonwealth in 2341.
column3: Alma Alta system was settled during or just after the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the Protectorate of Donegal when the Protectorate joined with the Tamar Pact and Federation of Skye to form the Lyran Commonwealth in 2341.

column2: Almach is an oft contested world. The real item of interest is Almach's extensive ocean-farming installations. Prior to the Succession Wars the products of Almach's seas fed every world in the Chesterton Commonality
column3: Almach is an oft contested world. The real item of interest is Almach's extensive ocean-farming installations. Prior to the Succession Wars the products of Almach's seas fed every world in the Chesterton Commonality

column2: A small planetoid orbit a gas giant, Almunge is nevertheless a majestically habitable world with lush grass and rolling green hills.
column3: A small planetoid orbit a gas giant, Almunge is nevertheless a majestically habitable world with lush grass and rolling green hills.

column2: Alnadal was settled during the Star League era and was an oft traded border world between the Federated Suns and Draconis Combine, until the Third Succession War when it was finally abandoned. Little remains of the mining facilities.
column3: Alnadal was settled during the Star League era and was an oft traded border world between the Federated Suns and Draconis Combine, until the Third Succession War when it was finally abandoned. Little remains of the mining facilities.

column2: Capital of the Al Na'ir Prefecture in the DC, The system has 2 major population centers, Al Na'ir itself and the Yuri Mech Works, located in domed cities in the asteroid belt around the planets. It is one of the most valuable systems the DC owns.
column3: Capital of the Al Na'ir Prefecture in the DC, The system has 2 major population centers, Al Na'ir itself and the Yuri Mech Works, located in domed cities in the asteroid belt around the planets. It is one of the most valuable systems the DC owns.

column2: Alnasi is known for it's vast ore mining and mineral facilities dotted around the capital city of Gantarius. The low gravity makes sending large amounts of material to orbit extremely cost effective.
column3: Alnasi is known for it's vast ore mining and mineral facilities dotted around the capital city of Gantarius. The low gravity makes sending large amounts of material to orbit extremely cost effective.

column2: Alorton was one of fifty-one contested worlds to be placed under Terran Hegemony authority during the Star League era. During the First Succession War Alorton once more became a flashpoint between the Free Worlds League and Lyran Commonwealth.
column3: Alorton was one of fifty-one contested worlds to be placed under Terran Hegemony authority during the Star League era. During the First Succession War Alorton once more became a flashpoint between the Free Worlds League and Lyran Commonwealth.

column2: Alpha Eridani II - named Achernar by the population - has been inhabited for centuries and is host to a number of industrial facilities belonging to companies such as Achernar IndustrialMechs, Achernar BattleMechs and Valiant Systems.
column3: Alpha Eridani II - named Achernar by the population - has been inhabited for centuries and is host to a number of industrial facilities belonging to companies such as Achernar IndustrialMechs, Achernar BattleMechs and Valiant Systems.

column2: Alphard is is known for it's precious ore mining and gem refining facilities dotted around the capital city of Haquinus.
column3: Alphard is is known for it's precious ore mining and gem refining facilities dotted around the capital city of Haquinus.

column2: The capital of the Marian Hegemony since that nation was founded, Alphard was host to at least two major manufacturers - Alphard Trading Corporation and Marian Arms Incorporated - as well as an aerospace training academy and the Senate House.
column3: Столица Марийской Гегемонии с момента основания государства, планета Альфард была домом как минимум для двух крупных производителей - Alphard Trading Corporation и Marian Arms Incorporated, а также академию аэрокосмической подготовки и Дом Сената.

column2: The Alphecca system was settled prior to the mid-twenty-fourth century and was a member of the Federation of Skye prior to the formation of the Lyran Commonwealth. Alphecca II is the second planet in the Alphecca system.
column3: The Alphecca system was settled prior to the mid-twenty-fourth century and was a member of the Federation of Skye prior to the formation of the Lyran Commonwealth. Alphecca II is the second planet in the Alphecca system.

column2: Alpheratz is the fourth planet in the and the Capital of the Outworlds Alliance. Alpheratz is home to the Alliance Executive Parliament and the largest weapons industry in the Alliance. Alpheratz has a single moon named Aisha.
column3: Альферац - четвертая планета и столица Альянса Внешних Миров. Альферац является домом для Исполнительного парламента Альянса и крупнейшей оружейной промышленности в Альянсе. У Альфераца есть единственная луна по имени Аиша.

column2: Alrakis II is the second planet of three in the Alrakis system and has five moons named Cassius, Delvia, Fermosa, Weir, and Zalazar, many of which are rich in minerals making this system hotly contested during the succession wars.
column3: Alrakis II is the second planet of three in the Alrakis system and has five moons named Cassius, Delvia, Fermosa, Weir, and Zalazar, many of which are rich in minerals making this system hotly contested during the succession wars.

column2: Alrescha was colonized to feed the peoples of Tikonov in the 2300s. It was not the most ideal candidate for a farm world because of its unbreathable atmosphere. However it was close, warm and wet, just the way Tikonovians liked.
column3: Alrescha was colonized to feed the peoples of Tikonov in the 2300s. It was not the most ideal candidate for a farm world because of its unbreathable atmosphere. However it was close, warm and wet, just the way Tikonovians liked.

column2: Alsek's claim to fame is that a ruling Davion died here! In 2445 Major Arthur Davion died while fighting against rebels on the planet. Since they are apart of the Federated Suns, they don't talk about it much.
column3: Alsek's claim to fame is that a ruling Davion died here! In 2445 Major Arthur Davion died while fighting against rebels on the planet. Since they are apart of the Federated Suns, they don't talk about it much.

column2: A heavily forested world with abundant mineral reserves, which has extensive Mechfactories creating Dragon and Panther 'Mechs for the Combine.
column3: A heavily forested world with abundant mineral reserves, which has extensive Mechfactories creating Dragon and Panther 'Mechs for the Combine.

column2: Alta vanished from maps during the Third Succession War, abandoned due to the fighting.
column3: Alta vanished from maps during the Third Succession War, abandoned due to the fighting.

column2: The system has a class F7III star that produces an unusual amount of surface activity. Solar storms leave Altair without comms for long periods, and so it is unsurprising that the system has been subjected to numerous raids throughout its history.
column3: Звезда класса F7III в системе Альтаир имеет необычно высокую поверхностную активность. Солнечные бури оставляют систему без связи на длительное время, поэтому неудивительно, что Альтаир подвергался многочисленным набегам на протяжении своей истории.

column2: The jungles and prairies that originally lured settlers to this world were gone when a comet hit the equator soon after colonization, causing mass extinctions. It also caused active volcanism and rare earth metals to become readily available.
column3: The jungles and prairies that originally lured settlers to this world were gone when a comet hit the equator soon after colonization, causing mass extinctions. It also caused active volcanism and rare earth metals to become readily available.

column2: Alta Vista was the site of a prominent engine trader in the Star League era but during the Second Succession war they became irrelevant, leaving a minor industrial and agricultural base behind.
column3: Alta Vista was the site of a prominent engine trader in the Star League era but during the Second Succession war they became irrelevant, leaving a minor industrial and agricultural base behind.

column2: Settled as a farming community, Altdorf no longer is suitable for this. Gamma rays destroyed the atmosphere a few hundred years after colonization. Instead the DC now uses this planet as a prison and work camp.
column3: Settled as a farming community, Altdorf no longer is suitable for this. Gamma rays destroyed the atmosphere a few hundred years after colonization. Instead the DC now uses this planet as a prison and work camp.

column2: Currently locked in an extended ice age. Years of fighting has led the planetary government to join the Free Rasalhague Republic. It is now a buffer between the LC and DC and the citizens hope their backyard will no longer be a battlefield.
column3: Currently locked in an extended ice age. Years of fighting has led the planetary government to join the Free Rasalhague Republic. It is now a buffer between the LC and DC and the citizens hope their backyard will no longer be a battlefield.

column2: Located close to the capital system of Atreus, Alterf has traditionally been used as a bread basket world. However its southern continent is reserved for military exercises by the Free Worlds League.
column3: Located close to the capital system of Atreus, Alterf has traditionally been used as a bread basket world. However its southern continent is reserved for military exercises by the Free Worlds League.

column2: Located on the scenic edge of the inner sphere, Althastan is a thriving nudist colony. Settled after the star league era, colonists were quickly conquered by the Lyran Commonwealth and a no clothes law was established. A fun family vacation spot!
column3: Located on the scenic edge of the inner sphere, Althastan is a thriving nudist colony. Settled after the star league era, colonists were quickly conquered by the Lyran Commonwealth and a no clothes law was established. A fun family vacation spot!

column2: Althea's Choice was named after the leader of the colonists had to make a choice between systems to settle. Some say she got it wrong.
column3: Althea's Choice was named after the leader of the colonists had to make a choice between systems to settle. Some say she got it wrong.

column2: Alto was settled during the Star League era, until the Third Succession War when it was finally abandoned. Little remains of the mining facilities.
column3: Alto was settled during the Star League era, until the Third Succession War when it was finally abandoned. Little remains of the mining facilities.

column2: The DC uses Altona as a low G training world for its troops. Other then the industrial military complex present on Altona, not much else exists. Mechwarriors-in-training are taught how to survive on low G worlds and fight aerospace assets here.
column3: The DC uses Altona as a low G training world for its troops. Other then the industrial military complex present on Altona, not much else exists. Mechwarriors-in-training are taught how to survive on low G worlds and fight aerospace assets here.

column2: Altoona is a rare example of a system orbiting a red dwarf star. Even rarer that the planet itself is a moon of a gas giant. But what makes it exceptional is that there are 3 habitable moons orbiting the same gas giant although only one is inhabited.
column3: Altoona is a rare example of a system orbiting a red dwarf star. Even rarer that the planet itself is a moon of a gas giant. But what makes it exceptional is that there are 3 habitable moons orbiting the same gas giant although only one is inhabited.

column2: Altoona was destroyed during the second succession war. A small mining colony, no one bothered to recolonize it because it was barely habitable to begin with. Most survivors were glad to be rid of the horrible place.
column3: Altoona was destroyed during the second succession war. A small mining colony, no one bothered to recolonize it because it was barely habitable to begin with. Most survivors were glad to be rid of the horrible place.

column2: Altorra IV - more commonly known simply as Altorra - is a world with relatively low gravity and a single moon named Delilah.
column3: Altorra IV - more commonly known simply as Altorra - is a world with relatively low gravity and a single moon named Delilah.

column2: Traditionally a BattleMech producing center, Alula Australis no longer has the means to produce Mechs, they were all destroyed for a 4th and final time during the 3rd succession war and were moved off world. Now it is mined for its rare metals.
column3: Изначально центр по производству боевых мехов. Алула Аустралис теперь не имеет средств для производства мехов, все они были уничтожены в четвертый и последний раз во время третьей Войны за наследие и были перемещены за пределы мира. Сейчас здесь добывают редкие металлы.

column2: Colonized to take advantage of the rare earth elements readily available on the surface, Alula Borealis is a backwater mining colony with enough strategic value to have a garrison stationed on planet. Not much has changed since the Star League days.
column3: Colonized to take advantage of the rare earth elements readily available on the surface, Alula Borealis is a backwater mining colony with enough strategic value to have a garrison stationed on planet. Not much has changed since the Star League days.

column2: Alya and its moon are characterised by both the unusual elongated revolutionary cycle around the star and by Xanadu's unusual orbital path, both being the result of the gravitational influence of a huge gas giant in the outer reaches of the system.
column3: Alya and its moon are characterised by both the unusual elongated revolutionary cycle around the star and by Xanadu's unusual orbital path, both being the result of the gravitational influence of a huge gas giant in the outer reaches of the system.

column2: The Alyina system was colonized during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. The first livestock on the world ate the local vegetation and began to hallucinate, sending them escaping across the vast plains.
column3: The Alyina system was colonized during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. The first livestock on the world ate the local vegetation and began to hallucinate, sending them escaping across the vast plains.

column2: Ambatomainty was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Ambatomainty was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Amber was settled during the Star League era, until the Third Succession War when it was finally abandoned.
column3: Amber was settled during the Star League era, until the Third Succession War when it was finally abandoned.

column2: The Ambergrist system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. Ambergrist was notable for producing a flavorful vermouth
column3: The Ambergrist system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. Ambergrist was notable for producing a flavorful vermouth

column2: Amber Grove, named after the amber like glow from the forests situated on mudflats, was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and for much of its history was a part of the Taurian Concordat.
column3: Amber Grove, named after the amber like glow from the forests situated on mudflats, was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and for much of its history was a part of the Taurian Concordat.

column2: Ambrose was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Ambrose was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The Amiga system was settled during the early twenty-fourth century at some point shortly after the formation of the Federated Suns as an expansive silicon mining colony to power the industrial might of House Davion.
column3: The Amiga system was settled during the early twenty-fourth century at some point shortly after the formation of the Federated Suns as an expansive silicon mining colony to power the industrial might of House Davion.

column2: Amity is the second planet in the Amity system. Lacking any moons, Amity has been home to a number of industrial facilities belonging to various companies including Imstar Aerospace
column3: Amity is the second planet in the Amity system. Lacking any moons, Amity has been home to a number of industrial facilities belonging to various companies including Imstar Aerospace

column2: Amminadav is a boring world - literally. It's thermal boreholes extend deep into the surface to provide access to a wealth of minerals.
column3: Amminadav is a boring world - literally. It's thermal boreholes extend deep into the surface to provide access to a wealth of minerals.

column2: Ammon was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Ammon was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Exploratory boreholes were sunk through the glaciers of Amu Darya, and early samples showed promising mineral wealth, but the costs of the Succession Wars made exploiting that wealth too expensive for the Capellan leadership.
column3: Exploratory boreholes were sunk through the glaciers of Amu Darya, and early samples showed promising mineral wealth, but the costs of the Succession Wars made exploiting that wealth too expensive for the Capellan leadership.

column2: Anaea was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Anaea was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Anaheim was settled at some point in the twenty-second century and was contested in the early parts of the Reunification War. Not much of it's industrial base survived the Succession Wars, though Suwama Munitions maintains a mega factory here.
column3: Anaheim was settled at some point in the twenty-second century and was contested in the early parts of the Reunification War. Not much of it's industrial base survived the Succession Wars, though Suwama Munitions maintains a mega factory here.

column2: Anatolia (Pillory 3130+) was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Anatolia (Pillory 3130+) was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Ancha is best known for the fate of the first wave of colonists who all died to plague. The second wave, using the notes from the first wave, managed to synthesize a cure, meaning that their sacrifice was not in vain.
column3: Ancha is best known for the fate of the first wave of colonists who all died to plague. The second wave, using the notes from the first wave, managed to synthesize a cure, meaning that their sacrifice was not in vain.

column2: To expand the habitable area of the planet to exploit the native faunas health properties, the Star League built large solar mirrors in orbit to focus energy from the sun toward the planet, which created storms that wrack the planet centuries later.
column3: To expand the habitable area of the planet to exploit the native faunas health properties, the Star League built large solar mirrors in orbit to focus energy from the sun toward the planet, which created storms that wrack the planet centuries later.

column2: Andarmax is not a single planet, but rather a gas giant with a large number of moons, in varying states of terraforming. The seat of government and the ComStar temple are located on Heinlein, the smallest of the moons.
column3: Andarmax is not a single planet, but rather a gas giant with a large number of moons, in varying states of terraforming. The seat of government and the ComStar temple are located on Heinlein, the smallest of the moons.

column2: Andelys was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Andelys was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Apart from a few warm lakes and rivers, Andro is dry. Noxious gases erupt from deep fissures. Some local plants hover in mid-air, held aloft by gas bags.
column3: Apart from a few warm lakes and rivers, Andro is dry. Noxious gases erupt from deep fissures. Some local plants hover in mid-air, held aloft by gas bags.

column2: Andurien is the fifth planet in the Andurien system and has served as the capital world of both the Andurien Commonality and the Duchy of Andurien as well as being home to a number of defense industries such as Andurien AeroTech.
column3: Andurien is the fifth planet in the Andurien system and has served as the capital world of both the Andurien Commonality and the Duchy of Andurien as well as being home to a number of defense industries such as Andurien AeroTech.

column2: Settled during the First Exodus from Terra, Anegasaki is characterised by a rocky desert lit by a harsh red sun. Deep canyons cut into the planet's crust. The plants are shaped like brittle trumpets pointing up at the sky.
column3: Settled during the First Exodus from Terra, Anegasaki is characterised by a rocky desert lit by a harsh red sun. Deep canyons cut into the planet's crust. The plants are shaped like brittle trumpets pointing up at the sky.

column2: An unremarkable world scarce in everything, Anembo was still the site of a Castle Brian nicknamed Castle Kodiak during the Star League era as well as a large BattleMech garrison. Scavengers scour the surface constantly looking for LosTech.
column3: An unremarkable world scarce in everything, Anembo was still the site of a Castle Brian nicknamed Castle Kodiak during the Star League era as well as a large BattleMech garrison. Scavengers scour the surface constantly looking for LosTech.

column2: Settled to access radium and cesium, Angell has a stark social structure. Water supplies are tainted with a chemical called citrium which is poisonous in large doses. As a result the population is reliant on technology and fresh water shipments.
column3: Settled to access radium and cesium, Angell has a stark social structure. Water supplies are tainted with a chemical called citrium which is poisonous in large doses. As a result the population is reliant on technology and fresh water shipments.

column2: Angelsey was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Angelsey was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: In common with the other worlds of the New Delphi Compact, ninety percent of the population of Anglia lived an agricultural lifestyle maintained by technology of an equivalent to that found on Terra in the late eighteenth or early nineteenth century
column3: In common with the other worlds of the New Delphi Compact, ninety percent of the population of Anglia lived an agricultural lifestyle maintained by technology of an equivalent to that found on Terra in the late eighteenth or early nineteenth century

column2: When Angol was discovered by humans it was already a frozen planet, locked in orbit around a small, dying red star. Settled by prisoners and other \"undesirables\" from nearby Tikonov, the society was modelled after Communism.
column3: When Angol was discovered by humans it was already a frozen planet, locked in orbit around a small, dying red star. Settled by prisoners and other "undesirables" from nearby Tikonov, the society was modelled after Communism.

column2: Angra was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Angra was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The surface of Anguilla is tundra and a few frozen lakes. There are extensive fossilized forests with squat, knotted trunks with black spines. Large amounts of petroleum sit under the surface, the basis for the economy on this ruined world.
column3: The surface of Anguilla is tundra and a few frozen lakes. There are extensive fossilized forests with squat, knotted trunks with black spines. Large amounts of petroleum sit under the surface, the basis for the economy on this ruined world.

column2: Vast parts of the habitable continent are covered in shallow frozen lakes and swamps. The local plant life takes the shape of small orange bubbles, with hundreds of dark green animals hunting in well-coordinated packs.
column3: Vast parts of the habitable continent are covered in shallow frozen lakes and swamps. The local plant life takes the shape of small orange bubbles, with hundreds of dark green animals hunting in well-coordinated packs.

column2: Ankaa wasn't settled until four centuries after the first JumpShips left Terra. The hot world resembled the African and Middle East regions, but the middle latitudes and equator were far harsher and hotter than any Terran desert.
column3: Ankaa wasn't settled until four centuries after the first JumpShips left Terra. The hot world resembled the African and Middle East regions, but the middle latitudes and equator were far harsher and hotter than any Terran desert.

column2: The Anklan system is located near the Elbing and Visby systems and trades rare materials from it's cavernous mines with other worlds in the Hanseatic League.
column3: The Anklan system is located near the Elbing and Visby systems and trades rare materials from it's cavernous mines with other worlds in the Hanseatic League.

column2: A sandy desert lit by a dim blue sun. Huge grey rocks litter the land. A thin dusting of brown lichen covers the land. Many dormant volcanos litter the land.
column3: A sandy desert lit by a dim blue sun. Huge grey rocks litter the land. A thin dusting of brown lichen covers the land. Many dormant volcanos litter the land.

column2: Annapolis is a 'potential' garden world colonized during the First Exodus. Famine and disease have reduced Annapolis to 19th Century level technology. Most of the citizens survive by subsistence farming, and life for most is brutal and dirty.
column3: Annapolis is a 'potential' garden world colonized during the First Exodus. Famine and disease have reduced Annapolis to 19th Century level technology. Most of the citizens survive by subsistence farming, and life for most is brutal and dirty.

column2: There are scattered forests of thick light green stems with massive flowers. Squat muscular bipeds move between the flowers. The lifeforms on this planet appear to be part of a kind of superorganism.
column3: There are scattered forests of thick light green stems with massive flowers. Squat muscular bipeds move between the flowers. The lifeforms on this planet appear to be part of a kind of superorganism.

column2: Annwyn was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Annwyn was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Antallos III is an arid world with two moons. Following the collapse of the Star League, civilization on Antallos collapsed quickly, and by the thirty-first century the barren wastes (\"Free Zones\") are home to the worst of humanity.
column3: Antallos III is an arid world with two moons. Following the collapse of the Star League, civilization on Antallos collapsed quickly, and by the thirty-first century the barren wastes ("Free Zones") are home to the worst of humanity.

column2: A desert world of jagged rocks, there are large plateaus with steep sides. Fauna takes the shape of green geodesic domes within which colonies of small many-colored creatures live. The air is filled with organic compounds that induce hallucinations.
column3: A desert world of jagged rocks, there are large plateaus with steep sides. Fauna takes the shape of green geodesic domes within which colonies of small many-colored creatures live. The air is filled with organic compounds that induce hallucinations.

column2: The icy world of Antias was a battleground of the Second Succession War. To survive, the local government made the world a free haven for pirates and mercenaries. Currently, the government is controlled by pirate cartels.
column3: The icy world of Antias was a battleground of the Second Succession War. To survive, the local government made the world a free haven for pirates and mercenaries. Currently, the government is controlled by pirate cartels.

column2: The Antietam system was settled relatively early during human expansion across the Inner Sphere, possibly during the First Exodus from Terra, and is the home to numerous small aerovehicle exporters.
column3: The Antietam system was settled relatively early during human expansion across the Inner Sphere, possibly during the First Exodus from Terra, and is the home to numerous small aerovehicle exporters.

column2: An Ting is a dry world where farmers eke out a living. Many agrimechs survived the Star League era, and there are often competitions with Cattlemaster agromechs such as Space Bull Rodeo.
column3: An Ting is a dry world where farmers eke out a living. Many agrimechs survived the Star League era, and there are often competitions with Cattlemaster agromechs such as Space Bull Rodeo.

column2: There are scattered forests of orange fronds. A network of tunnels extends under much of the surface. The air is filled with dark orange fluttering creatures. Most of the local animals are different morphs of the same highly versatile species.
column3: There are scattered forests of orange fronds. A network of tunnels extends under much of the surface. The air is filled with dark orange fluttering creatures. Most of the local animals are different morphs of the same highly versatile species.

column2: Antwerp is the fifth planet in the Antwerp system and is home to the major Bordello Military Goods, Inc. industrial plant - the only military manufacturing plant in the Hanseatic League.
column3: Antwerp is the fifth planet in the Antwerp system and is home to the major Bordello Military Goods, Inc. industrial plant - the only military manufacturing plant in the Hanseatic League.

column2: Once a site of a major Diplass BattleMechs site, the only remnant now is a Star League era continent spanning train service. A common phrase spoken here is to \"Take the midnight train going Anywhere\"
column3: Once a site of a major Diplass BattleMechs site, the only remnant now is a Star League era continent spanning train service. A common phrase spoken here is to "Take the midnight train going Anywhere"

column2: Aodh was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Aodh was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The barren rock of Aomen was a viable source of germanium, a critical element for K-F Drives. With fewer drives in production, and more easily extracted sources of the rare mineral available, the League ultimately abandoned the mining facility.
column3: The barren rock of Aomen was a viable source of germanium, a critical element for K-F Drives. With fewer drives in production, and more easily extracted sources of the rare mineral available, the League ultimately abandoned the mining facility.

column2: Aosia was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Aosia was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Apinzel was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Apinzel was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: A Place was devastated by famine after the first succession war. A small terran world notable for politcal intrigue during the second succession war, not much happens other than farming here. It earns it's name.
column3: A Place was devastated by famine after the first succession war. A small terran world notable for politcal intrigue during the second succession war, not much happens other than farming here. It earns it's name.

column2: Apolakkia has a planet-wide, deep ocean that is constantly steaming. Black winged creatures spend their lives in flight, not even landing to reproduce. Most of the local animals are different morphs of the same highly versatile species.
column3: Apolakkia has a planet-wide, deep ocean that is constantly steaming. Black winged creatures spend their lives in flight, not even landing to reproduce. Most of the local animals are different morphs of the same highly versatile species.

column2: Apollo was for several centuries the capital world of the Rim Worlds Republic. Apollo is been home to a number of manufacturing facilities operated by companies such as United Mechanics, as well as massive fortresses modelling after Castle Brians.
column3: Apollo was for several centuries the capital world of the Rim Worlds Republic. Apollo is been home to a number of manufacturing facilities operated by companies such as United Mechanics, as well as massive fortresses modelling after Castle Brians.

column2: A planet-wide ocean mostly free of ice, except at the poles. Groups of striped creatures splash and frolic in the shallows. The adults hunt their own juveniles for food. Constant hurricanes ravage the surface.
column3: A planet-wide ocean mostly free of ice, except at the poles. Groups of striped creatures splash and frolic in the shallows. The adults hunt their own juveniles for food. Constant hurricanes ravage the surface.

column2: Appian features a lush, fertile Terran world called Omen. Every attempt to colonize Omen has failed, and the world is littered with ruins. The inhabitants are researchers in a small station, trying to pierce Omen's secrets.
column3: Appian features a lush, fertile Terran world called Omen. Every attempt to colonize Omen has failed, and the world is littered with ruins. The inhabitants are researchers in a small station, trying to pierce Omen's secrets.

column2: The Apriki system was colonized at some point prior to the end of the Reunification War and became a major industrial center for the Draconis Combine. Osaka Heavy Metrics produces many IndustrialMech designs here, such as the CattleMaster.
column3: The Apriki system was colonized at some point prior to the end of the Reunification War and became a major industrial center for the Draconis Combine. Osaka Heavy Metrics produces many IndustrialMech designs here, such as the CattleMaster.

column2: Apsalar was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Apsalar was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: A former holding of the Free Worlds League, Aquagea lost much of its infrastructure to the League's reprisals during their independence movement. The current inhabitants are fiercely nationalistic and detest the League.
column3: A former holding of the Free Worlds League, Aquagea lost much of its infrastructure to the League's reprisals during their independence movement. The current inhabitants are fiercely nationalistic and detest the League.
