column3: Burton is a company world, the home of one of the largest Taurian electronics manufacturers. Most of the world's small population consists of employees, staff, and support services for O-P Computer Electronics.

column2: Bushmill was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Bushmill was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Butler is a peaceful earth-like planet, with a diverse manufacturing base.  Plans are in place to build an orbital ship yard, which will no doubt boost Butler's economy.
column3: Butler is a peaceful earth-like planet, with a diverse manufacturing base. Plans are in place to build an orbital ship yard, which will no doubt boost Butler's economy.

column2: Butte Hold is a minor planet in the newly formed Greater Valkyrate.  Barely self-sufficient agriculturally, and totally dependent on importation of manufactured goods, it is of little importance.
column3: Butte Hold is a minor planet in the newly formed Greater Valkyrate. Barely self-sufficient agriculturally, and totally dependent on importation of manufactured goods, it is of little importance.

column2: Butzfleth (AKA \"Butt Flesh\"), is a minor FWL planet only important because it contains one of the largest prisons in FWL space.  The inhospitable planet is otherwise only inhabited by miners and local support businesses.
column3: Butzfleth (AKA "Butt Flesh"), is a minor FWL planet only important because it contains one of the largest prisons in FWL space. The inhospitable planet is otherwise only inhabited by miners and local support businesses.

column2: Bye's Ship was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Bye's Ship was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: A minor planet on the Combine/FRR border, Byesville is only inhabitable at the poles, with the rest of the planet too hot to support human life.
column3: A minor planet on the Combine/FRR border, Byesville is only inhabitable at the poles, with the rest of the planet too hot to support human life.

column2: A desolate system that is devoid of colonists, initially settled during the Star League era, but now lays abandoned in the outskirts of the Draconis Combine
column3: A desolate system that is devoid of colonists, initially settled during the Star League era, but now lays abandoned in the outskirts of the Draconis Combine

column2: A system on the edge of human explored space, formally settled by the Taurians during the Star League era, it now lays empty, possibly due to one of the many orbiting astroids crashing down on the settlers.
column3: A system on the edge of human explored space, formally settled by the Taurians during the Star League era, it now lays empty, possibly due to one of the many orbiting astroids crashing down on the settlers.

column2: Cadiz is a small, tropical planet, known for it's endless swamps, and swarms of insects.  Not a nice place to live, unless you are a frog.
column3: Cadiz is a small, tropical planet, known for it's endless swamps, and swarms of insects. Not a nice place to live, unless you are a frog.

column2: Recently settled after the Fourth Succession War, Cadiz is a small agricultural world.
column3: Recently settled after the Fourth Succession War, Cadiz is a small agricultural world.

column2: A system initally settled by Davions in the Draconis March. It was immediately found that the local flora was very hostile, with extremely large Venus Fly Traps eating serveral explorers. It was finally abadoned due to increasing raids by the DCMS.
column3: A system initally settled by Davions in the Draconis March. It was immediately found that the local flora was very hostile, with extremely large Venus Fly Traps eating serveral explorers. It was finally abadoned due to increasing raids by the DCMS.

column2: After the end of the Reunification War, some Kuritans were ashamed of their soldiers' role in the massacres, and sought to get away from the actions of the DCMS. Sadly, the colony failed as the settlers were not used to the harshness periphery.
column3: After the end of the Reunification War, some Kuritans were ashamed of their soldiers' role in the massacres, and sought to get away from the actions of the DCMS. Sadly, the colony failed as the settlers were not used to the harshness periphery.

column2: Caesar's Crown is a young star cluster in the anti-spinward Deep Periphery.
column3: Caesar's Crown is a young star cluster in the anti-spinward Deep Periphery.

column2: Cahokia IV - more commonly known simply as Cahokia - is the fourth planet in the Cahokia system and has a single moon named Sequoia. Cahokia has been home to a manufacturing plant operated by Achernar BattleMechs.
column3: Cahokia IV - more commonly known simply as Cahokia - is the fourth planet in the Cahokia system and has a single moon named Sequoia. Cahokia has been home to a manufacturing plant operated by Achernar BattleMechs.

column2: Caillinius was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Caillinius was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Cajamarca is an anomoly - A smallish planet with a high gravity, thanks to it's abundant reserves of heavy metals.  As a result mining operations are plentiful, in spite of it's hostile environment.
column3: Cajamarca is an anomoly - A smallish planet with a high gravity, thanks to it's abundant reserves of heavy metals. As a result mining operations are plentiful, in spite of it's hostile environment.

column2: Calafell is typical of a central Lyran planet - heavily industrialised, but also self-sufficient.  Trade opportunities abound, particularly if you know where to look.
column3: Calafell is typical of a central Lyran planet - heavily industrialised, but also self-sufficient. Trade opportunities abound, particularly if you know where to look.

column2: Calchedon was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Calchedon was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: A typical Periphery world, Caldarium has just enough resources to be more-or-less self sufficient, but not enough to cause the Lyran Commonwealth to be interested enough to remove the substantial pirate presence to take it over.
column3: A typical Periphery world, Caldarium has just enough resources to be more-or-less self sufficient, but not enough to cause the Lyran Commonwealth to be interested enough to remove the substantial pirate presence to take it over.

column2: Caldrea was captured by the Draconis Combine in 2812, using fast-moving BattleMech forces that were able to defeat the defending forces despite the defenders using nuclear weapons in an effort to try and resist the invasion.
column3: Caldrea was captured by the Draconis Combine in 2812, using fast-moving BattleMech forces that were able to defeat the defending forces despite the defenders using nuclear weapons in an effort to try and resist the invasion.

column2: Caldwell has been a Fed planet for most of the last 450 years.  In spite of being the home to the Fighting Urukhai (under contract to the Feds), rumours abound of a hidden pirate base, if not on-planet, then at least in-system.
column3: Caldwell has been a Fed planet for most of the last 450 years. In spite of being the home to the Fighting Urukhai (under contract to the Feds), rumours abound of a hidden pirate base, if not on-planet, then at least in-system.

column2: Caledea was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Caledea was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Caledon suffered heavy damage when House Kurita conquered the planet in 2849 and effectively scorched the planet. The world was slow to recover, and was subsequently ruled from offworld for over a century, first from Hesperus II and then Tharkad.
column3: Caledon suffered heavy damage when House Kurita conquered the planet in 2849 and effectively scorched the planet. The world was slow to recover, and was subsequently ruled from offworld for over a century, first from Hesperus II and then Tharkad.

column2: Calingasta was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Calingasta was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Calish is an anomoly - the system has 2 planets in the habitable zone.  The primary planet, Calish III, is an arctic world with a broad band of arible land around the equator, while Calish II is an arid hotbox with large mineral deposits.
column3: Calish is an anomoly - the system has 2 planets in the habitable zone. The primary planet, Calish III, is an arctic world with a broad band of arible land around the equator, while Calish II is an arid hotbox with large mineral deposits.

column2: Callison supports a large, relatively prosperous population but lacks in mineral wealth or strategically important heavy industry. Traditionally a part of the FWL, Callison was only incorporated in to the Lyran Commonwealth in 3029.
column3: Callison supports a large, relatively prosperous population but lacks in mineral wealth or strategically important heavy industry. Traditionally a part of the FWL, Callison was only incorporated in to the Lyran Commonwealth in 3029.

column2: Callisto's claim to fame is tourism and retirement.  Rich folks with nothing better to do come and spend 18+ hours a day in one fantasy neural-link game or another.  I bet none of them ever entered data into a spreadsheet either...
column3: Callisto's claim to fame is tourism and retirement. Rich folks with nothing better to do come and spend 18+ hours a day in one fantasy neural-link game or another. I bet none of them ever entered data into a spreadsheet either...

column2: The Calloway system was settled during or shortly before the Age of War. 3 moons at Calloway VI reflect so much sunlight that no city on the world has had to install street lamps. Trading is a bedrock of the planetary economy.
column3: The Calloway system was settled during or shortly before the Age of War. 3 moons at Calloway VI reflect so much sunlight that no city on the world has had to install street lamps. Trading is a bedrock of the planetary economy.

column2: Sitting right on the Capellan/FWL border for as long as anyone can remember, Calpaca has remarkably remained a peaceful place of rolling purple hills, where strangely attractive alien sheep roam, herded by macho looking agromechs.
column3: Sitting right on the Capellan/FWL border for as long as anyone can remember, Calpaca has remarkably remained a peaceful place of rolling purple hills, where strangely attractive alien sheep roam, herded by macho looking agromechs.

column2: A mining and industrial world of more strategic than economic value, Calseraigne was seized from the Capellans during the Third Succession War by the Free Worlds League. The inhabitants chafe under Marik rule, and unrest and minor sabotage is common.
column3: A mining and industrial world of more strategic than economic value, Calseraigne was seized from the Capellans during the Third Succession War by the Free Worlds League. The inhabitants chafe under Marik rule, and unrest and minor sabotage is common.

column2: Calvados was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Calvados was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The system is strewn with thousands of asteroids and three large gas giants. The Department of Mega Engineering terraformed one of the moons in the system to serve as a base for system wide asteroid mining operations.
column3: The system is strewn with thousands of asteroids and three large gas giants. The Department of Mega Engineering terraformed one of the moons in the system to serve as a base for system wide asteroid mining operations.

column2: The Camadeirre system is choked with asteroids and dominated by three Jovian gas giants; inhabitants live on a terraformed moon. A raid by the SLDF on Camadeirre is commonly thought to have been the spark that started the New Vandenberg Uprising.
column3: The Camadeirre system is choked with asteroids and dominated by three Jovian gas giants; inhabitants live on a terraformed moon. A raid by the SLDF on Camadeirre is commonly thought to have been the spark that started the New Vandenberg Uprising.

column2: A rugged world with many ruins, Cambiano is home to one the Federations key archaelogical sites, the Mighty Nein.
column3: A rugged world with many ruins, Cambiano is home to one the Federations key archaelogical sites, the Mighty Nein.

column2: SURVEY DATA INCOMPLETE
column3: SURVEY DATA INCOMPLETE

column2: The Cameron system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra, and was a member of the Principality of Regulus prior to the formation of the Free Worlds League in the late twenty-third century.
column3: The Cameron system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra, and was a member of the Principality of Regulus prior to the formation of the Free Worlds League in the late twenty-third century.

column2: An otherwise non-descript planet deep in Lyran space, Cameron is known for it's agriculture, and it's production of a particularly nice single malt scotch.
column3: An otherwise non-descript planet deep in Lyran space, Cameron is known for it's agriculture, and it's production of a particularly nice single malt scotch.

column2: Camlann was one of many worlds to be colonized after the widespread adoption of the Laranth water-purification process in the 2630s, technology that made the terraforming easier by removing the requirement for the importing of pure water by ice ship.
column3: Camlann was one of many worlds to be colonized after the widespread adoption of the Laranth water-purification process in the 2630s, technology that made the terraforming easier by removing the requirement for the importing of pure water by ice ship.

column2: Originally settled by fanatical Muslims around 2400, Camlann has recently passed from Lyran to Combine hands a few times.  Now \"safely\" in Draconis hands again, Camlann is typical of a border world full of militant religious fanatics... Interesting.
column3: Originally settled by fanatical Muslims around 2400, Camlann has recently passed from Lyran to Combine hands a few times. Now "safely" in Draconis hands again, Camlann is typical of a border world full of militant religious fanatics... Interesting.

column2: Typical of a border world, Cammal has seen frequent raids from the Confederation ever since the system was taken over by the Federation during the Second Succession War.  Such raids have always had \"Plausable Deniability\", as such raids always do...
column3: Typical of a border world, Cammal has seen frequent raids from the Confederation ever since the system was taken over by the Federation during the Second Succession War. Such raids have always had "Plausable Deniability", as such raids always do...

column2: Campbelton III is the third planet in the Campbelton system and has a single moon named Atholville. Campbelton has been host to at facilities operated by at least one significant defense manufacturing company.
column3: Campbelton III is the third planet in the Campbelton system and has a single moon named Atholville. Campbelton has been host to at facilities operated by at least one significant defense manufacturing company.

column2: The general rule is that border worlds don't contain significant manufacturing facilities.  Campertown is an exception to the rule, with Sacrada Industries having some important facilities here, manufacturing communications and guidance systems.
column3: The general rule is that border worlds don't contain significant manufacturing facilities. Campertown is an exception to the rule, with Sacrada Industries having some important facilities here, manufacturing communications and guidance systems.

column2: A stop-over point for those heading into the Periphery and Deep Periphery. A large population of retired spacers, combined with the trading and exploration route, made Campoleone a storehouse of knowledge in the Free Worlds League.
column3: A stop-over point for those heading into the Periphery and Deep Periphery. A large population of retired spacers, combined with the trading and exploration route, made Campoleone a storehouse of knowledge in the Free Worlds League.

column2: The Canal system is located near the Moriguchi and Sweet Water systems. During the final years of the Star League, Canal was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison.
column3: The Canal system is located near the Moriguchi and Sweet Water systems. During the final years of the Star League, Canal was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison.

column2: Candiear is a very \"liberal\" planet, who's fertile farmlands are just as likely to be producing plants for \"recreational purposes\" as they are food.  The net result is a distinct \"hippy\" feel to the planet, and a small tourist trade.
column3: Candiear is a very "liberal" planet, who's fertile farmlands are just as likely to be producing plants for "recreational purposes" as they are food. The net result is a distinct "hippy" feel to the planet, and a small tourist trade.

column2: The ruins of a Star League-Era manufacturing facility lay seemingly dorment and neglected.  A careful eye might notice the occasional heat signature, but no inhabitants ever intentionally make themselves known.
column3: The ruins of a Star League-Era manufacturing facility lay seemingly dorment and neglected. A careful eye might notice the occasional heat signature, but no inhabitants ever intentionally make themselves known.

column2: Canopus IV has served as the planetary capital of the Magistracy of Canopus since the founding of the nation, and was heavily-industrialized for a Periphery planet
column3: Канопус IV служил столицей Магистрата Канопуса с момента основания государства и был сильно индустриализирован по меркам планет Периферии.

column2: Being deep in Fed space has allowed Capac a \"more or less peaceful\" existance over the years, which is one of the reasons it was chosen to house a large prison complex.
column3: Being deep in Fed space has allowed Capac a "more or less peaceful" existance over the years, which is one of the reasons it was chosen to house a large prison complex.

column2: The former capital of the Capellan Confederation, Capella remains an important industrial planet with orbital shipyards.  Additionally, the Capellan War College remains one of the premier centres of learning in the Confederation.
column3: The former capital of the Capellan Confederation, Capella remains an important industrial planet with orbital shipyards. Additionally, the Capellan War College remains one of the premier centres of learning in the Confederation.

column2: Caph has large swath of tropical rainforests, fertile lands and large amounts of mineral wealth. Sections of the planet were rendered uninhabitable during the First and Second Succession Wars, but Caph maintains many other Star League era facilities.
column3: Каф имеет обширную полосу тропических лесов, плодородные земли и большие запасы полезных ископаемых. Во время первой и второй Войн за Наследие часть поверхности планеты стала непригодной для проживания, но на Кафе всё еще сохранены и поддерживаются множество объектов эпохи Звездной Лиги.

column2: Capolla's thick surface jungle hides significant mineral wealth. The residents have long-standing political ties with their neighbours on Terra Firma, and the two planets tend to wield their economic and politcal power together.
column3: Capolla's thick surface jungle hides significant mineral wealth. The residents have long-standing political ties with their neighbours on Terra Firma, and the two planets tend to wield their economic and politcal power together.

column2: Capra was the headquarters world of the XXIII Corps (Star League) of the Star League Defense Force during the final years of the Star League.  As a result, there are the usual rumours of a \"hidden cache\" that always surround former SLDF bases.
column3: Capra was the headquarters world of the XXIII Corps (Star League) of the Star League Defense Force during the final years of the Star League. As a result, there are the usual rumours of a "hidden cache" that always surround former SLDF bases.

column2: Capricorn was once a significant manufacturing planet for Wu Industries, however they discontinued operations in 2612 due to depleted mineral reserves increasing the cost of production.
column3: Capricorn was once a significant manufacturing planet for Wu Industries, however they discontinued operations in 2612 due to depleted mineral reserves increasing the cost of production.

column2: Cap Rouge has three continents named beauport, Sainte-Foy and Sillery.  Hero Training Institute, a military academy specialising in training MechWarriors and Aerospace personnel, is located on Sillery.
column3: Cap Rouge has three continents named beauport, Sainte-Foy and Sillery. Hero Training Institute, a military academy specialising in training MechWarriors and Aerospace personnel, is located on Sillery.

column2: Caracol was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Caracol was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: During the final years of the Star League, Carbonis' was the home of an insurgent movement that targeted both Confederation and SLDF troops. Carbonis was the site of Fort Dunedin, a Star League era base.
column3: During the final years of the Star League, Carbonis' was the home of an insurgent movement that targeted both Confederation and SLDF troops. Carbonis was the site of Fort Dunedin, a Star League era base.

column2: Carcassonne was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Carcassonne was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: SURVEY DATA INCOMPLETE
column3: SURVEY DATA INCOMPLETE

column2: Cardff was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Cardff was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Caria was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Caria was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Caripare is a garden planet, who's lush vegitation and highly arible soil have made it almost vital to the survival of surrounding planets.  Further, it's warm waters support a wide variety of aquatic life, most of which is edible.
column3: Caripare is a garden planet, who's lush vegitation and highly arible soil have made it almost vital to the survival of surrounding planets. Further, it's warm waters support a wide variety of aquatic life, most of which is edible.

column2: A largely peaceful and well-industrialized planet with a terrestrial climate, Carlisle was home to a large planetary militia as well as supplemental defense forces controlled by the owners of the factories located on the planet.
column3: A largely peaceful and well-industrialized planet with a terrestrial climate, Carlisle was home to a large planetary militia as well as supplemental defense forces controlled by the owners of the factories located on the planet.

column2: During the Star League era, Carmacks was considered a major commercial and transport hub. This concentration of wealth and its location attracted numerous bandit raids which kept its SLDF defenders active.
column3: During the Star League era, Carmacks was considered a major commercial and transport hub. This concentration of wealth and its location attracted numerous bandit raids which kept its SLDF defenders active.

column2: Carmelita was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Carmelita was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Carmen is a small Capellan planet of little apparent importance.  Ruins of a pre-human civilisation still dot the planet, which scientists believe was wiped out over 200000 years ago by an unknown event.
column3: Carmen is a small Capellan planet of little apparent importance. Ruins of a pre-human civilisation still dot the planet, which scientists believe was wiped out over 200000 years ago by an unknown event.

column2: Storms and befouled air make Carmichael a miserable place. The Taurian inhabitants fought a long, brutal guerilla war against the SLDF during the Reunification War, but ultimately lost; since then, the world has been a Davion holding.
column3: Storms and befouled air make Carmichael a miserable place. The Taurian inhabitants fought a long, brutal guerilla war against the SLDF during the Reunification War, but ultimately lost; since then, the world has been a Davion holding.

column2: Carnac was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Carnac was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Carnwath is a relatively unimportant world with a hot, humid climate. The world is known primarily for two things; its tropical fruit exports and its infamous swarms of stinging insects.
column3: Carnwath is a relatively unimportant world with a hot, humid climate. The world is known primarily for two things; its tropical fruit exports and its infamous swarms of stinging insects.

column2: A double sun and Carse's unusual orbit provided four cycles of seasons. During a Cold Cycle, the temperature plummeted, oceans froze, and only DropShips and the largest air vehicles could survive the heavy winds.
column3: A double sun and Carse's unusual orbit provided four cycles of seasons. During a Cold Cycle, the temperature plummeted, oceans froze, and only DropShips and the largest air vehicles could survive the heavy winds.

column2: Carsphairn has very fertile soil but it wracked by dangerous storms. Over the centuries large weatherproofing domes have been built over the best farmland, ensuring a good harvest each year.
column3: Carsphairn has very fertile soil but it wracked by dangerous storms. Over the centuries large weatherproofing domes have been built over the best farmland, ensuring a good harvest each year.

column2: The fourth planet in the Carstairs system is named New Tucson. It is site of a major copper mining operation by FrictionTechInc, who often hire small mercenary outfits for protection.
column3: The fourth planet in the Carstairs system is named New Tucson. It is site of a major copper mining operation by FrictionTechInc, who often hire small mercenary outfits for protection.

column2: The Cartago system was colonized at some point during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was the subject of the Cartago Conflict in the early 2400s. It had been incorporated into the Federated Suns by the end of the Age of War.
column3: The Cartago system was colonized at some point during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was the subject of the Cartago Conflict in the early 2400s. It had been incorporated into the Federated Suns by the end of the Age of War.

column2: Carthage is so far out in the distant Periphery, and so isolated, that despite its pleasant climate it remains only lightly settled by eccentrics, adventurers, and criminals. Its single spaceport is little more than a concrete pad with a few service buildings.
column3: Carthage is so far out in the distant Periphery, and so isolated, that despite its pleasant climate it remains only lightly settled by eccentrics, adventurers, and criminals. Its single spaceport is little more than a concrete pad with a few service buildings.

column2: Recently settled after the Fourth Succession War, Carvajal is a small agricultural colony set up amongst a fertile volcanic plain.
column3: Recently settled after the Fourth Succession War, Carvajal is a small agricultural colony set up amongst a fertile volcanic plain.

column2: Located in a central area between several factions, the Carver system has been in the hands of many different rulers. As such, its populace has little allegiance to any faction, and generally try to do the best for themselves.
column3: Система Карвер, расположена практически в центре Внутренней сферы около границ различных фракций. Система находилась во власти множества разных правителей, поэтому население мало предано какой-либо фракции и обычно старается сделать все возможное для себя.

column2: Cascade was always a FWL planet, and given it's limited resources it has remained peaceful in spite of it's border position with the Lyrans.  Several strange ruins have been found on the planet, hinting of a (now dead) former civilisation.
column3: Cascade was always a FWL planet, and given it's limited resources it has remained peaceful in spite of it's border position with the Lyrans. Several strange ruins have been found on the planet, hinting of a (now dead) former civilisation.

column2: Despite being similar to Terra, Caselton is too dry and too cold to easily grow crops. Similarly it has enough minerals to support its population, but not enough to export.  It has an asteriod belt (the Cassini Belt) that is mined for minerals.
column3: Despite being similar to Terra, Caselton is too dry and too cold to easily grow crops. Similarly it has enough minerals to support its population, but not enough to export. It has an asteriod belt (the Cassini Belt) that is mined for minerals.

column2: The Casere system was colonised at some point prior to the end of the Reunification War and by the Star League era was a part of the Draconis Combine, where it remained until the formation of the Free Rasalhauge Republic.
column3: The Casere system was colonised at some point prior to the end of the Reunification War and by the Star League era was a part of the Draconis Combine, where it remained until the formation of the Free Rasalhauge Republic.

column2: Cassias is a tropical world located on the Draconis Combine/Federated Suns border. It also acted as the border between the \"Outback\" and the more densely populated inner systems of the Federated Suns.
column3: Cassias is a tropical world located on the Draconis Combine/Federated Suns border. It also acted as the border between the "Outback" and the more densely populated inner systems of the Federated Suns.

column2: This aquatic world is famed for its bountiful, deadly oceans. The population is clustered on volcanic island chains along the equator, while the oceans are ruled by a vast array of native predatory life forms.
column3: This aquatic world is famed for its bountiful, deadly oceans. The population is clustered on volcanic island chains along the equator, while the oceans are ruled by a vast array of native predatory life forms.

column2: Castile is the fourth planet in the system and is home to the only BattleMech manufacturing at King Dumount Defense Facility in the Nueva Castile region.
column3: Castile is the fourth planet in the system and is home to the only BattleMech manufacturing at King Dumount Defense Facility in the Nueva Castile region.

column2: Castor has been the site of regular raids and battles between the Lyran and Free Worlds Armed Forces for the last two centuries. Famously, a raid from the Kell Hounds in 3011 destroyed a stockpile of ancient nuclear warheads on Castor.
column3: Castor has been the site of regular raids and battles between the Lyran and Free Worlds Armed Forces for the last two centuries. Famously, a raid from the Kell Hounds in 3011 destroyed a stockpile of ancient nuclear warheads on Castor.

column2: Castrovia was a member of the Sian Commonwealth prior to the formation of the Capellan Combine in the mid-twenty-fourth century. Many educational institutes offer extensive archaelogical courses surveying the planets many ruins.
column3: Castrovia was a member of the Sian Commonwealth prior to the formation of the Capellan Combine in the mid-twenty-fourth century. Many educational institutes offer extensive archaelogical courses surveying the planets many ruins.

column2: Cate's Hold was settled as a gambling and resort world, but soon became a critical logistical center for the Magistracy in the Reunification War. Recent prospectors have discovered caches of SLDF technology and radioactive ores, once more drawing interest to the planet.
column3: Cate's Hold was settled as a gambling and resort world, but soon became a critical logistical center for the Magistracy in the Reunification War. Recent prospectors have discovered caches of SLDF technology and radioactive ores, once more drawing interest to the planet.

column2: Catroxx was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Catroxx was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Cavalor was settled after the Reunification War, as the Capellans sought to reinforce their borders with the Magistracy and the Free Worlds League. Since that time, fertile soil and plentiful resources have caused the population of the world to explode.
column3: Cavalor was settled after the Reunification War, as the Capellans sought to reinforce their borders with the Magistracy and the Free Worlds League. Since that time, fertile soil and plentiful resources have caused the population of the world to explode.

column2: Naming conventions on Cavanaugh appear to have been strongly influenced by the tales and legends of King Arthur.  Steer clear of Camellot though - it is a silly place.
column3: Naming conventions on Cavanaugh appear to have been strongly influenced by the tales and legends of King Arthur. Steer clear of Camellot though - it is a silly place.

column2: Cayuga was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Cayuga was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Ceará was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Ceará was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Cebalrai is a border world, and it's surface has the scars of numerous battles between the Combine and the Commonwealth to show for it.  The atmosphere is thin, but breathable.
column3: Cebalrai is a border world, and it's surface has the scars of numerous battles between the Combine and the Commonwealth to show for it. The atmosphere is thin, but breathable.

column2: Ceiba was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Ceiba was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Celano is a warm temperate planet with ample water sources apparently settled at some point in the early 3000s. Despite the plentiful water, the vicious storm systems that occur frequently on the world have made survival a challenge.
column3: Celano is a warm temperate planet with ample water sources apparently settled at some point in the early 3000s. Despite the plentiful water, the vicious storm systems that occur frequently on the world have made survival a challenge.

column2: Celebes was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Celebes was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Celentaro is one of the core Taurean planets first colonised around 2700.  Like most Taurean planets, it is mostly self-sufficient, and not particularly notable for anything.
column3: Celentaro is one of the core Taurean planets first colonised around 2700. Like most Taurean planets, it is mostly self-sufficient, and not particularly notable for anything.

column2: Centavido was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Centavido was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Cephi is a currently uninhabited planet, with little known about it.
column3: Cephi is a currently uninhabited planet, with little known about it.

column2: Ceram was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Ceram was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: \"Cerberus Lives!\". System was colonized prior to the end of the Age of War. A regional capital and the most heavily industrialized planet within the Outworlds Alliance. See the \"Treaty of Cerberus\", year 2585
column3: "Cerberus Lives!". System was colonized prior to the end of the Age of War. A regional capital and the most heavily industrialized planet within the Outworlds Alliance. See the "Treaty of Cerberus", year 2585

column2: Cerignola was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Cerignola was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Cerillos is one of the so-called \"Southwestern Worlds\", an association of three worlds in the Free Worlds League. These agrarian worlds have a unique culture descended from North American Indian and Hispanic peoples.
column3: Cerillos is one of the so-called "Southwestern Worlds", an association of three worlds in the Free Worlds League. These agrarian worlds have a unique culture descended from North American Indian and Hispanic peoples.

column2: During the Star League era, the planet Cerulean was the site of a research facility dedicated to finding new water purification technologies.  While much of this research has been abandoned over the years, it continues on a smaller scale to this day.
column3: During the Star League era, the planet Cerulean was the site of a research facility dedicated to finding new water purification technologies. While much of this research has been abandoned over the years, it continues on a smaller scale to this day.

column2: Ceuta was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Ceuta was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The Chaffee system is the location of at least one habitable world and as at 3095 was an independent system located in the Deep Periphery.  Little is known about it.
column3: The Chaffee system is the location of at least one habitable world and as at 3095 was an independent system located in the Deep Periphery. Little is known about it.

column2: The thin atmosphere and vivid sunsets here inspired artists from all the Terran colonies... before being utterly forgotten and abandoned.  With no atmosphere to speak of, some of the ruins still show signs of habitation.
column3: The thin atmosphere and vivid sunsets here inspired artists from all the Terran colonies... before being utterly forgotten and abandoned. With no atmosphere to speak of, some of the ruins still show signs of habitation.

column2: Chagos is a fairly self-sufficient planet, with a relatively peaceful history.  The planet is primarily water, however it is dotted with numerous small islands with quite fertile soil, formed by the planets extensive vulcanic action.
column3: Chagos is a fairly self-sufficient planet, with a relatively peaceful history. The planet is primarily water, however it is dotted with numerous small islands with quite fertile soil, formed by the planets extensive vulcanic action.

column2: Chahar worked hard to bring corporations to the planet, and by 3025 it had succeeded. Not only is it the home of Dobless Information Services, but Trellshire Heavy Industries built a weapons plant near its capital city.
column3: Chahar worked hard to bring corporations to the planet, and by 3025 it had succeeded. Not only is it the home of Dobless Information Services, but Trellshire Heavy Industries built a weapons plant near its capital city.

column2: The Chaine Cluster is a collection of 7 stars in a very close proximity - Turpin, Corell, Aeryn, Alnabog, Hillburg, Brekke, and Dark Mist.  While it has had several colonisation attempts, the area is mostly inhabited by pirates.
column3: The Chaine Cluster is a collection of 7 stars in a very close proximity - Turpin, Corell, Aeryn, Alnabog, Hillburg, Brekke, and Dark Mist. While it has had several colonisation attempts, the area is mostly inhabited by pirates.

column2: A somewhat anomolous little planet in the middle of Federation space, Chakachamma is actually a moon orbiting a gas giant which is in the outer edge of the habitable zone of it's class A star.  The result is a icy planet with widely varying temps.
column3: A somewhat anomolous little planet in the middle of Federation space, Chakachamma is actually a moon orbiting a gas giant which is in the outer edge of the habitable zone of it's class A star. The result is a icy planet with widely varying temps.

column2: A tropical world, Chalouba is known for it's large generally hostile insects, and constant roumers of a Lostech cache hidden during the days of the Star League by the 9th Army and the XVIII Corps.
column3: A tropical world, Chalouba is known for it's large generally hostile insects, and constant roumers of a Lostech cache hidden during the days of the Star League by the 9th Army and the XVIII Corps.

column2: A recent Federated acquisition from the 4th Succession War, Chamdo has a cool temperate climate suitable for agriculture, and high mountains filled with menerals.
column3: A recent Federated acquisition from the 4th Succession War, Chamdo has a cool temperate climate suitable for agriculture, and high mountains filled with menerals.

column2: Champadanga is an icy world, where temperatures reach up to 150°C. Whilst it is rich with raw materials under the ice, the only settlements are those in sheltered chasms powered and heated by enormous Star League era steam generators.
column3: Champadanga is an icy world, where temperatures reach up to 150°C. Whilst it is rich with raw materials under the ice, the only settlements are those in sheltered chasms powered and heated by enormous Star League era steam generators.

column2: This cold and rocky world is choked by silt and ash in the air from the constant volcanic activity. Inhabitants live in hab-spheres, emerging only to work in the extensive mines or research the local silicon-based life forms.
column3: This cold and rocky world is choked by silt and ash in the air from the constant volcanic activity. Inhabitants live in hab-spheres, emerging only to work in the extensive mines or research the local silicon-based life forms.

column2: Chandler and it's orbital moon Bing are home to a thriving financial sector, once a major part of the Combine. Financial transpondsters are often dispatched from here to nearby worlds to ensure regulatory compliance.
column3: Chandler and it's orbital moon Bing are home to a thriving financial sector, once a major part of the Combine. Financial transpondsters are often dispatched from here to nearby worlds to ensure regulatory compliance.

column2: Chanute has a strange past. Once settled by religious pilgrims during the Exodus, it became a God Cult when one of the self proclaimed leaders thought he could order the tides back. He could not.
column3: Chanute has a strange past. Once settled by religious pilgrims during the Exodus, it became a God Cult when one of the self proclaimed leaders thought he could order the tides back. He could not.

column2: Not many people have heard of Chapineria, but almost everyone in the Combine wears one of their reknown trillion unit export rugged shoes and boots.
column3: Not many people have heard of Chapineria, but almost everyone in the Combine wears one of their reknown trillion unit export rugged shoes and boots.

column2: Massive planetwide forests cover this oxygen rich tropical world, a veritable breadbasket if ever there was one.
column3: Massive planetwide forests cover this oxygen rich tropical world, a veritable breadbasket if ever there was one.

column2: An almost uninhabitable dustball that was gifted to Tibetan pilgrims during the age of Exodus, Charity remains barely habitable to this day. The Combine operate a large prison complex here for undesirables.
column3: An almost uninhabitable dustball that was gifted to Tibetan pilgrims during the age of Exodus, Charity remains barely habitable to this day. The Combine operate a large prison complex here for undesirables.

column2: Recently settled after the Fourth Succession War, Charleston is a small mining colony set up amongst a large mountain range.
column3: Recently settled after the Fourth Succession War, Charleston is a small mining colony set up amongst a large mountain range.

column2: Charleywood was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Charleywood was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: An arable world with bands of temperate climate across the planet. Bottles of Chateau are exported across the Lyran Commonwealth, and include some of the finest wines in the Inner Sphere.
column3: An arable world with bands of temperate climate across the planet. Bottles of Chateau are exported across the Lyran Commonwealth, and include some of the finest wines in the Inner Sphere.

column2: Chatham is home to a number of major manufacturing concerns both on the surface of the world and in orbit. Centuries of manufacturing have tainted the atmosphere, causing it to have some of the worst air in the entire Inner Sphere.
column3: Chatham is home to a number of major manufacturing concerns both on the surface of the world and in orbit. Centuries of manufacturing have tainted the atmosphere, causing it to have some of the worst air in the entire Inner Sphere.

column2: Chaumont was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Chaumont was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Chaville was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Chaville was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The Chebanse system was colonized at some point during the First Exodus from Terra, and is a dangerous and icy world. The dangers mean nothing to the brave Chebanse, who often free climb glaciers or swim in the sub arctic waters with fanged wildlife.
column3: The Chebanse system was colonized at some point during the First Exodus from Terra, and is a dangerous and icy world. The dangers mean nothing to the brave Chebanse, who often free climb glaciers or swim in the sub arctic waters with fanged wildlife.

column2: Chengdu was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Chengdu was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Colonised shortly before the Age of War, Chenier is a non-descript planet notable only for some truely anchient ruins, and a large research complex devoted to studying them.
column3: Colonised shortly before the Age of War, Chenier is a non-descript planet notable only for some truely anchient ruins, and a large research complex devoted to studying them.

column2: Chennai was little more than a communications outpost and refueling point for the Capellans, and as the Succession Wars ground on, even that role stopped being worthwhile, and the world was abandoned to pirates and other criminals.
column3: Chennai was little more than a communications outpost and refueling point for the Capellans, and as the Succession Wars ground on, even that role stopped being worthwhile, and the world was abandoned to pirates and other criminals.

column2: Overrun by Yakuza and otherwise unremarkable is probably the best way to describe Cheriton.  Then again that could be said for most Combine planets.
column3: Overrun by Yakuza and otherwise unremarkable is probably the best way to describe Cheriton. Then again that could be said for most Combine planets.

column2: Chertan is water-poor but mineral rich. It was a significant manufacturing center during the Star League Era but has declined over the last few centuries due to both a decline in interstellar trade and frequent raids from the Lyran Alliance.
column3: Chertan is water-poor but mineral rich. It was a significant manufacturing center during the Star League Era but has declined over the last few centuries due to both a decline in interstellar trade and frequent raids from the Lyran Alliance.

column2: Chesterton was the capital of one of the earliest interstellar states to form in the Inner Sphere, the Chesterton Trade League and remains an important adminstrative world even to this day.
column3: Chesterton was the capital of one of the earliest interstellar states to form in the Inner Sphere, the Chesterton Trade League and remains an important adminstrative world even to this day.

column2: Chhaprauli was colonized during the Star League era by mining concerns looking to cash in on the planet's easily accessible germanium and iridium. The mining boom ended along with the Star League and the planet has been marginal ever since.
column3: Chhaprauli was colonized during the Star League era by mining concerns looking to cash in on the planet's easily accessible germanium and iridium. The mining boom ended along with the Star League and the planet has been marginal ever since.

column2: Elements of the 211th Jump Infantry Division were stranded here for awhile after their JumpShip sprung a helium leak centuries ago, leaving valuable Star League technology on the icy surface.
column3: Elements of the 211th Jump Infantry Division were stranded here for awhile after their JumpShip sprung a helium leak centuries ago, leaving valuable Star League technology on the icy surface.

column2: Chichibu's first settlers were wiped out by a virulent strain of smallpox. Since HPG communication hadn't been invented at the time, the rescuers and medical aid for these settlers arrived too late. Since then, nothing exciting has happened here.
column3: Chichibu's first settlers were wiped out by a virulent strain of smallpox. Since HPG communication hadn't been invented at the time, the rescuers and medical aid for these settlers arrived too late. Since then, nothing exciting has happened here.

column2: Chillon was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Chillon was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The Chilung system was colonised during the First Exodus from Terra and was an independent system prior to being incorporated into the Free Worlds League at some point during the Age of War.
column3: The Chilung system was colonised during the First Exodus from Terra and was an independent system prior to being incorporated into the Free Worlds League at some point during the Age of War.

column2: Chimpaw was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Chimpaw was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Colonised at some point prior to the Reunification War, the aging structures of Chinmen Tao reflect the lack of support the world receives from the rest of the Draconis Combine. Many citizens resort to joining the DCMS in order to escape their world.
column3: Colonised at some point prior to the Reunification War, the aging structures of Chinmen Tao reflect the lack of support the world receives from the rest of the Draconis Combine. Many citizens resort to joining the DCMS in order to escape their world.

column2: An otherwise bleak world, Chirala still bears the marks of warfare from half a millenia ago when the Star League marshalled their forces upon the world before their strike against the Outworlds Alliance.
column3: An otherwise bleak world, Chirala still bears the marks of warfare from half a millenia ago when the Star League marshalled their forces upon the world before their strike against the Outworlds Alliance.

column2: Originally settled as a mining colony, Chirikof IV exported germanium to Galax well into the thirty-first century. As expansion efforts along the Taurian border grew, Chirikof became more and more important as a travel stop. Ships and crews use Chirikof as a base station during their explorations, which stimulated the Federated Suns' leadership to build space stations and permanently station military forces there.
column3: Originally settled as a mining colony, Chirikof IV exported germanium to Galax well into the thirty-first century. As expansion efforts along the Taurian border grew, Chirikof became more and more important as a travel stop. Ships and crews use Chirikof as a base station during their explorations, which stimulated the Federated Suns' leadership to build space stations and permanently station military forces there.

column2: Settled originally as Chisholm, the planet was renamed as Elgin in honour of Captain Edward Elgin who defended the world against the Free Worlds League in 2878. Most recently it became the capital of the short lived Tikonov Free Republic, whose mark many buildings still bear.
column3: Settled originally as Chisholm, the planet was renamed as Elgin in honour of Captain Edward Elgin who defended the world against the Free Worlds League in 2878. Most recently it became the capital of the short lived Tikonov Free Republic, whose mark many buildings still bear.

column2: Chita was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Chita was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Chitwan was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Chitwan was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Choex was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Choex was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: A minor and unimportant system deep in Davion space, the Cholame system was colonized at some point during the First Exodus from Terra. A Battle of Cholame, six week fight between AFSS and DCMS fleets with more than 200 warships destroyed in total on both sides, took place in 2790 at this otherwise unremarkable system.
column3: A minor and unimportant system deep in Davion space, the Cholame system was colonized at some point during the First Exodus from Terra. A Battle of Cholame, six week fight between AFSS and DCMS fleets with more than 200 warships destroyed in total on both sides, took place in 2790 at this otherwise unremarkable system.

column2: The infamous world of Chorley, known mainly for it's production of ration packs amongst Combine troops, is a bleak world that harvests fungi to fill it's nutritional needs.
column3: The infamous world of Chorley, known mainly for it's production of ration packs amongst Combine troops, is a bleak world that harvests fungi to fill it's nutritional needs.

column2: Chota was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Chota was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The Choudrant system was colonized during the First Exodus from Terra and by the end of the Age of War had been incorporated into the Federated Suns.
column3: The Choudrant system was colonized during the First Exodus from Terra and by the end of the Age of War had been incorporated into the Federated Suns.

column2: Chouli was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Chouli was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Christiania was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Christiania was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The aerospace weaponry produced on Chukchi by Maxell Metals are considered be essential to the defense of the Commonwealth, though the citizens of Chukchi III are far from pleased to be the ones supplying it. Heavy pollution from the industrial activities on the surface ensure there is a low level of discontent amongst the population at all times.
column3: The aerospace weaponry produced on Chukchi by Maxell Metals are considered be essential to the defense of the Commonwealth, though the citizens of Chukchi III are far from pleased to be the ones supplying it. Heavy pollution from the industrial activities on the surface ensure there is a low level of discontent amongst the population at all times.

column2: Chupadero in the modern day is highly loyal to the Combine, seemingly to make up for its origins as an Age of War prison colony. The locals pride themselves on being able to repair and use equipment many would have scrapped decades ago.
column3: Chupadero in the modern day is highly loyal to the Combine, seemingly to make up for its origins as an Age of War prison colony. The locals pride themselves on being able to repair and use equipment many would have scrapped decades ago.

column2: The Ciampino system was colonized during the Star League era after the end of the Reunification War. Relatively unpopulated, it's chief exports are rare fungi and spores used within the pharmaceutical industry.
column3: The Ciampino system was colonized during the Star League era after the end of the Reunification War. Relatively unpopulated, it's chief exports are rare fungi and spores used within the pharmaceutical industry.

column2: Cilvituk was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Cilvituk was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The Cimeron system was colonized during the Star League era after the end of the Reunification War.
column3: The Cimeron system was colonized during the Star League era after the end of the Reunification War.

column2: The second settlement of Ciotat, built upon the ruins of the first settlement that was destroyed in the age of war, is home to many deep boreholes built to harvest the raw materials contained within the icy permafrost. Seismic activity on the planet makes mining dangerous but also ensures a ready supply of new rich deposits.
column3: The second settlement of Ciotat, built upon the ruins of the first settlement that was destroyed in the age of war, is home to many deep boreholes built to harvest the raw materials contained within the icy permafrost. Seismic activity on the planet makes mining dangerous but also ensures a ready supply of new rich deposits.

column2: The Circe system is the location of a habitable world, Circe I, and is located in the Deep Periphery region. The Circe system consists of a G2Ia class primary orbited by four worlds
column3: The Circe system is the location of a habitable world, Circe I, and is located in the Deep Periphery region. The Circe system consists of a G2Ia class primary orbited by four worlds

column2: Circinus IV is the capital of the Circinus Federation. Has two moons named Bronco and Raxx. The Capital city is called Clayborne Remembered. C. J \"Bob\" McIntyre is name of their \"president\"
column3: Circinus IV is the capital of the Circinus Federation. Has two moons named Bronco and Raxx. The Capital city is called Clayborne Remembered. C. J "Bob" McIntyre is name of their "president"

column2: Cirebon is home to a large chemical industry that imports rare earths from Alula Australis, which feeds it's nascent aerospace and computer industries.
column3: Cirebon is home to a large chemical industry that imports rare earths from Alula Australis, which feeds it's nascent aerospace and computer industries.

column2: Claxton's industry consists of heavy industrial mines throughout it's rich crystalline fields. Smaller settlements subsist of the mining and export industries that have arisen here.
column3: Claxton's industry consists of heavy industrial mines throughout it's rich crystalline fields. Smaller settlements subsist of the mining and export industries that have arisen here.

column2: Claybrooke is a wealthy industrial and agricultural world. Ruled by a military dictatorship installed by Marik intelligence operatives, the world has become increasingly aligned with the Duchy of Andurien.
column3: Claybrooke is a wealthy industrial and agricultural world. Ruled by a military dictatorship installed by Marik intelligence operatives, the world has become increasingly aligned with the Duchy of Andurien.

column2: Named after the great praeries located upon the world, Clearfield offers mostly flat terrain ideal for pastoral farming.
column3: Named after the great praeries located upon the world, Clearfield offers mostly flat terrain ideal for pastoral farming.

column2: Colonised by the Rim Worlds Republic during the Star League era, Clermont produces substantial electronics used in heavy machinery across the Commonwealth.
column3: Colonised by the Rim Worlds Republic during the Star League era, Clermont produces substantial electronics used in heavy machinery across the Commonwealth.

column2: Settled during the early days of human colonization, Clinton is probably best known for being the home of Snord's Irregulars, and the impressive museum of historical artifacts they have amassed over the past several decades.
column3: Settled during the early days of human colonization, Clinton is probably best known for being the home of Snord's Irregulars, and the impressive museum of historical artifacts they have amassed over the past several decades.

column2: Clipperton has one of the few active manufacturing centers of Dropships and Jumpships remaining in the Inner Sphere. The colony itself largely exists to support this industry.
column3: Clipperton has one of the few active manufacturing centers of Dropships and Jumpships remaining in the Inner Sphere. The colony itself largely exists to support this industry.

column2: The Clovis system was colonized during or shortly before the Age of War and by the end of the era had been incorporated into the Federated Suns. After that planet was conquered twice during First and Third Succession Wars by Draconis Combine but was liberated by AFFS after a short period of occupation.
column3: The Clovis system was colonized during or shortly before the Age of War and by the end of the era had been incorporated into the Federated Suns. After that planet was conquered twice during First and Third Succession Wars by Draconis Combine but was liberated by AFFS after a short period of occupation.

column2: The Zhaomaon system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.
column3: The Zhaomaon system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.

column2: Cogdell is a world possessed of considerable quantities of potable water, flourishing forests and rich farmland was settlet by a group of convicts who were extorted to the world by a Periphery world. Colonists were able to survive and were absorbed by Federated Suns before Third Succession War. Capital city: Hangman's Death.
column3: Cogdell is a world possessed of considerable quantities of potable water, flourishing forests and rich farmland was settlet by a group of convicts who were extorted to the world by a Periphery world. Colonists were able to survive and were absorbed by Federated Suns before Third Succession War. Capital city: Hangman's Death.

column2: The largest industry on Cohagen during the Star League era was salt mining. The huge salt plains that cover the world were so large that they were recognizable from space. The salt plains were also incredibly flat leaving vast swathes of unbroken terrain covering the planet.
column3: The largest industry on Cohagen during the Star League era was salt mining. The huge salt plains that cover the world were so large that they were recognizable from space. The salt plains were also incredibly flat leaving vast swathes of unbroken terrain covering the planet.

column2: The northern continent of Cohay was heavily wooded and prone to raging forest fires during dry seasons. During the Star League era it was common for the Ninth Avalon Hussars, as the local garrison, to deploy to help fight the forest fires.
column3: The northern continent of Cohay was heavily wooded and prone to raging forest fires during dry seasons. During the Star League era it was common for the Ninth Avalon Hussars, as the local garrison, to deploy to help fight the forest fires.

column2: Once a shining jewel of the Federated Suns, Colchester was devastated during the First Succession War leaving lasting ecological damage.
column3: Once a shining jewel of the Federated Suns, Colchester was devastated during the First Succession War leaving lasting ecological damage.

column2: Recently settled after the Fourth Succession War, Colchis is a small agricultural colony set up amongst a water world.
column3: Recently settled after the Fourth Succession War, Colchis is a small agricultural colony set up amongst a water world.

column2: Settled as part of the Rim Worlds Republic, the world was seized by the Lyran Commonwealth in 2775. Coldbrook mainly exports machinery adapted for low temperatures to nearby worlds thanks to it's industrial base.
column3: Settled as part of the Rim Worlds Republic, the world was seized by the Lyran Commonwealth in 2775. Coldbrook mainly exports machinery adapted for low temperatures to nearby worlds thanks to it's industrial base.

column2: Cole Harbour became famous during the Reunification War as the location of the Star League Defense Force headquarters of the task force assigned to conquer the Magistry of Canopus, and was one of the locations where massive vaults of Star League equipment were found, contributing to the richness of the planet.
column3: Cole Harbour became famous during the Reunification War as the location of the Star League Defense Force headquarters of the task force assigned to conquer the Magistry of Canopus, and was one of the locations where massive vaults of Star League equipment were found, contributing to the richness of the planet.

column2: One of the major trading ports between the Lyran Commonwealth and the Free Worlds League, Colfax is a cosmopolitan metropolis.
column3: One of the major trading ports between the Lyran Commonwealth and the Free Worlds League, Colfax is a cosmopolitan metropolis.

column2: Colia is a breadbasket world that has been settled since the time of the First Exodus. Although invaded during the First Succession War, it avoided the devastation that came with most conquests at that time.
column3: Colia is a breadbasket world that has been settled since the time of the First Exodus. Although invaded during the First Succession War, it avoided the devastation that came with most conquests at that time.

column2: Colinas is a praerie like world that has been settled since the time of the First Exodus. Agricultural exports are it's main source of economy.
column3: Colinas is a praerie like world that has been settled since the time of the First Exodus. Agricultural exports are it's main source of economy.

column2: This system is uninhabited, but contains two fairly promising worlds for colonization.
column3: This system is uninhabited, but contains two fairly promising worlds for colonization.

column2: A, hot, dry world which is nearly uninhabitable near the equator, Colmar's only reason for existing as a colony is its impressive quantities of mineral and chemical resources, buried under its silicate crust.
column3: A, hot, dry world which is nearly uninhabitable near the equator, Colmar's only reason for existing as a colony is its impressive quantities of mineral and chemical resources, buried under its silicate crust.

column2: Coloma is a dry world that has been settled since the time of the First Exodus. Although invaded during the First Succession War by the Draconic Combine, it's civilian populace rose up against the invaders and assisted in the liberation of their world.
column3: Coloma is a dry world that has been settled since the time of the First Exodus. Although invaded during the First Succession War by the Draconic Combine, it's civilian populace rose up against the invaders and assisted in the liberation of their world.

column2: Colorado was historically the world with the richest germanium deposits in the entire of the Federated Suns. This led to extensive strip mining that slowly transformed the planet into an ecological disaster. Novadays deposits are becoming more and more sarce.
column3: Colorado was historically the world with the richest germanium deposits in the entire of the Federated Suns. This led to extensive strip mining that slowly transformed the planet into an ecological disaster. Novadays deposits are becoming more and more sarce.

column2: Columbine is a desert mining world, dominated by equatorial rocky deserts and dry-weather grasslands in the temperate zone. Valuable deposits of rare earth elements and fissile materials make the inhospitable world a viable colony.
column3: Columbine is a desert mining world, dominated by equatorial rocky deserts and dry-weather grasslands in the temperate zone. Valuable deposits of rare earth elements and fissile materials make the inhospitable world a viable colony.

column2: Mining operations in this unimaginatively-named system are coordinated from Gulf Breeze Station in the asteroid belt, but a ground colony does exist on the fifth planet. LosTech prospectors can sometimes be found here, excavating centuries-old ruins.
column3: Mining operations in this unimaginatively-named system are coordinated from Gulf Breeze Station in the asteroid belt, but a ground colony does exist on the fifth planet. LosTech prospectors can sometimes be found here, excavating centuries-old ruins.

column2: Conakry's colonization in 2614 was made possible by advances in terraforming technology, the effects of which have mostly stuck despite the Star League's fall. The locals claim to have the best jollof rice in the Inner Sphere.
column3: Conakry's colonization in 2614 was made possible by advances in terraforming technology, the effects of which have mostly stuck despite the Star League's fall. The locals claim to have the best jollof rice in the Inner Sphere.

column2: Despite initial Lyran influence during the First Succession War, Concord has been a staple of the Free Worlds League for centuries, supplying nearby worlds with much needed medical and agricultural supplies.
column3: Despite initial Lyran influence during the First Succession War, Concord has been a staple of the Free Worlds League for centuries, supplying nearby worlds with much needed medical and agricultural supplies.

column2: Conley's Patch was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Conley's Patch was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Previously the home of the 17th Star League Defense Fleet, the orbital drydocks and shipyard remain... but in a state of disrepair.  While a prime candidate for a refurbished Star League shipyard, the ruins remain untouched and thick with rust.
column3: Previously the home of the 17th Star League Defense Fleet, the orbital drydocks and shipyard remain... but in a state of disrepair. While a prime candidate for a refurbished Star League shipyard, the ruins remain untouched and thick with rust.

column2: Initially colonised and part of the Capellan Confederation for centuries whilst maintaining good trade links with nearby worlds, during the Third Succession War the planet overthrew it's government and joined the Free Worlds League.
column3: Initially colonised and part of the Capellan Confederation for centuries whilst maintaining good trade links with nearby worlds, during the Third Succession War the planet overthrew it's government and joined the Free Worlds League.

column2: Most of Conroe is covered by glaciers and ice flats, with civilization existing in the taigas near the equator or pockets of geothermal warmth. It hosts frequent military training maneuvers.
column3: Most of Conroe is covered by glaciers and ice flats, with civilization existing in the taigas near the equator or pockets of geothermal warmth. It hosts frequent military training maneuvers.

column2: Constance was colonised towards the end of the Reunification War, and maintained a Star League garrison until the final days of the Star League. It's industrial base mainly consists of automotive and mining equipment manufacturers.
column3: Constance was colonised towards the end of the Reunification War, and maintained a Star League garrison until the final days of the Star League. It's industrial base mainly consists of automotive and mining equipment manufacturers.

column2: Conwy was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Conwy was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Cooperland was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Cooperland was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Coopertown was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Coopertown was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The Coraines system was either colonised by the Outworlds Alliance during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War
column3: The Coraines system was either colonised by the Outworlds Alliance during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War
