column2: Corbeanca is often described as a tax haven, due to it's lax administrative control and rumours of knock backs. Tourism remains high though, with vast resorts located on it's many shores.
column3: Corbeanca is often described as a tax haven, due to it's lax administrative control and rumours of knock backs. Tourism remains high though, with vast resorts located on it's many shores.

column2: Cor Caroli is a mineral rich world featuring an even more mineral rich asteroid belt in close orbit. Despite the constant presence of a Lyran 'Mech Regiment on the planet, constant raids have degraded the planets mining capability significantly.
column3: Cor Caroli is a mineral rich world featuring an even more mineral rich asteroid belt in close orbit. Despite the constant presence of a Lyran 'Mech Regiment on the planet, constant raids have degraded the planets mining capability significantly.

column2: Founded and named after the Corwin Diverse Agricultural Group, a 22nd-century corporation (now long defunct), Cordiagr has been a bountiful breadbasket for Capella and other nearby worlds for eight centuries.
column3: Founded and named after the Corwin Diverse Agricultural Group, a 22nd-century corporation (now long defunct), Cordiagr has been a bountiful breadbasket for Capella and other nearby worlds for eight centuries.

column2: An often contested world by the Umayyad Caliphate over the centuries, Nueva Castile reclaimed Córdoba after capturing BattleMech technology in 2850.
column3: An often contested world by the Umayyad Caliphate over the centuries, Nueva Castile reclaimed Córdoba after capturing BattleMech technology in 2850.

column2: The Corella system was colonized during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the St. Ives Mercantile League prior to the formation of the Capellan Confederation in the mid-twenty-fourth century becoming a breadbasket world and a trading hub for the region.
column3: The Corella system was colonized during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the St. Ives Mercantile League prior to the formation of the Capellan Confederation in the mid-twenty-fourth century becoming a breadbasket world and a trading hub for the region.

column2: Home to defense contractor Hollis Industries, Corey is a heavily industrialised world which has been the target of substantial attacks in previous Succession Wars. An industrial recovery is underway, whilst the threat of warfare ensures that the world is heavily defended.
column3: Home to defense contractor Hollis Industries, Corey is a heavily industrialised world which has been the target of substantial attacks in previous Succession Wars. An industrial recovery is underway, whilst the threat of warfare ensures that the world is heavily defended.

column2: Corfu was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Corfu was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The gem caves of Coriscana are a wonder that brings rich tourism to the world, which is otherwise unremarkable. A black market in rare crystals has emerged in recent years.
column3: The gem caves of Coriscana are a wonder that brings rich tourism to the world, which is otherwise unremarkable. A black market in rare crystals has emerged in recent years.

column2: The Star League's plan to terraform Cork to fully habitable status was meant to take about 300 years. The destruction of the Succession Wars ensured Cork would revert to its desolate state. Only dusty artifacts remain.
column3: The Star League's plan to terraform Cork to fully habitable status was meant to take about 300 years. The destruction of the Succession Wars ensured Cork would revert to its desolate state. Only dusty artifacts remain.

column2: Initially settled by the Taurian Concordat, Corodiz was conquered centuries ago by the Capellans in a particularly brutal campaign which included civilian massacres and torture. Its position as a crossroads between three powerful states makes it politically unstable.
column3: Initially settled by the Taurian Concordat, Corodiz was conquered centuries ago by the Capellans in a particularly brutal campaign which included civilian massacres and torture. Its position as a crossroads between three powerful states makes it politically unstable.

column2: Coromodir is the center of power of the Aurigan government. Two habitable worlds house nearly three billion people, and at the heart of Coromodir 6 is the vast Taurian fortress that serves as both capital and last bastion of defense. Both House Arano and House Espinosa consider Coromodir their ancestral home.
column3: Коромодир - центр власти правительства Ауригана. В двух обитаемых мирах проживает почти три миллиарда человек, а в центре Коромодира 6 находится огромная Таурианская крепость, которая служит как столицей, так и последним бастионом обороны. И Дом Арано, и Дом Эспиноза считают Коромодир своим родовым домом.

column2: Corridan IV was a keenly-sought colony world, with an ecosystem that was perfect for humans and their crops, with one small exception - The water supply was filled with lethal levels of heavy metals and a bacteria that would make every living plant or animal on the world toxic to humans. Eventually new water filtration technology was discovered that turned Corridan into a rich world. It's main exports are still from Water Pure Industries.
column3: Corridan IV was a keenly-sought colony world, with an ecosystem that was perfect for humans and their crops, with one small exception - The water supply was filled with lethal levels of heavy metals and a bacteria that would make every living plant or animal on the world toxic to humans. Eventually new water filtration technology was discovered that turned Corridan into a rich world. It's main exports are still from Water Pure Industries.

column2: Corsica Nueva is unremarkable, except that it is home to a vast asteroid belt, with a Star League era asteroid base named Mizutoshi which is under the control of the Seimeiyoshi-rengo, the Draconis Combine's federation of gangs which operates a thriving black market.
column3: Corsica Nueva is unremarkable, except that it is home to a vast asteroid belt, with a Star League era asteroid base named Mizutoshi which is under the control of the Seimeiyoshi-rengo, the Draconis Combine's federation of gangs which operates a thriving black market.

column2: The Corydon system was colonized during the First Exodus from Terra and had been incorporated into the Federated Suns by the end of the Age of War. Captured by DCMS in 2789, it was liberated again by AFFS in 2806 during first major counter-offensive against the Draconis Combine in First Succession War.
column3: The Corydon system was colonized during the First Exodus from Terra and had been incorporated into the Federated Suns by the end of the Age of War. Captured by DCMS in 2789, it was liberated again by AFFS in 2806 during first major counter-offensive against the Draconis Combine in First Succession War.

column2: Cosenza is known mainly for it's beautiful planetary rings, that are visible at all times during the day on it's otherwise inhospitable surface.
column3: Cosenza is known mainly for it's beautiful planetary rings, that are visible at all times during the day on it's otherwise inhospitable surface.

column2: The Cotocallao system was settled at some point during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was an independent system within the Capellan Zone prior to the formation of the Capellan Confederation in the mid-twenty-fourth century and conquered by AFFS in 2864.
column3: The Cotocallao system was settled at some point during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was an independent system within the Capellan Zone prior to the formation of the Capellan Confederation in the mid-twenty-fourth century and conquered by AFFS in 2864.

column2: Coudoux was home to a Star League Defence Garrison during the last days of the Star League, which makes the world a prime target for treasure hunters.

column2: The Cosenza system was at some point during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was an independent system within the Capellan Zone prior to the formation of the Capellan Confederation in the mid-twenty-fourth century. Was conquered by Federated Suns during Second Succession war.
column3: The Cosenza system was at some point during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was an independent system within the Capellan Zone prior to the formation of the Capellan Confederation in the mid-twenty-fourth century. column3: The Covington system was colonized during the First Exodus from Terra and was a founding member of the Crucis Pact.

column3: The vast jungles of Crellacor are home to savage alien hunters and other primitive beings. It's great jungles are also known as "Fortress Green" thanks to the defensive possibilities they offer.

column2: Crestoblus was founded during the age of war, and was one of the worlds conquered by the Federated Suns during the War of Reunification. It escaped damage for the most part and has remained a solid member of the Outworlds Alliance for centuries.

column2: The Vaj system, better known by it's main planets name of Crevedia, is located within the Donegal province.
column3: The Vaj system, better known by it's main planets name of Crevedia, is located within the Donegal province.

column2: Crimond was discovered as the result of a misjump by the Gak's Revenge, a JumpShip. The team found a world filled with rare gemstones, minerals and ores but with a toxic soil. Never the less, over centuries the population of Crimond has become wealthy and rival any within the Commonwealth.
column3: Crimond was discovered as the result of a misjump by the Gak's Revenge, a JumpShip. The team found a world filled with rare gemstones, minerals and ores but with a toxic soil. Never the less, over centuries the population of Crimond has become wealthy and rival any within the Commonwealth.

column2: Home to major manufacturers and a Star League era megaplant owned by StarCorps Industries, Crofton supplies the AFFS with a large portion of their materiel.
column3: Home to major manufacturers and a Star League era megaplant owned by StarCorps Industries, Crofton supplies the AFFS with a large portion of their materiel.

column2: Cronulla was colonised during the first exodus from Terra, and joined the short lived Sian Commonwealth prior to the formation of the Capellan Confederation.

column2: The Crossing system was colonized during or shortly before the Age of War and was a planet suitable for agriculture but poor on minerals. Planet border position in Draconis March is a cause of heavy military traffic in the system.

column2: Csesztreg was settled for its vast expanses of heavy metals. These metals were a key component of industry, but it wasn't until the Jamerson-Ulikov water purification technique was perfected that this world could be safely inhabited.
column3: Csesztreg was settled for its vast expanses of heavy metals. These metals were a key component of industry, but it wasn't until the Jamerson-Ulikov water purification technique was perfected that this world could be safely inhabited.

column3: Csomad was colonised after the Age of War, and was briefly a member of the Taurian Concordat prior to the reunification war. Mostly self sufficient, the world spends most of it's resources on imported food.

column2: Ctesiphon was the site of a surface trading post located close to the jump point in the Deep Periphery, though little more is known about it.
column3: Ctesiphon was the site of a surface trading post located close to the jump point in the Deep Periphery, though little more is known about it.

column2: Culmia was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Settled after the Reunification War by the widows of those lost during said war, Cumberland still maintains it's matriarchal traditions. The societal tenets of Cumberland are designed in a way that children inherit their mother's surname.
column3: Settled after the Reunification War by the widows of those lost during said war, Cumberland still maintains it's matriarchal traditions. The societal tenets of Cumberland are designed in a way that children inherit their mother's surname.

column2: The Cumbres system was colonized during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the Protectorate of Donegal, prior to the formation of the Lyran Commonwealth in the mid-twenty-fourth century.
column3: The Cumbres system was colonized during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the Protectorate of Donegal, prior to the formation of the Lyran Commonwealth in the mid-twenty-fourth century.

column2: Curaumilla is home to numerous ice wine vineyards, which are exported across the Free Worlds League.
column3: Curaumilla is home to numerous ice wine vineyards, which are exported across the Free Worlds League.

column2: Cursa had long been abandoned as too marginal a colony to sustain, but played a role in the war between ComStar and the Free Worlds League. The world was used as bait for a trap, chosen because of its lack of strategic value.
column3: Cursa had long been abandoned as too marginal a colony to sustain, but played a role in the war between ComStar and the Free Worlds League. The world was used as bait for a trap, chosen because of its lack of strategic value.

column2: Once named Cussar, the world was renamed Barlow's Folly after a band of insurgents sabotaged DCMS forces for decades during the First Succession War and was then lampooned when finally defeated.
column3: Once named Cussar, the world was renamed Barlow's Folly after a band of insurgents sabotaged DCMS forces for decades during the First Succession War and was then lampooned when finally defeated.

column2: Alien bacteria and vegetation on Cusset has made settlement difficult here, but pharmaceutical companies continue to pour money into research and development here.
column3: Alien bacteria and vegetation on Cusset has made settlement difficult here, but pharmaceutical companies continue to pour money into research and development here.

column2: Custozza was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Custozza was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Cygnus has a distinctive feature: a flower dubbed the 'tundra witch', whose pollen has hallucinogenic properties. As a consequence the local megafauna - a kind of native caribou - is prone to massive stampedes in springtime.
column3: Cygnus has a distinctive feature: a flower dubbed the 'tundra witch', whose pollen has hallucinogenic properties. As a consequence the local megafauna - a kind of native caribou - is prone to massive stampedes in springtime.

column2: Colonised centuries ago for it's rich mineral deposits, the planet was devastated during the Succession Wars which has caused severe climate changes. The population has diminished rapidly as the ice age advances.
column3: Colonised centuries ago for it's rich mineral deposits, the planet was devastated during the Succession Wars which has caused severe climate changes. The population has diminished rapidly as the ice age advances.

column2: Liao, named after the Capellan namesake, has served as a capital for many years until it's devastation during the Succession Wars reduced it to a backwater. It still maintains it's importance to the Capellan Confederation however.
column3: Liao, named after the Capellan namesake, has served as a capital for many years until it's devastation during the Succession Wars reduced it to a backwater. It still maintains it's importance to the Capellan Confederation however.

column2: Cyrenaica is home to numerous native truffle farms, which are exported across the Draconis Combine.
column3: Cyrenaica is home to numerous native truffle farms, which are exported across the Draconis Combine.

column2: Cyrton is known for being lawless, and a thriving pharmaceutical trade.
column3: Cyrton is known for being lawless, and a thriving pharmaceutical trade.

column2: Czarvowo is known for it's kilometers of mudflats and it's mudskiff racing.
column3: Czarvowo is known for it's kilometers of mudflats and it's mudskiff racing.

column2: Dabih was originally settled sometime during the twenty-fifth century by Muslim colonists. After ekeing out a hard existence, technological progress allowed resource extraction of the petroleum under the surface, which increased quality of life for all.
column3: Dabih was originally settled sometime during the twenty-fifth century by Muslim colonists. After ekeing out a hard existence, technological progress allowed resource extraction of the petroleum under the surface, which increased quality of life for all.

column2: The Dagda system consists of an F9V class primary named \"Tuath\" orbited by eight worlds.
column3: The Dagda system consists of an F9V class primary named "Tuath" orbited by eight worlds.

column3: Dagda (LC) was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Despite the harsh climate on Dahar IV, the plentiful deposits of ores and minerals attracted colonists to the planet. Local engineers create some of the most advanced mining equipment found anywhere in the Inner Sphere, equipment which is then licensed to other worlds.
column3: Despite the harsh climate on Dahar IV, the plentiful deposits of ores and minerals attracted colonists to the planet. Local engineers create some of the most advanced mining equipment found anywhere in the Inner Sphere, equipment which is then licensed to other worlds.

column2: This frozen world is made habitable by the constant geothermal activity that convulses its surface. This also makes it a source of highly valuable radioactive ores, and the Magistracy keeps a garrison on the planet to protect its interests there.
column3: This frozen world is made habitable by the constant geothermal activity that convulses its surface. This also makes it a source of highly valuable radioactive ores, and the Magistracy keeps a garrison on the planet to protect its interests there.

column2: Settled after the Reunification War, Dalcour served as the headquarters of the XII Corps until the final days of the Star League. Caches are rumoured to be hidden amongst the icy hills.
column3: Settled after the Reunification War, Dalcour served as the headquarters of the XII Corps until the final days of the Star League. Caches are rumoured to be hidden amongst the icy hills.

column2: Dalian was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Dalian was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: During the Star League era, Dalkeith was home to billions. The First Succession war devastated the planet, killing billions and leaving the atmosphere still polluted today.
column3: During the Star League era, Dalkeith was home to billions. The First Succession war devastated the planet, killing billions and leaving the atmosphere still polluted today.

column2: Dalmantia was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Dalmantia was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Dalton is a water rich planet with stormy weather, and a merit based government allowing excellence in every craft.
column3: Dalton is a water rich planet with stormy weather, and a merit based government allowing excellence in every craft.

column2: Damevang was the site of numerous battles during the First Succession War, though only limited nuclear weapons were deployed.
column3: Damevang was the site of numerous battles during the First Succession War, though only limited nuclear weapons were deployed.

column2: Damian was one host to a Star League Defence Garrison, which has led numerous historians and treasure seekers to the planet to search for caches. None have been found however.
column3: Damian was one host to a Star League Defence Garrison, which has led numerous historians and treasure seekers to the planet to search for caches. None have been found however.

column2: The thick forests of Danais allow for a thriving lumber industry upon the world.
column3: The thick forests of Danais allow for a thriving lumber industry upon the world.

column2: Deneshmand is home to numerous agricompounds that utilise Inner Sphere technology to boost their yields.
column3: Deneshmand is home to numerous agricompounds that utilise Inner Sphere technology to boost their yields.

column2: Ninety percent of the population of Dania lives an agricultural lifestyle maintained by technology of an equivalent to that found on Terra in the late eighteenth  century, a consequence of the heavy influence of the Omniss philosophy within the New Delphi Compact.
column3: Ninety percent of the population of Dania lives an agricultural lifestyle maintained by technology of an equivalent to that found on Terra in the late eighteenth century, a consequence of the heavy influence of the Omniss philosophy within the New Delphi Compact.

column2: Daniels is home to numerous pharmaceutical companies that harvest the psycadelic hallucinagenic fauna found on the surface.

column3: Dansur was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Dante is the center of the Omniss movement that rejects all non-essential technologies. Communications are sporadic with the system however, and ship traffic suggests more population than what is officially reported.
column3: Dante is the center of the Omniss movement that rejects all non-essential technologies. Communications are sporadic with the system however, and ship traffic suggests more population than what is officially reported.

column2: Danxian is a relatively unimportant industrial base, though it's lax trading laws means certain goods may be easier to acquire.
column3: Danxian is a relatively unimportant industrial base, though it's lax trading laws means certain goods may be easier to acquire.

column2: Danzig is one of the worlds that form a part of the Deep Periphery nation known as the Hanseatic League, exporting goods to other Hanseatic worlds.
column3: Danzig is one of the worlds that form a part of the Deep Periphery nation known as the Hanseatic League, exporting goods to other Hanseatic worlds.

column2: Orbital bombardment of Daol during the First Succession War destroyed its climate in a planet-wide firestorm. The ejecta from the mass driver strikes formed a dangerous field of debris in orbit.
column3: Orbital bombardment of Daol during the First Succession War destroyed its climate in a planet-wide firestorm. The ejecta from the mass driver strikes formed a dangerous field of debris in orbit.

column2: Dar-es-Salaam is the center of the Muslim faith within the Lyran Commonwealth.
column3: Dar-es-Salaam is the center of the Muslim faith within the Lyran Commonwealth.

column2: Darius produces mid tech boats and yachts for export to nearby worlds.
column3: Darius produces mid tech boats and yachts for export to nearby worlds.

column2: Darwendale is known for it's thriving psuedo-synthethic clothing ranges, which it exports to nearby worlds.
column3: Darwendale is known for it's thriving psuedo-synthethic clothing ranges, which it exports to nearby worlds.

column2: Recently settled after the Fourth Succession War, Davetal is a small trading post colony set up upon a lunar outpost.

column2: The water on David is infected with a microbe that causes severe allergic reactions. Due to this, David does not export any goods but is self sufficient with light industry.
column3: The water on David is infected with a microbe that causes severe allergic reactions. Due to this, David does not export any goods but is self sufficient with light industry.

column2: Davisville was founded by a deserting Varnayist regimental commander 500 years ago. The locals export lumber and eke out a subsistence existence here, as the mineral-poor world supports little else.
column3: Davisville was founded by a deserting Varnayist regimental commander 500 years ago. The locals export lumber and eke out a subsistence existence here, as the mineral-poor world supports little else.

column2: Filled with dangerous sinkholes, Dawn is a lightly populated center known for it's administration and bureaucracy.
column3: Filled with dangerous sinkholes, Dawn is a lightly populated center known for it's administration and bureaucracy.

column2: Home to Metamorphosis Inc, Dayr Khuna is known for it's biomedical industries and biotechnology.
column3: Home to Metamorphosis Inc, Dayr Khuna is known for it's biomedical industries and biotechnology.

column2: Ddraig was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Ddraig was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: The Death's Gaze Cluster is a star cluster in the Deep Periphery, which gets it's name from it's appearance as a 4 lightyear spanning 'eye' that floats in the void.
column3: The Death's Gaze Cluster is a star cluster in the Deep Periphery, which gets it's name from it's appearance as a 4 lightyear spanning 'eye' that floats in the void.

column2: De Berry uses the heavy silicon found within it's soils to produce solar technology for export to nearby worlds.
column3: De Berry uses the heavy silicon found within it's soils to produce solar technology for export to nearby worlds.

column2: This fog-shrouded water planet is the site of one of the Capellan Confederation's Regional Training Centers, where new CCAF recruits are trained in amphibious assaults and combined-arms tactics.
column3: This fog-shrouded water planet is the site of one of the Capellan Confederation's Regional Training Centers, where new CCAF recruits are trained in amphibious assaults and combined-arms tactics.

column2: Declan was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Declan was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: They say it always rains on Decus. The mudflats turn into vast mudpits which cause tracked vehicles to become bogged down or even lost within their muddy depths.
column3: They say it always rains on Decus. The mudflats turn into vast mudpits which cause tracked vehicles to become bogged down or even lost within their muddy depths.

column2: Defiance was originally settled as a mining colony. Defiance has four major continents named Auglaize, Cuyahoga, Maumee and Sandusky. Jerseyville: the planetary capital city, located on Maumee. Tainted atmosphere, please use masks.
column3: Defiance was originally settled as a mining colony. Defiance has four major continents named Auglaize, Cuyahoga, Maumee and Sandusky. Jerseyville: the planetary capital city, located on Maumee. Tainted atmosphere, please use masks.

column2: Those who have heard of Dehgolan will often only know it for it's fever-ridden swamps, though it's therapeutic mud baths are meant to be some of the best in the Inner Sphere.
column3: Those who have heard of Dehgolan will often only know it for it's fever-ridden swamps, though it's therapeutic mud baths are meant to be some of the best in the Inner Sphere.

column2: Settled by Deists, the colonists intentially keep their birthrates low as not to spoil the beauty of their world.
column3: Settled by Deists, the colonists intentially keep their birthrates low as not to spoil the beauty of their world.

column2: Delacambre is a rich agricultural world that supports several near planets with it's vast exports.
column3: Delacambre is a rich agricultural world that supports several near planets with it's vast exports.

column2: Demeter was one of the first worlds to become self sufficient after the Exodus, and was invested in heavily during the Star League. Lycom-Davion IntroTech have a large aerotech manufacturing complex here.
column3: Demeter was one of the first worlds to become self sufficient after the Exodus, and was invested in heavily during the Star League. Lycom-Davion IntroTech have a large aerotech manufacturing complex here.

column2: Denbar is unique in that it lacked a permanent settlement for most of its history. Though claimed by the Capellan Confederation, no effort was made to colonize it until recently after the remains of a Star League expedition were found on the planet.

column2: An arid world filled with dangerous wildlife such as the Nayaraptor. Tourism for those aristocrats with the money to hunt the beasts is a growing trend.
column3: An arid world filled with dangerous wildlife such as the Nayaraptor. Tourism for those aristocrats with the money to hunt the beasts is a growing trend.

column2: Deneb Kaitos was once populated by billions, until the Amaris Civil War where the world was devastated by nuclear weapons. Even now the world still imports food to counteract the ecological devastation.
column3: Deneb Kaitos was once populated by billions, until the Amaris Civil War where the world was devastated by nuclear weapons. Even now the world still imports food to counteract the ecological devastation.

column2: Denebola is a cold world and dependent on trade with other worlds for food. Due to its location, Denebola has traded hands many times over the Succession Wars, including a brief occupation by FWL mercenaries only a decade ago.
column3: Денебола - холодный мир, зависящий от торговли продуктами питания с другими мирами. Из-за своего местоположения Денебола часто переходила из рук в руки во время Войн за Наследие, включая кратковременную оккупацию наемниками Лиги независимых миров десять лет назад.

column2: Only a small portion of the land on Denizli is suitable for agriculture, limiting farming but ensuring that vast fishing industries exist.

column3: Derby was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Vickers Mining own most of the mines of Derf, extracting vital rare materials for export to other worlds.

column3: All lakes and seas on Ebensburg are covered with a thick layer of algae. Some simple animal species feed on the algae, and their habitat is limited to within a few miles of the coast.

column2: A very rural world with little resources, the population of Ebro has little contact with the rest of the galaxy.
column3: A very rural world with little resources, the population of Ebro has little contact with the rest of the galaxy.

column2:
Death is like the insect 
Menacing the tree, 
Competent to kill it, 
But decoyed may be. 

Bait it with the balsam, 
Seek it with the saw, 
Baffle, if it cost you 
Everything you are. 

Then, if it have burrowed 
Out of reach of skill, 
Wring the tree and leave it, 
'Tis the vermin's will.' 

- Emily Dickinson, ancient Terran poet
column3:

column2:
High from the void above, 
Entropy shall claim all, 

Inside our quiet reflections,
Serenity rules. 

Call upon the loyal and, 
Out we rage against the void. 
May the truthful word rise, 
Infinite and immovable. 
None stand before us, 
Greatness will prevail.' 

- Last broadcast from DropShip Arlund's Pike II prior to loss of contact

column2: WARNING: Travel advisory is in effect. This system is occupied by extremely hostile and well-armed pirate elements that have refused peaceful contact and will engage passerby with lethal force. Captains are advised to plot routes around this system under any circumstances.

column2: The greatest gift the common people can have is a heart too large to falter and a mind to small to regret.' - Unknown
column3: The greatest gift the common people can have is a heart too large to falter and a mind to small to regret.' - Unknown

column2: Core sampling from the Southern polar surface revealed fragments of manufactured alloys. We must note that there is no record of the world ever being settled, nor any orbital conflicts that would have scattered debris onto the surface. The samples were also found to be microscopic in size and prevalent in the planetary crust, a characteristic more in line with the outcomes of manufacturing pollution than debris fall. We strongly urge an in-depth survey of the world prior to any colonisation efforts.'\r\n\r\n- Preliminary survey report, unsealed by orders of General Vilma Alekto
column3: Core sampling from the Southern polar surface revealed fragments of manufactured alloys. We must note that there is no record of the world ever being settled, nor any orbital conflicts that would have scattered debris onto the surface. The samples were also found to be microscopic in size and prevalent in the planetary crust, a characteristic more in line with the outcomes of manufacturing pollution than debris fall. We strongly urge an in-depth survey of the world prior to any colonisation efforts.'\r\n\r\n- Preliminary survey report, unsealed by orders of General Vilma Alekto

column2:
When this blazing sun is gone, 
When he nothing shines upon, 
Then you show your little light, 
Twinkle, twinkle, through the night. 

Then the traveller in the dark 
Thanks you for your tiny spark; 
He could not see where to go, 
If you did not twinkle so.' 

 - Ancient traveler's prayer
column3:

column2: Primitives residing in their conclaves on the plains fear to venture into the Old Canyons. On the eve each twin moonrise, the conclave elders retell their story of The Lashing, or their exile from those canyons. The details and precise wording have changed over time. Even the title differs from kinship to kinship, be it 'Worza's Lament', 'The Dawn of Knives', or 'Downfall'. No matter the small details of this fable, its central theme has never faltered: retribution.
column3: Primitives residing in their conclaves on the plains fear to venture into the Old Canyons. Even the title differs from kinship to kinship, be it 'Worza's Lament', 'The Dawn of Knives', or 'Downfall'. No matter the small details of this fable, its central theme has never faltered: retribution.

column2: ' \r\n\r\n- Fragmented, intercepted transmission, unknown source. Filed as evidence in Case 5579-124b, House Liao v. Tsang

column2: The role of the explorer is not simply the charting of unknown territories, for that is aimless wandering with extra expense. The great explorer ventures out in the interests of something bolder and larger themselves: country, unity and family. Our expedition is not in pursuit of petty glory, for we fly the colours of House Davion and we will only depart once those colours are nailed firmly to the mast, with our eyes on an endless horizon. Only then, we will do our duty, for country and countrymen.'\r\n\r\n - Proceedings from the 827th Expeditionary Planning Board, House Davion
column3: The role of the explorer is not simply the charting of unknown territories, for that is aimless wandering with extra expense. The great explorer ventures out in the interests of something bolder and larger themselves: country, unity and family. Our expedition is not in pursuit of petty glory, for we fly the colours of House Davion and we will only depart once those colours are nailed firmly to the mast, with our eyes on an endless horizon. Only then, we will do our duty, for country and countrymen.'\r\n\r\n - Proceedings from the 827th Expeditionary Planning Board, House Davion

column2: Epsilon Eridani is a pleasant but damp world, prone to frequent mild rainstorms. It primarily exports food, though it also has significant chemical and heavy industrial manufacturing.
column3: Эпсилон Эридани - приятный, но влажный мир, подверженный частым умеренным ливням. Основной экспорт - продукты питания. На поверхности также имеется большое количество предприятий химической и тяжелой промышленности.

column2: Epsilon Indi is a hot, dry world rich in heavy metals. It once boasted a Star League SDS of military drone sattelites capable of destroying incoming drop ships, but the SDS has been lost as pieces were destroyed and repair parts could not be sourced.

column2: Settled in the 2600s by expatriates from the Lyran Commonwealth, Fredotto fell into anarchy after the Amaris Civil War when it's economy collapsed. It's few remaining settlers are mostly agrarian, with any industry being used in the export of high quality infantry weapons to neighbouring worlds.

column2: Once a glorious world in the Rim Worlds Republic, the colony was devastated during the Amaris Civil War and remains stuck in a nuclear winter. Now the scant population remaining either herds local reindeer or supports nearby pirate activities.

column2: Graham once supported significant military manufacturing capabilities. Unfortunately, this made the planet a target for WMD attacks during the 1st Succession War. With the atmosphere tainted, most inhabitants have left over the centuries.

column2: Ingress was one of the first worlds settled during the Terran Exodus. Its rich soil soon allowed the inhabitants to grow a great deal of food, far more than they needed. These crops remain the foundation of Ingress' economy, but the planet does have some light industry as well, making it totally self-sufficient.

column2: The oldest inhabited system in the modern Chainelane Isles, Ingvolstand was once home to numerous huge manufacturing complexes which were destroyed during the Amaris Civil War. Designed for children, it has nevertheless gained a strong foothold amongst the older aristocracy.
column3: A core world of the Outworlds Alliance, it escaped most notice during Operation UNION HOLD. It's primary export is of a tabletop wargame where each player controls numerous BattleMechs in battles against each other. Designed for children, it has nevertheless gained a strong foothold amongst the older aristocracy.

column2: The Jordian Cluster is a collection of stars within close proxity to each other.

column2: Junction once held sway over several smaller worlds in the region centuries ago, before willingly joining the Draconis Combine for protection. Its importance has waned, but it still serves as a military depot and logistical hub.
column3: Junction once held sway over several smaller worlds in the region centuries ago, before willingly joining the Draconis Combine for protection. Its importance has waned, but it still serves as a military depot and logistical hub.

column2: Michaelson Heavy Industries utilises the raw materials from the numerous mines to create components for VTOL, as well as having a secondary line for armour threading.
column3: Michaelson Heavy Industries utilises the raw materials from the numerous mines to create components for VTOL, as well as having a secondary line for armour threading.

column2: Jungar Qi was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Jungar Qi was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Settled during the golden age of the Star League, the rich ore fields of Junior allow for large exports of minerals to nearby worlds.
column3: Settled during the golden age of the Star League, the rich ore fields of Junior allow for large exports of minerals to nearby worlds.

column2: Juniper was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Juniper was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: When Kabah was first settled, there was a terrible hemorrhagic fever that scythed through the colony. The population slowly developed a resistance to it over the centuries.
column3: When Kabah was first settled, there was a terrible hemorrhagic fever that scythed through the colony. The population slowly developed a resistance to it over the centuries.

column2: After suffering an attack from the Daemien's Destroyers mercenary unit during the First Succession War, the government is reluctant to hire mercenaries.
column3: After suffering an attack from the Daemien's Destroyers mercenary unit during the First Succession War, the government is reluctant to hire mercenaries.

column2: Settled during the Star League era, the vast jade deposits under the surface are heavily mined.
column3: Settled during the Star League era, the vast jade deposits under the surface are heavily mined.

column2: During the final years of the Star League, Kagoshima was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison. It is the capital of the local prefecture.
column3: During the final years of the Star League, Kagoshima was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison. It is the capital of the local prefecture.

column2: The Kaguyak system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War.
column3: The Kaguyak system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War.

column2: Kaifeng is an agricultural world that exports its food surplus to feed a number nearby worlds, especially Sarna and Sakhalin.
column3: Kaifeng is an agricultural world that exports its food surplus to feed a number nearby worlds, especially Sarna and Sakhalin.

column2: Kaitangata is an impoverished system, with little in the way of mineral wealth or resources.
column3: Kaitangata is an impoverished system, with little in the way of mineral wealth or resources.

column2: The Kaiyuh system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the United Hindu Collective prior to the Collective joining the Federated Suns.
column3: The Kaiyuh system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the United Hindu Collective prior to the Collective joining the Federated Suns.

column2: Kajikazawa is a prefecture capital in the Benjamin Military District, and houses numerous luxury holiday homes for politicians and bureaucrats from Benjamin.
column3: Kajikazawa is a prefecture capital in the Benjamin Military District, and houses numerous luxury holiday homes for politicians and bureaucrats from Benjamin.

column2: Kakada is an impoverished system, with little in the way of mineral wealth or resources. It's main source of income is the production of woodcrafts thanks to abundant lumber.
column3: Kakada is an impoverished system, with little in the way of mineral wealth or resources. It's main source of income is the production of woodcrafts thanks to abundant lumber.

column2: Kaldu was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Kaldu was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Mercilessly hot and dry, Kalidasa is nonetheless a major industrial world, hosting large amounts of cross-border trade and a major Mech factory.
column3: Mercilessly hot and dry, Kalidasa is nonetheless a major industrial world, hosting large amounts of cross-border trade and a major Mech factory.

column2: Kalmar (CC) was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Kalmar (CC) was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Kalmar is one of the worlds that form a part of the Deep Periphery nation known as the Hanseatic League, exporting goods to other Hanseatic worlds. It is a mostly water world, with vast ship building facilities for boats.
column3: Kalmar is one of the worlds that form a part of the Deep Periphery nation known as the Hanseatic League, exporting goods to other Hanseatic worlds. It is a mostly water world, with vast ship building facilities for boats.

column2: Broiling with discontent, the population of Kamarod is known for their rebel activities.
column3: Broiling with discontent, the population of Kamarod is known for their rebel activities.

column2: Memorials to the 7th Bolan Defenders stand proud in many cities across Kamenz, an historic reminder of the end of the Star League.
column3: Memorials to the 7th Bolan Defenders stand proud in many cities across Kamenz, an historic reminder of the end of the Star League.

column2: Kampen is one of the worlds that form a part of the Hanseatic League, exporting goods to other Hanseatic worlds. It is an icy mining facility for the most part, but small manufacturers are setting up here in recent years.
column3: Kampen is one of the worlds that form a part of the Hanseatic League, exporting goods to other Hanseatic worlds. It is an icy mining facility for the most part, but small manufacturers are setting up here in recent years.

column2: Was the provincial capital of the Duchy of Andurien.  Have a few military schools including three of significant size. One of which - the Humphreys School of Warfare - was opened in 2762 and is pretty hi-tech.
column3: Was the provincial capital of the Duchy of Andurien. Have a few military schools including three of significant size. One of which - the Humphreys School of Warfare - was opened in 2762 and is pretty hi-tech.

column2: Settled a few years before the formation of the Star League, the rich fertile oasis of Kandersteg allow for large exports of foodstuffs to nearby worlds.
column3: Settled a few years before the formation of the Star League, the rich fertile oasis of Kandersteg allow for large exports of foodstuffs to nearby worlds.

column2: Settled during the Star League era, the rich fertile mountains of Kandis allow for large exports of foodstuffs to nearby worlds.
column3: Settled during the Star League era, the rich fertile mountains of Kandis allow for large exports of foodstuffs to nearby worlds.

column2: Kannon was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Kannon was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Lacking an atmosphere, barren Kanowit would have fallen off the maps of the Inner Sphere entirely if not for its impressive mineral riches, and the ease with which the Combine's prisoners extract them.
column3: Lacking an atmosphere, barren Kanowit would have fallen off the maps of the Inner Sphere entirely if not for its impressive mineral riches, and the ease with which the Combine's prisoners extract them.

column2: The small and frozen world of Kansu was only settled in the second half of the 24th century. The icy world's flora is unique in that it stores energy as frozen methane rather than as fat. Whilst now a source of power, the initial encounters were quite explosive.
column3: The small and frozen world of Kansu was only settled in the second half of the 24th century. The icy world's flora is unique in that it stores energy as frozen methane rather than as fat. Whilst now a source of power, the initial encounters were quite explosive.

column2: Kanto was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Kanto was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Settled by poor African and Arabic colonists, Kapoeta is a dismal world that operates at a mid 20th century level of development.
column3: Settled by poor African and Arabic colonists, Kapoeta is a dismal world that operates at a mid 20th century level of development.

column2: The vast sulfur fields of Karachi leave the otherwise breathable atmosphere with a constant smell of rotten egg, ensuring visitors rarely stay for long periods of time.
column3: The vast sulfur fields of Karachi leave the otherwise breathable atmosphere with a constant smell of rotten egg, ensuring visitors rarely stay for long periods of time.

column2: Karakiraz is a relatively poor system, with little in the way of mineral wealth or resources. It's main source of income is the production of woodcrafts thanks to abundant lumber.
column3: Karakiraz is a relatively poor system, with little in the way of mineral wealth or resources. It's main source of income is the production of woodcrafts thanks to abundant lumber.

column2: A tropical paradise known for it's rare gemstones, Karbala's aristocrats are some of the wealthiest in the Inner Sphere.
column3: A tropical paradise known for it's rare gemstones, Karbala's aristocrats are some of the wealthiest in the Inner Sphere.

column2: Karkkila was originally a part of the Timbuktu Province of the Rim Worlds Republic and was conquered by the Lyran Commonwealth during the Republic-Commonwealth war.
column3: Karkkila was originally a part of the Timbuktu Province of the Rim Worlds Republic and was conquered by the Lyran Commonwealth during the Republic-Commonwealth war.

column2: Karlstejn was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Karlstejn was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Most of the population of Karpathos lives an agricultural lifestyle maintained by technology of an equivalent to that found on Terra in the late eighteenth or early nineteenth century, a consequence of the heavy influence of the Omniss philosophy
column3: Most of the population of Karpathos lives an agricultural lifestyle maintained by technology of an equivalent to that found on Terra in the late eighteenth or early nineteenth century, a consequence of the heavy influence of the Omniss philosophy

column2: Settled during the golden age of the Star League, the rich mineral fields of Karston allow for large exports to nearby worlds.
column3: Settled during the golden age of the Star League, the rich mineral fields of Karston allow for large exports to nearby worlds.

column2: The Kasdach system was colonised shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was one of the founding worlds of the Sian Commonwealth. Despite constant volcanic activity, the soils remain infertile in many areas.
column3: The Kasdach system was colonised shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was one of the founding worlds of the Sian Commonwealth. Despite constant volcanic activity, the soils remain infertile in many areas.

column2: Kashilla is an unremarkable tropical world within the Capellan Confederation near the border with the Free Worlds League. While it supports a large population, it lacks any major military, research, or manufacturing facilities.
column3: Kashilla is an unremarkable tropical world within the Capellan Confederation near the border with the Free Worlds League. While it supports a large population, it lacks any major military, research, or manufacturing facilities.

column2: Kathil itself was an insignificant planet with limited rare metal deposits until the Star League set up the James McKenna Shipyards in 2602.  While the Succession Wars effectively destroyed them, rumors are that the Feds have recently rebuilt them.
column3: Kathil itself was an insignificant planet with limited rare metal deposits until the Star League set up the James McKenna Shipyards in 2602. While the Succession Wars effectively destroyed them, rumors are that the Feds have recently rebuilt them.

column2: The SLDF facility on this world made it a prime target during the Periphery Uprising, and an orbital mass-driver strike left an enormous crater and a badly-disrupted ecosystem. The potential for scavenging LosTech continues to flood the system with prospectors and colonists.
column3: The SLDF facility on this world made it a prime target during the Periphery Uprising, and an orbital mass-driver strike left an enormous crater and a badly-disrupted ecosystem. The potential for scavenging LosTech continues to flood the system with prospectors and colonists.

column2: The constant vulcanism of Katla made it suitable for only a minor surveillance outpost. When that outpost was destroyed in a minor skirmish during the Third Succession War, not enough remained of it to make it viable to rebuild.
column3: The constant vulcanism of Katla made it suitable for only a minor surveillance outpost. When that outpost was destroyed in a minor skirmish during the Third Succession War, not enough remained of it to make it viable to rebuild.

column2: Settled during the Star League era, the vast copper deposits of Katlehong have been heavily mined for centuries.
column3: Settled during the Star League era, the vast copper deposits of Katlehong have been heavily mined for centuries.

column2: Kaufermann was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Kaumberg was settled for it's vast mountain ranges and forest lands. Though mining would seem to be a logical industry for the world, most of Kaumberg's economy is based on the timber trade.
column3: Kaumberg was settled for it's vast mountain ranges and forest lands. Though mining would seem to be a logical industry for the world, most of Kaumberg's economy is based on the timber trade.

column2: Kaus Australis was only settled to take advantage of the mineral resources available in its crust, particularly Germanium. Without this vital metal, JumpShips cannot travel between the stars.
column3: Kaus Australis was only settled to take advantage of the mineral resources available in its crust, particularly Germanium. Without this vital metal, JumpShips cannot travel between the stars.

column2: When it was originally settled, Kaus Borealis was a paradise of green plants, fresh water, and beautiful seasons. In the past 300 years, however, a series of volcanic eruptions and other geological events have spewed massive amounts of ash, methane, and sulfur into the atmosphere, tainting it.
column3: When it was originally settled, Kaus Borealis was a paradise of green plants, fresh water, and beautiful seasons. In the past 300 years, however, a series of volcanic eruptions and other geological events have spewed massive amounts of ash, methane, and sulfur into the atmosphere, tainting it.

column2: Kaus Media had nearly everything the early colonists needed to make a successful colony: Foodstuffs, water, temperate climate. The only thing they lacked was any sort of easily accessed mineral resource to build industry. After discovering that Kaus Australis had the opposite problem, traders from Kaus Media rapidly established mutually-beneficial trade agreements that allowed both worlds to survive.
column3: Kaus Media had nearly everything the early colonists needed to make a successful colony: Foodstuffs, water, temperate climate. The only thing they lacked was any sort of easily accessed mineral resource to build industry. After discovering that Kaus Australis had the opposite problem, traders from Kaus Media rapidly established mutually-beneficial trade agreements that allowed both worlds to survive.

column2: During the final years of the Star League, Kawabe was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison.
column3: During the final years of the Star League, Kawabe was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison.

column2: Kawich's soil is spread across ten large island continents in shallow sea basins. The soil itself isn't good for agriculture, but it is packed with petroleum, minerals, and metal ores that are extremely valuable to manufacturers.
column3: Kawich's soil is spread across ten large island continents in shallow sea basins. The soil itself isn't good for agriculture, but it is packed with petroleum, minerals, and metal ores that are extremely valuable to manufacturers.

column2: For centuries Kazanka has been a major industrial and mining world that supplies Yttrium, an element used in the production of high-tech laser optics and crystals. A heavy Star League presence existed centuries ago, and many caches are still being found today.
column3: For centuries Kazanka has been a major industrial and mining world that supplies Yttrium, an element used in the production of high-tech laser optics and crystals. A heavy Star League presence existed centuries ago, and many caches are still being found today.

column2: Kazlam is located in the anti-spinward region of the Deep Periphery, in a remote location anti-spinward of the Hanseatic League and coreward of Interstellar Expeditions Base 14.
column3: Kazlam is located in the anti-spinward region of the Deep Periphery, in a remote location anti-spinward of the Hanseatic League and coreward of Interstellar Expeditions Base 14.

column2: Kaznejov was a sun-baked world with modest ore deposits that prompted colonization in the early 24th century. Since then, the population has imported life-forms to make this world more habitable.

column2: A barren expanse of sand and rock, Kazu was inhabited as recently as a century ago. The technology used to extract water from the limited subterranean aquifers was destroyed in the ending days of the Second Succession War, and the planet was abandoned to the sand.
column3: A barren expanse of sand and rock, Kazu was inhabited as recently as a century ago. The technology used to extract water from the limited subterranean aquifers was destroyed in the ending days of the Second Succession War, and the planet was abandoned to the sand.

column3: Settled by poor African and Arabic colonists, Kebili is a poor world that operates at a mid 20th century level of development.

column2: In the final years of the Star League, Keeling served as the headquarters world for the XXVI Corps (Star League) of the Star League Defense Force. The main base on world was Fort Wittman, which is now the site of a ruined Castle Brian.

column2: A fertile, slightly colder Earth like world; Keid was one of the first planets settled outside the Sol system. Though its orbital shipyards were lost in the First Succession War, the planet's agrarian and industrial economies remain strong.
column3: Плодородный, но несколько более холодный земле подобный мир. Кейд одна из первых колонизированных планет, за пределами Солнечной системы. Хотя её орбитальные верфи были уничтожены во время первой Войны за наследство, аграрная и индустриальная часть экономики планеты остались сильными.

column2: Kessel was a pristine world rich in minerals and metals and has always been a key manufacturing planet.  Since being captured by the Draconis Combine in 2866, poor environmental practices have tainted the atmosphere, and organised crime is rampant.

column3: Menkent is an arid world lit by a dim orange star. While it posseses water, it is so salty that purification units are needed to prep it for consumption and irrigation. Menkent has little to offer, exporting common metals and small industrial goods.

column2: New Sapporo was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: New Sapporo was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Originally called New Sarna, Tsinghai served as a prefecture capital world in the Sarna Supremacy. After the Supremacy joined the Capellan Confederation, Tsinghai's residents turned to mining and the export of nuclear fuel as the cornerstone of their economy.
column3: Originally called New Sarna, Tsinghai served as a prefecture capital world in the Sarna Supremacy. After the Supremacy joined the Capellan Confederation, Tsinghai's residents turned to mining and the export of nuclear fuel as the cornerstone of their economy.

column3: New Sarum was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: New Sierra was colonized in the late twenty-sixth century, and grew to three billion people by the late twenty-eighth century. Soon after, a conflict broke out among the population that led to a global thermonuclear war and nuclear winter...
column3: New Sierra was colonized in the late twenty-sixth century, and grew to three billion people by the late twenty-eighth century. Soon after, a conflict broke out among the population that led to a global thermonuclear war and nuclear winter...

column2: New St. Andrews is an isolated Periphery planet. The planet possesses few natural resources but it does have a manufacturer - Meridian Manufacturing - which produces menacing looking Mechs such as the Arbiter.
column3: New St. Andrews is an isolated Periphery planet. The planet possesses few natural resources but it does have a manufacturer - Meridian Manufacturing - which produces menacing looking Mechs such as the Arbiter.

column2: New Stevens was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Нью Стивенс был заселен в эпоху Звездной Лиги через какое-то время после окончания Войны за воссоединение, но население полностью вымерло во время боев в Войнах за наследство.

column2: New Sumatra was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: New Sumatra was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Originally settled in the late 2260's, New Syrtis is an icy planet with a narrow temperate band around the equator.  New Sytris is an important mining, manufaturing and military training planet for the Feds.
column3: Originally settled in the late 2260's, New Syrtis is an icy planet with a narrow temperate band around the equator. New Sytris is an important mining, manufaturing and military training planet for the Feds.

column2: Settled by the Federated Suns during the Star League era, it was heavily damaged during the First and Second Succession Wars, leading to mass depopulation from which it is only now recovering.
column3: Settled by the Federated Suns during the Star League era, it was heavily damaged during the First and Second Succession Wars, leading to mass depopulation from which it is only now recovering.

column2: Newtown Square was a world within the Apollo Province of the Rim Worlds Republic, and the site of numerous large battles during the Reunification War.
column3: Newtown Square was a world within the Apollo Province of the Rim Worlds Republic, and the site of numerous large battles during the Reunification War.

column2: New Troy was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: New Troy was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: New Valencia was a major food exporter during the Star League era. The destruction of JumpShips during the Succession Wars resulted in New Valencia's agriculture shifting to expensive boutique foods.
column3: New Valencia was a major food exporter during the Star League era. The destruction of JumpShips during the Succession Wars resulted in New Valencia's agriculture shifting to expensive boutique foods.

column2: The mining colony of New Vallis is located on the tidally locked moon of a gas giant locally known as Joramander. It has a single city, with a notoriously active nightlife, on a plateau covered with huge, slow-growing trees.
column3: The mining colony of New Vallis is located on the tidally locked moon of a gas giant locally known as Joramander. It has a single city, with a notoriously active nightlife, on a plateau covered with huge, slow-growing trees.

column2: Long after its eponymous Uprising, New Vandenburg remains a core component in the Taurian Concordat's military industrial complex, while also maintaining a wealth of other industries that make it a highly desirable place to live.
column3: Long after its eponymous Uprising, New Vandenburg remains a core component in the Taurian Concordat's military industrial complex, while also maintaining a wealth of other industries that make it a highly desirable place to live.

column2: New Venice was founded by the Marian Hegemony to capitalise on trade routes during the Third Succession War. Little more than a trading outpost, it still garners a fair amount of traffic.
column3: New Venice was founded by the Marian Hegemony to capitalise on trade routes during the Third Succession War. Little more than a trading outpost, it still garners a fair amount of traffic.

column2: New Wessex was once a beautiful world that had light industry and moderate agricultural production, but due to the Succession Wars is now a poisoned world with a dimishing population.
column3: New Wessex was once a beautiful world that had light industry and moderate agricultural production, but due to the Succession Wars is now a poisoned world with a dimishing population.

column2: New Sagan was part of the Sian Commonwealth before joining the Confederation.
column3: New Sagan was part of the Sian Commonwealth before joining the Confederation.

column3: Nexus Ri was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Ngake Ducal Spaceport is one of the few remaining DropShip manufacturers left in the Inner Sphere.
column3: Ngake Ducal Spaceport is one of the few remaining DropShip manufacturers left in the Inner Sphere.

column2: Niangol is one of the main petroleum and ore processing centers in the Commonwealth.
column3: Niangol is one of the main petroleum and ore processing centers in the Commonwealth.

column3: Nichol's Rest was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Nightwish was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Nightwish was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Nihal is a mainly agricultural world that was part of the Sian Commonwealth before joining the Confederation centuries ago.
column3: Nihal is a mainly agricultural world that was part of the Sian Commonwealth before joining the Confederation centuries ago.

column2: Annexed into the Free Worlds League during it's formation, Niihau is mainly known for it's timber products.
column3: Annexed into the Free Worlds League during it's formation, Niihau is mainly known for it's timber products.

column2: Niles is the homeworld of Clan Hell's Horses, in the Kerensky Cluster. Numerous manufacturers are based here, churning out the war machine for Clan Hell Horses.
column3: Niles is the homeworld of Clan Hell's Horses, in the Kerensky Cluster. Numerous manufacturers are based here, churning out the war machine for Clan Hell Horses.

column2: Niles was a recently settled world when it was conquered by the Star League during the Reunification War, which killed most of it's nascent population. Now mostly an agricultural world, it's light industrial base is suitable for minor Mech repairs.
column3: Niles was a recently settled world when it was conquered by the Star League during the Reunification War, which killed most of it's nascent population. Now mostly an agricultural world, it's light industrial base is suitable for minor Mech repairs.

column2: Ningpo's wide and fertile plains make it an agricultural producer of some renown.  Covered in several exotic hardwood tree species, careful logging practices have allowed custom furniture businesses to produce some of the most beautiful furniture in the Inner Sphere. Some suggest that the Celestial Throne on Sian is made from Ningpo timber.
column3: Ningpo's wide and fertile plains make it an agricultural producer of some renown. Covered in several exotic hardwood tree species, careful logging practices have allowed custom furniture businesses to produce some of the most beautiful furniture in the Inner Sphere. Some suggest that the Celestial Throne on Sian is made from Ningpo timber.

column2: Though Ningxia has many diamonds perfect for industrial processes, the world was actually settled for it's beautiful landscapes. Regarded as a planet-sized bonsai garden, every effort since the fall of the Star League to exploit the diamonds has been stopped by highly placed nobles, including Coordinator Takashi Kurita.
column3: Though Ningxia has many diamonds perfect for industrial processes, the world was actually settled for it's beautiful landscapes. Regarded as a planet-sized bonsai garden, every effort since the fall of the Star League to exploit the diamonds has been stopped by highly placed nobles, including Coordinator Takashi Kurita.

column2: Niomede is the largest airless rock in a system full of them. Yet people dwell there, deep under the surface in sealed caves. The original valuable mineral deposit was long ago exhausted, but a thriving astronomical research community endures.
column3: Niomede is the largest airless rock in a system full of them. Yet people dwell there, deep under the surface in sealed caves. The original valuable mineral deposit was long ago exhausted, but a thriving astronomical research community endures.

column2: The Niops system was colonized by the Star League to conduct the first study of a falling star based on generations of direct observation. After the fallout of the League, they elected to remain forgotten, a technocracy with no ruler.
column3: The Niops system was colonized by the Star League to conduct the first study of a falling star based on generations of direct observation. After the fallout of the League, they elected to remain forgotten, a technocracy with no ruler.

column2: The Niquinohomo system was colonised during the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the United Hindu Collective prior to the Collective joining the Federated Suns.
column3: The Niquinohomo system was colonised during the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the United Hindu Collective prior to the Collective joining the Federated Suns.

column2: Nirasaki is a warm but pleasant world whose people are known for their fierce streak of independence. While not home to any military production, Maltex Corporation maintains a 'Mech design thinktank on the planet.

column2: An icy world known for its whales, seals and aquatic life.

column2: The Nockatunga system was colonized at some point prior to or during the early 23rd Century. During the Star League era, it was classified as a 'vital' world and the construction of many Fort Brian's commenced. Only one remains today, Fort Brittany.

column3: Noh-wan Hohm was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Noisiel is a small and humble Lyran Commonwealth system, best known for its summer 'Mech games.
column3: Noisiel is a small and humble Lyran Commonwealth system, best known for its summer 'Mech games.

column2: Non Diz was briefly occupied by the Capellan Confederation, in order to keep it clear of pirates. Eventually they determined even pirates didn't want to deal with the endless dust storms, and redirected their resources elsewhere.
column3: Non Diz was briefly occupied by the Capellan Confederation, in order to keep it clear of pirates. Eventually they determined even pirates didn't want to deal with the endless dust storms, and redirected their resources elsewhere.

column2: Nopah is a world with a dying star. Though well suited for flora the radiation from the star had killed all native life by the time the first settlers arrived. In response they imported insects from Terra to make sure their crops were fertilized. This effort was successful, and Nopah became a breadbasket world supporting many nearby systems
column3: Nopah is a world with a dying star. Though well suited for flora the radiation from the star had killed all native life by the time the first settlers arrived. In response they imported insects from Terra to make sure their crops were fertilized. This effort was successful, and Nopah became a breadbasket world supporting many nearby systems

column2: Settled during the Star League era after colonists from the Capellan Confederation misjumped into the system, the world was luckily not far from known space.
column3: Settled during the Star League era after colonists from the Capellan Confederation misjumped into the system, the world was luckily not far from known space.

column2: Thyne Weapons Plant utilises local radioactives to produce numerous weaponry for export across the Free Worlds.

column2: Norman's World was settled during the Star League era, and was the site of a large rebellion. Norman told them to stop it though, and they did.

column2: The most habitable world in the Norn system, Verthandi, is considered a Lostech world with its people dependent on others for transport and commerce. Primary industries are agriculture and manufacturing which supports agriculture and local commerce.

column2: Northfield is home to numerous germanium mines and refineries.
column3: Northfield is home to numerous germanium mines and refineries.

column3: Northsun was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Northwind is the homeworld of the famed mercenary unit the Northwind Highlanders and Northwind Military Academy. Cosara Weaponries and Bulldog Enterprises also have large manufacturing facilities on the surface.

column2: During the Star League era, great chasms opened up on the surface due to a once in a million years seismic event.

column2: During the final years of the Star League, Nouasseur was the host of a Star League Defense Force garrison.
