column2: Nouveaux Paris is a colony world located in the Deep Periphery, approximately 250 light years coreward of the border between the Inner Sphere and the Periphery, near Trelleborg and Bazaar.
column3: Nouveaux Paris is a colony world located in the Deep Periphery, approximately 250 light years coreward of the border between the Inner Sphere and the Periphery, near Trelleborg and Bazaar.

column2: During the final years of the Star League, Novara was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison.
column3: During the final years of the Star League, Novara was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison.

column2: Nova Roma is an agrarian world. Lacking a strategic position and possessing a great deal of arable land, Nova Roma quickly became one of the \"breadbasket worlds\" in the Free Worlds League.
column3: Nova Roma is an agrarian world. Lacking a strategic position and possessing a great deal of arable land, Nova Roma quickly became one of the "breadbasket worlds" in the Free Worlds League.

column2: Novaya Zemlya has the dubious honor of being the first inhabited world bombarded by WarShips. The resulting bombardment killed three-quarters of the world's population, destroyed nearly all cities and planetary infrastructure, and poisoned the farmlands. The few survivors had to then deal with the \"nuclear winter\" that resulted from the dust and debris thrown into the world's upper atmosphere. The Federated Suns are currently pouring many resources into the world.
column3: Novaya Zemlya has the dubious honor of being the first inhabited world bombarded by WarShips. The resulting bombardment killed three-quarters of the world's population, destroyed nearly all cities and planetary infrastructure, and poisoned the farmlands. The few survivors had to then deal with the "nuclear winter" that resulted from the dust and debris thrown into the world's upper atmosphere. The Federated Suns are currently pouring many resources into the world.

column2: Novgorod is one of the worlds that form a part of the Deep Periphery nation known as the Hanseatic League, exporting goods to other Hanseatic worlds.
column3: Novgorod is one of the worlds that form a part of the Deep Periphery nation known as the Hanseatic League, exporting goods to other Hanseatic worlds.

column2: Novo Franklin is a hot, agricultural world settled in 2598 by Reunification War refugees fleeing the Outworlds Alliance. Over the next four hundred years, all of these splinter groups had developed feudal states, as many as 55 different kingdoms.
column3: Novo Franklin is a hot, agricultural world settled in 2598 by Reunification War refugees fleeing the Outworlds Alliance. Over the next four hundred years, all of these splinter groups had developed feudal states, as many as 55 different kingdoms.

column2: An arid world, it is relatively poor with few visitors.
column3: An arid world, it is relatively poor with few visitors.

column2: Nowhere is aptly named. While it was spared the general devastation of the Succession Wars, it has little that makes it stand out, making it a marginal world on the edge of space.
column3: Nowhere is aptly named. While it was spared the general devastation of the Succession Wars, it has little that makes it stand out, making it a marginal world on the edge of space.

column2: Nox was settled by the wealthy Tamar family and was one of the worlds within the Tamar Pact, a short lived protostate. It's mines are operated by Metals of the Earth, who have a loose relation with Operational Health and Safety.
column3: Nox was settled by the wealthy Tamar family and was one of the worlds within the Tamar Pact, a short lived protostate. It's mines are operated by Metals of the Earth, who have a loose relation with Operational Health and Safety.

column2: Nukus was a minor colony until the Capellans withdrew, leaving the residents to fend for themselves. Only the volcanic equatorial region is inhabited, where temperate climate allows some subsistence agriculture. Elsewhere, the planet is scoured by ice storms.
column3: Nukus was a minor colony until the Capellans withdrew, leaving the residents to fend for themselves. Only the volcanic equatorial region is inhabited, where temperate climate allows some subsistence agriculture. Elsewhere, the planet is scoured by ice storms.

column2: Settled by colonists fleeing Terra, Nullarbor was an independent colony for over a century before joining the Free Worlds League.
column3: Settled by colonists fleeing Terra, Nullarbor was an independent colony for over a century before joining the Free Worlds League.

column2: Numenor largely escaped the ravages of warfare during the Succession Wars, leading to the population becoming some of the most confident, erudite and snobbish to be found in the Federated Suns. It is home to Aston-Martin, one of the premium electric vehicle manufacturers in the Inner Sphere.
column3: Numenor largely escaped the ravages of warfare during the Succession Wars, leading to the population becoming some of the most confident, erudite and snobbish to be found in the Federated Suns. column2: Settled by the Draconis Combine during the Star League era due to one of the Kuritas wanting to play with a space seal. Yes, really.

column2: Settled by the Federated Suns during the Star League era, it was heavily damaged during the First and Second Succession Wars, leading to mass depopulation from which it is only now recovering.

column2: Nusakan, despite its cold climate, has become home to many consumer electronics and luxury aircraft manufacturers. While these are not military industries, they are highly profitable.

column2: Nyamlell is a colonized world within the Axumite Providence. The world is at approximately a 20th Century technological level.

column2: Annually, a viral plague would break-out on Nykvarn's northern continent, which was also the site of special type of grain that was the only viable cure for it. At the first sign of the plague, the grain was harvested and baked into loaves of bread which the locals ate to survive that year's outbreak.
column3: Annually, a viral plague would break-out on Nykvarn's northern continent, which was also the site of special type of grain that was the only viable cure for it. At the first sign of the plague, the grain was harvested and baked into loaves of bread which the locals ate to survive that year's outbreak.

column2: Oberon, the capital of perhaps the most infamous bandit kingdom, has been home to numerous proto states over the centuries. A great pirates fortress towers over the main capital city.
column3: Оберон, столица, пожалуй, самого печально известного бандитского королевства, на протяжении веков был домом для множества мелких государств. Огромная пиратская крепость возвышается над главным городом-столицей.

column2: The Obrenovac system was colonised at some point prior to the end of the Age of War by the Magistry of Canopus, before becoming part of the Inner Sphere during the Reunification War.

column2: Settled by colonists fleeing Terra, Oceana was an independent colony for over a century before joining the Free Worlds League.
column3: Settled by colonists fleeing Terra, Oceana was an independent colony for over a century before joining the Free Worlds League.

column2: Having been colonised in the twenty-sixth century by deeply religious individuals seeking the solitude of deep space, by the end of the Second Succession War Okefenokee was one of the poorest worlds to be found within the borders of the Federated Suns.

column2: Maarakiva University, located on Olafsvik, is one of the Free Worlds League's top two business schools. Maarakiva focuses more on the academic and theoretical in its courses, with particular attention paid to advertising and market research.
column3: Maarakiva University, located on Olafsvik, is one of the Free Worlds League's top two business schools. Maarakiva focuses more on the academic and theoretical in its courses, with particular attention paid to advertising and market research.

column2: Infamously known as the planet where the Inner Sphere's only known deployment of a gigaton-range nuclear device occured, Old Kentucky is still recovering from the centuries of abuse in the Succession Wars.

column2: The world is quiet and unassuming, except for the massive rainforests that circle the equator. Here trees that tower more than 500 meters tall block out the sun, creating a mood of perpetual twilight at the forest floor.

column2: Organo has two continents, Alphus and Omegus. The capital city, Typae, is located on Alphus. The Pinard Protectorates Limited plant is located in a vast cavern located at the interface zone between a large agricultural area and a desert.
column3: Organo has two continents, Alphus and Omegus. The capital city, Typae, is located on Alphus. The Pinard Protectorates Limited plant is located in a vast cavern located at the interface zone between a large agricultural area and a desert.

column2: One of the core worlds of the Tamar Pact, it became a defacto world of the Lyran Commonwealth when it formed.

column2: Originally only a small outpost, it gained notoriety thanks to the exotic holovid productions which used Outpost as a daring setting.

column2: Outreach was first settled during the twenty-second century by Terran colonists attracted to the planet's warm climate. Tourism became the mainstay of the planet's economy after it played host to the Star League Martial Olympiads in 2704.
column3: Аутрич был заселен в двадцать втором веке земными колонистами, привлеченными теплым климатом планеты. Туризм стал основой экономики планеты после того, как на ней была проведена Боевая олимпиада Звездной лиги 2704 года.

column2: Ovan is a rocky world with a river that runs around the entire equator. Ovan's industrial economy was damaged by the first two Succession Wars, and has been further damaged by mismanagement in recent years.
column3: Ovan is a rocky world with a river that runs around the entire equator. Ovan's industrial economy was damaged by the first two Succession Wars, and has been further damaged by mismanagement in recent years.

column2: Overton is temperate, mostly water covered world near where the Capellan, St. Ives, and Federated Suns borders meet. It supports a population of just under a billion, most of whom are involved in the aquaculture industry.
column3: Overton is temperate, mostly water covered world near where the Capellan, St. Ives, and Federated Suns borders meet. It supports a population of just under a billion, most of whom are involved in the aquaculture industry.

column2: Pacifica has highly fertile soil and is home to a Mechwarrior Academy. Unfortunately, Pacifica has highly unpredictable weather and only a 14 hour long day-night cycle, so it requires quite a while to acclimate.
column3: Пасифика (Чара) планета с очень плодородной почвой. На её поверхности находится Академия мехвоинов Лирианского содружества, но к сожалению, на Пасифике очень непредсказуемая погода и короткий 14-часовой цикл день-ночь, поэтому для акклиматизации требуется довольно много времени.

column2: Paf was briefly a Taurian research station, but the punishing climate made large-scale construction far too expensive to further exploit the planet's possible resources.

column3: Pegasi is an independent Periphery world located close to the worlds of Carcri and Cephei and the Tortuga Dominions

column2: Pell was never more than a stopping-off point on the way to Buenos Aires. During the Third Succession War the refueling station in orbit was shut down due to lack of parts and technical expertise. The Capellans have since abandoned the system.

column2: Originally one of the worlds of the Sian Commonwealth, it became a defacto member of the Capellan Confederation during it's inaugeration.

column2: During the final years of the Star League, Pencader was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison. Towerlund City as it is now called is a large walled city located close to the Oxide Desert.

column2: The oceanic world of Perdition is wracked by constant storms and vulcanism. It would be a fairly unpleasant place to live if not for the money that its mining and military manufacturing industries bring in.

column2: An oft contested world, the original industrial base was destroyed in the Succession Wars, leaving only deep mine shafts to provide material.

column2: When the Free Worlds League withdrew its support from the mining colony of Pernik, the residents who chose to stay were able to survive by moving to subterranean hydroponic agriculture in the planet's extensive cave systems.

column2: Alternatively known as Perrot or Shaula throughout the Succession Wars, it is an unremarkable agri world with areas filled with natural hot springs.

column2: Persistence was one of seven worlds settled by colonists from the Rim Worlds Republic between 2334 and 2338 as an attempt by Maxwell Rowe to create a buffer zone between the Republic, the Draconis Combine and the Tamar Pact. It was conquered by the Lyran Commonwealth during the 2773-2775 Republic-Commonwealth war.
column3: Persistence was one of seven worlds settled by colonists from the Rim Worlds Republic between 2334 and 2338 as an attempt by Maxwell Rowe to create a buffer zone between the Republic, the Draconis Combine and the Tamar Pact. It was conquered by the Lyran Commonwealth during the 2773-2775 Republic-Commonwealth war.

column2: Pesht was discovered by early explorers which were part of the Ozawan merchants in 2212, but due to hostile wildlife wasn't colonised until 2320. A heavily forest world, it is extremely hospitable to humanoid life.
column3: Pesht was discovered by early explorers which were part of the Ozawan merchants in 2212, but due to hostile wildlife wasn't colonised until 2320. A heavily forest world, it is extremely hospitable to humanoid life.

column2: Named for it's vast petroleum deposits under the ice, Petrolia is a heavily industrialised world.

column2: The Phact system was colonized sometime prior to 2366, and has had a long history as an industrialised world.

column2: Settled for rich high-quality metal and oil deposits, the only inhabited planet in the system is 'Hades', a hot caustic world.

These factories, and many others, exploited the petrochemical and mineral resources of the planet directly and refined metals from the ores in the world were shipped to many other planets. During the succession wars, two out the five continents were rendered uninhabitable nuclear wastelands, which the population hasn't recovered from to this day.

column2: When first settled, Rio was a beautiful world covered in scenic valleys. With little to export, the world instead became known as a prime vacation spot, artists colony, and tri-vid production planet and one of the richest worlds in the Star League. Fierce nuclear bombardments throughout the Succession Wars have rendered the world dead.

column2: The planet Setubal is a desert world with very hot equatorial zones. Human habitation is only possible in the polar regions with their tropical and subtropical climate. Settled for its abundant subterranean water supplies, Setubal features extensive cave systems which are used to grow edible fungi.

column2: Solaris VII is known across the galaxy for its 'Mech fights. Gamblers place exorbitant amounts of money on longshot bets, and fortunes are won and lost daily. Solaris City, in particular, hosts six major arenas and numerous MechWarrior stables.
column3: Solaris VII is known across the galaxy for its 'Mech fights. Gamblers place exorbitant amounts of money on longshot bets, and fortunes are won and lost daily. Solaris City, in particular, hosts six major arenas and numerous MechWarrior stables.

column2: Solor was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Solor was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Somerset I - more commonly known simply as Somerset - is the innermost planet in the system and has two moons named Bull and Hint. Somerset has been home to a small military academy during its history.
column3: Somerset I - more commonly known simply as Somerset - is the innermost planet in the system and has two moons named Bull and Hint. Somerset has been home to a small military academy during its history.

column2: The Songgang system was colonised during or shortly before the Age of War by the United Hindu Collective.
column3: The Songgang system was colonised during or shortly before the Age of War by the United Hindu Collective.

column2: Son Hoa has an interesting geographical feature: The Vanishing Sea. During the blistering summers, all the water in the sea evaporates. Once the seasons turn, the water condenses out of the atmosphere and returns to the seabed.
column3: Son Hoa has an interesting geographical feature: The Vanishing Sea. During the blistering summers, all the water in the sea evaporates. Once the seasons turn, the water condenses out of the atmosphere and returns to the seabed.

column2: Settled at the start of the First Succession War by refugees from the borders, Sonnia has grown into an economic powerhouse.
column3: Settled at the start of the First Succession War by refugees from the borders, Sonnia has grown into an economic powerhouse.

column2: A center for the arts and learning, Sophie's Choice is an idyllic planet with vast fertile oasis dotted throughout it's desert like surface.
column3: A center for the arts and learning, Sophie's Choice is an idyllic planet with vast fertile oasis dotted throughout it's desert like surface.

column2: Sornath was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Sornath was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Sorsk was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Sorsk was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Sorunda has a large population of Buddists. It also possesses three continents named Black Falls, Serenity, and Xeno.
column3: Sorunda has a large population of Buddists. It also possesses three continents named Black Falls, Serenity, and Xeno.

column2: Soul is a generally inhospitable world. The unforgiving environment is a combination of the dimness of the system's star, as well as Soul's lack of an axial tilt. Soul is home to a Blankenburg Technologies assault mech factory.
column3: Soul is a generally inhospitable world. The unforgiving environment is a combination of the dimness of the system's star, as well as Soul's lack of an axial tilt. Soul is home to a Blankenburg Technologies assault mech factory.

column2: Kilometer wide rapids criss cross this otherwise stepped world, allowing the creation of vast hydroelectric plants.
column3: Kilometer wide rapids criss cross this otherwise stepped world, allowing the creation of vast hydroelectric plants.

column2: Home to Marley Munitions Works, Sparrevohn is specialised in the production of munitions
column3: Home to Marley Munitions Works, Sparrevohn is specialised in the production of munitions

column2: Sparta was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Sparta was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: This former Taurian world is encircled by a vast shallow ocean, teeming with native and Terran aquatic life. During the abortive Taurian-Canopian War, the Magistracy invaded as a retaliation for attacks on their worlds.
column3: This former Taurian world is encircled by a vast shallow ocean, teeming with native and Terran aquatic life. During the abortive Taurian-Canopian War, the Magistracy invaded as a retaliation for attacks on their worlds.

column2: Spica has been fought over for centuries, leaving it's surface a war torn wreck. Many scavengers and pirates find their way here to pick up repaired weaponry or mechs.
column3: Spica has been fought over for centuries, leaving it's surface a war torn wreck. Many scavengers and pirates find their way here to pick up repaired weaponry or mechs.

column2: Spirit was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Second Succession War.
column3: Spirit was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Second Succession War.

column2: Orignally a Draconis Combine world, Spittal is now part of the Free Resalhague Republic. Spittal is home to Benson and Bjorn which manufacures a variety of military vehicles.
column3: Orignally a Draconis Combine world, Spittal is now part of the Free Resalhague Republic. Spittal is home to Benson and Bjorn which manufacures a variety of military vehicles.

column2: A nearly lifeless world reminiscent of primordial Terra, Spitz is primarily of interest to exogeologists who study the early days of future life-bearing planets.
column3: A nearly lifeless world reminiscent of primordial Terra, Spitz is primarily of interest to exogeologists who study the early days of future life-bearing planets.

column2: St. Andre is a red desert planet located anti-spin of Terra, notable for its rich natural resources. St. Andre is noteworthy for the meeting of leaders in 2366 that formed the Capellan Confederation.
column3: St. Andre is a red desert planet located anti-spin of Terra, notable for its rich natural resources. St. Andre is noteworthy for the meeting of leaders in 2366 that formed the Capellan Confederation.

column2: St. Timalin is a recently rediscovered planet in the St. Andreas system, orbiting a dim red primary. It is a dark world, with black flora that has evolved to survive on the dim light emitted by the red primary, which the colonists named St. Andreas.
column3: St. Timalin is a recently rediscovered planet in the St. Andreas system, orbiting a dim red primary. It is a dark world, with black flora that has evolved to survive on the dim light emitted by the red primary, which the colonists named St. Andreas.

column2: St. Cyr was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: St. Cyr was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: St. Gall was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: St. Gall was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: St. Ives is the capital of the newly formed St. Ives League. The military industries on the planet have been built in to the vast cavern networks present on the planet, forcing attackers to attempt to seize them in costly close quarters actions.
column3: Сент-Ивз - столица бывшей Торговой Лиги Сент-Ивз, ныне - государства Соглашение Сент-Ивз. Военная промышленность на планете была встроена в обширные сети пещер, присутствующих на планете, вынуждая любых захватчиков сходиться в дорогостоящие столкновения мех на мех.

column2: The St. Jean colony is situated on the system's second planet. Barely 500 monks remain on the colony, as the planet slowly dies out as it's largest moon falls towards the planet.
column3: The St. Jean colony is situated on the system's second planet. Barely 500 monks remain on the colony, as the planet slowly dies out as it's largest moon falls towards the planet.

column2: St John is an oceanic world, consisting of a few large islands that are dotted around an ocean mostly free of ice, except at the poles. There are great tidal plains that appear during the lunar cycle, showcasing wreckage from ancient battlefields.
column3: St John is an oceanic world, consisting of a few large islands that are dotted around an ocean mostly free of ice, except at the poles. There are great tidal plains that appear during the lunar cycle, showcasing wreckage from ancient battlefields.

column2: St. Loris is an important agricultural center. In 3010 the 2nd St. Ives Lancers fought the Ceti Hussars there and much of the planet's vital wheat crop was destroyed, which caused a mighty famine. The crop has recovered, but the population has not.
column3: St. Loris is an important agricultural center. In 3010 the 2nd St. Ives Lancers fought the Ceti Hussars there and much of the planet's vital wheat crop was destroyed, which caused a mighty famine. The crop has recovered, but the population has not.

column2: Dense jungles of light blue fungal towers cover St. Robert, with kilometers of large plateaus with steep sides breaking through the canopy.
column3: Dense jungles of light blue fungal towers cover St. Robert, with kilometers of large plateaus with steep sides breaking through the canopy.

column2: Staffin was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Staffin was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: A large recruiting world for the Marian Hegemony, Stafford's high gravity produces extremely muscular troopers who excel in mountainous terrain.
column3: A large recruiting world for the Marian Hegemony, Stafford's high gravity produces extremely muscular troopers who excel in mountainous terrain.

column2: A supercontinent with some small, shallow seas that are constantly steaming. Spires of sharp stone interrupt the otherwise flat terrain.

column2: A small industrial world located near to the jump point for quick access, Sterling offers a multitude of products... and sins... for the right price.
column3: A small industrial world located near to the jump point for quick access, Sterling offers a multitude of products... and sins... for the right price.

column2: Most cities on Sterlington are located on high plateaus, above an ever turbulent sea of clouds. Whilst oxygen is thin here, it does provide ample opportunity for recreation and cloud diving.
column3: Most cities on Sterlington are located on high plateaus, above an ever turbulent sea of clouds. Whilst oxygen is thin here, it does provide ample opportunity for recreation and cloud diving.

column2: During the final years of the Star League, Sternwerde was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison. Heavy cloud cover causes many issues for exporting from Sternwerde, but below the cloud is a moist but mild climate.
column3: During the final years of the Star League, Sternwerde was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison. Heavy cloud cover causes many issues for exporting from Sternwerde, but below the cloud is a moist but mild climate.

column2: Sterope, sometimes named New Taurus, is an industrial world located in the rimward Periphery. The planet is home to Sterope Defense Industries as well as corporate unit of Taurus Territorial Industries.
column3: Sterope, sometimes named New Taurus, is an industrial world located in the rimward Periphery. The planet is home to Sterope Defense Industries as well as corporate unit of Taurus Territorial Industries.

column3: Stettin (FWL) was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Stettin is one of the worlds that form a part of the Deep Periphery nation known as the Hanseatic League and trades goods internally within the League.
column3: Stettin is one of the worlds that form a part of the Deep Periphery nation known as the Hanseatic League and trades goods internally within the League.

column2: Stewart was settled by colonists from the British Isles, who engineered vast terraforming works on the surface. Stewart maintains its healthy environment to this day and is one of the richest worlds in the Free Worlds League.
column3: Stewart was settled by colonists from the British Isles, who engineered vast terraforming works on the surface. Stewart maintains its healthy environment to this day and is one of the richest worlds in the Free Worlds League.

column3: Stockpoll was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Stonarboi was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Stonarboi was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Storfors is the planet most like Terra in the Storfors system, but two other worlds are inhabited as well. J.B. BattleMechs Incorporated manufactures Mech parts here.
column3: Storfors is the planet most like Terra in the Storfors system, but two other worlds are inhabited as well. J.B. BattleMechs Incorporated manufactures Mech parts here.

column2: Once a heavily populated world filled with factories, Strotzing was bombarded during the Second Succession War, leaving the population to subsist on agriculture for centuries amidst a tainted atmosphere.
column3: Once a heavily populated world filled with factories, Strotzing was bombarded during the Second Succession War, leaving the population to subsist on agriculture for centuries amidst a tainted atmosphere.

column2: Stralsund is one of the worlds that form a part of the Deep Periphery nation known as the Hanseatic League, trading goods amongst the other worlds in the League.
column3: Stralsund is one of the worlds that form a part of the Deep Periphery nation known as the Hanseatic League, trading goods amongst the other worlds in the League.

column2: Strana Mechty is considered an almost sacred world to the Clans. It is the site where Nicholas Kerensky escaped too, and where he founded the rigid social structure of the Clans. The world can be seen as the birthplace of the Clans.
column3: Страна Мечты считается практически священным миром для кланов. Это также первый мир, куда Николай Керенский прибыл во время второго Исхода, и тут он основал жёсткую социальную структуру кланов. Мир можно рассматривать как место рождения кланов.

column2: The Strandfontein system was colonized at some point during the reign of the Star League, and was host to a large SLDF garrison. Unfortunately the bases were raided during the Succession Wars, so no LosTech can be found here.
column3: The Strandfontein system was colonized at some point during the reign of the Star League, and was host to a large SLDF garrison. Unfortunately the bases were raided during the Succession Wars, so no LosTech can be found here.

column2: The world of Stratford has large rocky, polar continents with many fjords. These continents are cold and wet, yet still life thrives in this hard environment. The Stratford narwhal makes its breeding grounds near and within the many natural inlets.
column3: The world of Stratford has large rocky, polar continents with many fjords. These continents are cold and wet, yet still life thrives in this hard environment. The Stratford narwhal makes its breeding grounds near and within the many natural inlets.

column2: Strato Domingo is a planet in the Clan Homeworlds that was held jointly by the Diamond Sharks and the Hell's Horses. It is the only location in Clan space where HarJel is found, and the Sharks guard it zealously.
column3: Strato Domingo is a planet in the Clan Homeworlds that was held jointly by the Diamond Sharks and the Hell's Horses. It is the only location in Clan space where HarJel is found, and the Sharks guard it zealously.

column2: A once beautiful world that was ravaged by the Combine in both the First and Second Succession wars, Strawn has never fully recovered.
column3: A once beautiful world that was ravaged by the Combine in both the First and Second Succession wars, Strawn has never fully recovered.

column2: Once a heavily populated world filled with automated farms, Streator was bombarded by nuclear weapons during the First Succession War, decimating the population which has only now recovered to pre war levels.
column3: Once a heavily populated world filled with automated farms, Streator was bombarded by nuclear weapons during the First Succession War, decimating the population which has only now recovered to pre war levels.

column2: Sturganos was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Sturganos was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Once a heavily populated world filled with factories, Sturgis was bombarded for two months by the Draconis Combine during the Second Succession War, leaving the population to subsist on agriculture for centuries amidst a tainted atmosphere.
column3: Once a heavily populated world filled with factories, Sturgis was bombarded for two months by the Draconis Combine during the Second Succession War, leaving the population to subsist on agriculture for centuries amidst a tainted atmosphere.

column2: Four-fifths of the surface of the planet Styk is covered with various saltwater oceans; dotted around the surface are nine assorted continents of varying sizes. It is heavily industrialised, with Tao MechWorks being a major employer and exporter.
column3: Four-fifths of the surface of the planet Styk is covered with various saltwater oceans; dotted around the surface are nine assorted continents of varying sizes. It is heavily industrialised, with Tao MechWorks being a major employer and exporter.

column2: Styriania was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Styriania was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Styx is a world of storms, flash floods, and mudslides, wild weather patterns caused by the gravitational pull of the planet's three moons. Nevertheless, the storms often reveal rich mineral deposits which make Styx extremely wealthy.
column3: Styx is a world of storms, flash floods, and mudslides, wild weather patterns caused by the gravitational pull of the planet's three moons. Nevertheless, the storms often reveal rich mineral deposits which make Styx extremely wealthy.

column2: Suda Bay is a fleet base at the Nadir jump point of a type F21a star in the Deep Periphery near Ctesiphon and Trelleborg. Ships recharging in the system take 173 hours to recharge.
column3: Suda Bay is a fleet base at the Nadir jump point of a type F21a star in the Deep Periphery near Ctesiphon and Trelleborg. Ships recharging in the system take 173 hours to recharge.

column2: Sudeten circles its brilliant sun at a distance of nearly three astronomical units. A mostly terran planet, it has three continents. Dargoth where the capital city Hammarr is located, Holcomb and Jarho Islands.
column3: Sudeten circles its brilliant sun at a distance of nearly three astronomical units. A mostly terran planet, it has three continents. Dargoth where the capital city Hammarr is located, Holcomb and Jarho Islands.

column2: One of the worlds conquered by the Marian Hegemony, Suetonius provides logistical support to nearby Legions.
column3: One of the worlds conquered by the Marian Hegemony, Suetonius provides logistical support to nearby Legions.

column2: A border world against the Outworlds Alliance, munitions depots were created all across the icy world of Suianheer. Nowadays, the mining colonies occassionally stumble across LosTech and more.
column3: A border world against the Outworlds Alliance, munitions depots were created all across the icy world of Suianheer. Nowadays, the mining colonies occassionally stumble across LosTech and more.

column2: Suk II is a mining world rich in rare and valuable resources. It would be a pleasant world if it were not for poisonous algae that contaminate around half of the world's water and make water purification plants a requirement at all settlements.
column3: Suk II is a mining world rich in rare and valuable resources. It would be a pleasant world if it were not for poisonous algae that contaminate around half of the world's water and make water purification plants a requirement at all settlements.

column2: An beautiful world, it would be a breadbasket if not for the heavy metals poisoning the soil across the most habitable continent, a remnant of Lyran savagery during the First Succession War.
column3: An beautiful world, it would be a breadbasket if not for the heavy metals poisoning the soil across the most habitable continent, a remnant of Lyran savagery during the First Succession War.

column2: During the Star League era, the LXVI Corps had its headquarters located on world, surrounded by mountains on a world covered in them. Sometime during the Succession Wars, the location was lost and it has been hunted for forever since.
column3: During the Star League era, the LXVI Corps had its headquarters located on world, surrounded by mountains on a world covered in them. Sometime during the Succession Wars, the location was lost and it has been hunted for forever since.

column2: Summer has been an important mining world for the last several centuries. It possessed an SLDF garrison before the fall of the Star League and has since been garrisoned by the Lyran armed forces in order to protect the planet from Kuritan raids.
column3: Summer has been an important mining world for the last several centuries. It possessed an SLDF garrison before the fall of the Star League and has since been garrisoned by the Lyran armed forces in order to protect the planet from Kuritan raids.

column2: Summerstide was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Summerstide was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Summit has a unique flat tax rate for it's citizens, which stems from it's role in the initial Outer Reaches Rebellion centuries ago. It does have a surprisingly equalising effects with high rates of contentment amongst the population.
column3: Summit has a unique flat tax rate for it's citizens, which stems from it's role in the initial Outer Reaches Rebellion centuries ago. It does have a surprisingly equalising effects with high rates of contentment amongst the population.

column2: Sumy was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Sumy was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Sunchon was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.
column3: Sunchon was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War but died out during the fighting in the Succession Wars.

column2: Sunnywood is a disingenuously-named barren rock world where an ambitious colony spent centuries dying. Many ruins dot the world as a testament to humanity's optimism.
column3: Sunnywood is a disingenuously-named barren rock world where an ambitious colony spent centuries dying. Many ruins dot the world as a testament to humanity's optimism.

column2: Sun Prairie, famous for it's name sake, is a vast steppe covered world which feeds the population on numerous surrounding worlds.
column3: Sun Prairie, famous for it's name sake, is a vast steppe covered world which feeds the population on numerous surrounding worlds.

column2: Famous for it's Kodiak Bearfish fished from its frozen seas, Surcin is an icy world with a plethora of native aquatic life. Once a major manufacturer of arctic survival wear, it now relies on mass aquatic life exports.
column3: Famous for it's Kodiak Bearfish fished from its frozen seas, Surcin is an icy world with a plethora of native aquatic life. Once a major manufacturer of arctic survival wear, it now relies on mass aquatic life exports.

column2: In 3023 Kurita troops were sent in to break up a Leif Erickson Day celebration sponsored by the Sons of Knute and the Chrysanthemum Cross-Cultural Appreciation Society, which led to the rebellion which resulted in them joining the FRR.
column3: In 3023 Kurita troops were sent in to break up a Leif Erickson Day celebration sponsored by the Sons of Knute and the Chrysanthemum Cross-Cultural Appreciation Society, which led to the rebellion which resulted in them joining the FRR.

column2: When people hear of Susulatna, they think of Susulatna Sultanas, those juicy inch long delights that can be found at many neighbouring worlds. Apart from fruits, Susulatna has a pleasant climate for wealthier Commonwealth citizens to relax at.
column3: When people hear of Susulatna, they think of Susulatna Sultanas, those juicy inch long delights that can be found at many neighbouring worlds. Apart from fruits, Susulatna has a pleasant climate for wealthier Commonwealth citizens to relax at.

column2: Firmly situated amongst the Draconic Combine for centuries, Sutama produces a vast range of citrus fruits and pharmaceuticals for export. The tropical climate of Sutama makes it a vacationing hotspot for higher ranked Nobles of the Combine.
column3: Firmly situated amongst the Draconic Combine for centuries, Sutama produces a vast range of citrus fruits and pharmaceuticals for export. The tropical climate of Sutama makes it a vacationing hotspot for higher ranked Nobles of the Combine.

column2: Famous for Ando Bass fished from its frozen seas, Suzano is an icy world with a plethora of native aquatic life. Once a major manufacturer of light vehicles, it has since suffered in the most recent Succession Wars.

column2: Tamarind is known across the Inner Sphere for the quality of its artwork. Many artists start on Tamarind and charge a premium for their artworks. This was the cause to many raids and combat engagements that took place on the world.

column2: Tau Ceti is famous as the destination of the first manned mission to another star system, when Captain Norm McKenna on the TAS Pathfinder jumped to Tau Ceti and back in 2108, leading to the founding of the first human colony, named New Earth.

column3: A hot inhospitable world, it is nevertheless a bountiful source of rare materials not found on other worlds.

column2: Recently colonised by the Circinus Federation, this icy cold mining colony is a source of precious Germanium for the Federation.
column3: Recently colonised by the Circinus Federation, this icy cold mining colony is a source of precious Germanium for the Federation.

column2: Thala is the capital world of the Axumite Providence. It was first settled in 2239 by colonists fleeing the Terran Alliance. Thala is a lush world with multiple smaller continents and ancient mountain ranges.
column3: Thala is the capital world of the Axumite Providence. It was first settled in 2239 by colonists fleeing the Terran Alliance. Thala is a lush world with multiple smaller continents and ancient mountain ranges.

column2: An agricultural world wracked with storms, the capital city of Thannhausen Gate still maintains some of the most fertile land in the entire Inner Sphere.
column3: An agricultural world wracked with storms, the capital city of Thannhausen Gate still maintains some of the most fertile land in the entire Inner Sphere.

column2: Tharkad is a icy and rugged planet, similar to the arctic wilderness of Terra. The planet consists of five major continents and three major island chains. The largest continent is Bremen and is home to Tharkad City, capital of the Lyran Commonwealth.
column3: Таркад - ледяная и суровая планета, похожая на арктическую область Терры. Планета состоит из пяти основных континентов и трех основных архипелагов. Самый большой континент - Бремен, где находится город Таркад, столица Лиранского Содружества.

column2: Most of the population of Thasos live an agricultural lifestyle maintained by technology of an equivalent to that found on Terra in the late eighteenth or early nineteenth century, a consequence of the heavy influence of the Omniss philosophy.
column3: Most of the population of Thasos live an agricultural lifestyle maintained by technology of an equivalent to that found on Terra in the late eighteenth or early nineteenth century, a consequence of the heavy influence of the Omniss philosophy.

column2: Thazi was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and was part of the Outworlds Alliance until it was abandoned entirely during the First Succession War.
column3: Thazi was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and was part of the Outworlds Alliance until it was abandoned entirely during the First Succession War.

column2: The Edge was one of the worlds invaded by the Lyran Commonwealth during Operation GÖTTERDÄMMERUNG, the major Commonwealth offensive of the Fourth Succession War. The Edge is a significant target due to it's economic and political importance.
column3: The Edge was one of the worlds invaded by the Lyran Commonwealth during Operation GÖTTERDÄMMERUNG, the major Commonwealth offensive of the Fourth Succession War. The Edge is a significant target due to it's economic and political importance.

column2: Named by Explorer Corps, The Eyes in the Dark is a binary star system where both stars are red giants, massive ancient stars, one of which is believed to be within five to ten million years time of core collapse, which would lead to a supernova.
column3: Named by Explorer Corps, The Eyes in the Dark is a binary star system where both stars are red giants, massive ancient stars, one of which is believed to be within five to ten million years time of core collapse, which would lead to a supernova.

column2: Despite regular attack in the Succession Wars the Star League era Kallon Industries facilities still maintain the levels required for production of BattleMechs, such as the Wolverine.
column3: Despite regular attack in the Succession Wars the Star League era Kallon Industries facilities still maintain the levels required for production of BattleMechs, such as the Wolverine.

column2: The Rock consists largely of asteroids and other small bodies orbiting the system primary; a number of these asteroids and bodies are inhabited, although some lack the atmosphere required to be habitable.
column3: The Rock consists largely of asteroids and other small bodies orbiting the system primary; a number of these asteroids and bodies are inhabited, although some lack the atmosphere required to be habitable.

column2: Thessalonika is a relatively poor world in terms of natural resources. Limited to a few petroleum deposits and gemstone veins, the first settlers landed here for a different feature: broad grasslands.
column3: Thessalonika is a relatively poor world in terms of natural resources. Limited to a few petroleum deposits and gemstone veins, the first settlers landed here for a different feature: broad grasslands.

column2: Originally a frozen ball known only for precious metal deposits, a massive meteor strike pushed the planetoid into a closer orbit, rendering the planet habitable.
column3: Originally a frozen ball known only for precious metal deposits, a massive meteor strike pushed the planetoid into a closer orbit, rendering the planet habitable.

column2: Named by Explorer Corps, The Swans Eye is a trinary star system where massive planetoids are forming to create an eye like feature on the star.
column3: Named by Explorer Corps, The Swans Eye is a trinary star system where massive planetoids are forming to create an eye like feature on the star.

column2: A cluster of worlds located far from the Inner Sphere.
column3: A cluster of worlds located far from the Inner Sphere.

column2: A heavily irrigated desert world, most of the agricultural work is automated. It produces many exports, considering it's small size.
column3: A heavily irrigated desert world, most of the agricultural work is automated. It produces many exports, considering it's small size.

column2: Thimphu is a simple agricultural world that was devastated in the Fourth Succession War when a JumpShip crashed into the main colony.
column3: Thimphu is a simple agricultural world that was devastated in the Fourth Succession War when a JumpShip crashed into the main colony.

column2: Thirty Weight was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and was part of the Marik Commonwealth until it was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War.
column3: Thirty Weight was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and was part of the Marik Commonwealth until it was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War.

column2: Thorin is a Terra-like world, which has one moon (Thorin's Twin). It is considered a jewel of a world and is home to much metal and mineral wealth utilised by manufacturers such as Newhart Industries and Johnson-Aldis Weaponries.
column3: Торин – похожий на Землю мир, в котором есть одна луна (Близнец Торина). Он считается жемчужиной миров. На его поверхности обнаружено огромное количество металлов и полезных ископаемых, используемых такими производителями, как Newhart Industries и Johnson-Aldis Weaponries.

column2: Thorn is one of the worlds that form a part of the Deep Periphery nation known as the Hanseatic League.
column3: Thorn is one of the worlds that form a part of the Deep Periphery nation known as the Hanseatic League.

column2: Thraxa is a semi-arctic world on the border between the Magistracy of Canopus and the Marian Hegemony. The northern landmass is tundra, a result of a deliberate conservation policy that keeps the tundra intact between cities and settlements.
column3: Thraxa is a semi-arctic world on the border between the Magistracy of Canopus and the Marian Hegemony. The northern landmass is tundra, a result of a deliberate conservation policy that keeps the tundra intact between cities and settlements.

column2: Thuban is a vast open-environment world with a breathable atmosphere and wide, lava-encrusted plains around Scorpius Mons, the planet's largest highest volcano
column3: Thuban is a vast open-environment world with a breathable atmosphere and wide, lava-encrusted plains around Scorpius Mons, the planet's largest highest volcano

column2: Thule is divided into three large continents. Vik with the capital 'Thule City', Akranes as the agricultural center, whilst Husavik is frozen wasteland with several research posts. Bergan Industries, a major Locust manufacturer, has facilities here.
column3: Thule is divided into three large continents. Vik with the capital 'Thule City', Akranes as the agricultural center, whilst Husavik is frozen wasteland with several research posts. Bergan Industries, a major Locust manufacturer, has facilities here.

column2: Thun is known for it's deep, dry canyons which are often subject to landslips and falls under the high gravity of the world.
column3: Thun is known for it's deep, dry canyons which are often subject to landslips and falls under the high gravity of the world.

column2: The site of a decisive battle between the SLDF and the Magistracy almost 500 years ago, Thurrock has long since recovered from that war and now thrives as a regional industrial and tourism center.
column3: The site of a decisive battle between the SLDF and the Magistracy almost 500 years ago, Thurrock has long since recovered from that war and now thrives as a regional industrial and tourism center.

column2: Tianamon was part of the Sarna Commonality of the Cappelan Confederation, but was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War due to famine.
column3: Tianamon was part of the Sarna Commonality of the Cappelan Confederation, but was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War due to famine.

column2: A large manufacturing center situated on a rich mineral world, Clan Hell Horse and Wolf both have large facilities here.
column3: A large manufacturing center situated on a rich mineral world, Clan Hell Horse and Wolf both have large facilities here.

column2: Tiber is probably best known as the home of Earthwerks Incorporated. Recently the world has been rocked by violence as the labor unions on the world incited their members to riot
column3: Tiber is probably best known as the home of Earthwerks Incorporated. Recently the world has been rocked by violence as the labor unions on the world incited their members to riot

column2: An average agricultural world that produces large amounts of Terran timber. This timber is exported, but before it leaves the world it serves as an obstacle to the severe wind storms. The world is notable only for the Surb Gevorg Manufacturing plant.
column3: An average agricultural world that produces large amounts of Terran timber. This timber is exported, but before it leaves the world it serves as an obstacle to the severe wind storms. The world is notable only for the Surb Gevorg Manufacturing plant.

column2: A well-educated population and the highly industrialized economy make Tigress a significant asset for the controlling house. Large Star League era fusion generators power the cities and provide free power to industry across the world.
column3: A well-educated population and the highly industrialized economy make Tigress a significant asset for the controlling house. Large Star League era fusion generators power the cities and provide free power to industry across the world.

column2: One of the earliest systems colonised, Tikonov has seen more than it's share of conflict.  The numerous Earthwerks (and other) factories has seen it become a battlefield several times, and was most recently taken over by the Feds some 10 years ago.
column3: One of the earliest systems colonised, Tikonov has seen more than it's share of conflict. The numerous Earthwerks (and other) factories has seen it become a battlefield several times, and was most recently taken over by the Feds some 10 years ago.

column2: Timbiqui is home to a major manufacturer, Timbiqui Spirits, which is known throughout the Inner Sphere primarily for its best-known brand of beer, Timbiqui Dark. A favored choice among mercenaries, Timbiqui Dark is even sold in the Deep Periphery.
column3: Timbiqui is home to a major manufacturer, Timbiqui Spirits, which is known throughout the Inner Sphere primarily for its best-known brand of beer, Timbiqui Dark. A favored choice among mercenaries, Timbiqui Dark is even sold in the Deep Periphery.

column2: A dry desert world orbit a K class star, Timbuktu has two continents, Hades and Saharius where the capital city Greene is located. The Timbuktu-based corporation Diplass BattleMechs was destroyed entirely during the Amaris Civil War.
column3: A dry desert world orbit a K class star, Timbuktu has two continents, Hades and Saharius where the capital city Greene is located. The Timbuktu-based corporation Diplass BattleMechs was destroyed entirely during the Amaris Civil War.

column2: An Earth-like planet with an unusually large axial tilt causing extreme seasonal changes. Both the northern and southern hemispheres experience complete darkness for several months at a time.
column3: An Earth-like planet with an unusually large axial tilt causing extreme seasonal changes. Both the northern and southern hemispheres experience complete darkness for several months at a time.

column2: A cold, tundral world at the outer edge of its star's habitable zone. There are no oceans or continents, but the surface is littered with lakes and small seas. Coniferous forests cover much of the surface.
column3: A cold, tundral world at the outer edge of its star's habitable zone. There are no oceans or continents, but the surface is littered with lakes and small seas. Coniferous forests cover much of the surface.

column2: Tinaca has one major continent, 'The Island' where the capital city Tandalola is located. It is home to a live fire training ground often utilised by the Sun Zhang MechWarrior Academy.
column3: Tinaca has one major continent, 'The Island' where the capital city Tandalola is located. It is home to a live fire training ground often utilised by the Sun Zhang MechWarrior Academy.

column2: Tincalunas was abandoned due to natural disasters that make it a marginal colony despite its Terran climate. Intense tidal forces from a nearby gas giant shattered the planet's moon and cause constant volcanism on the surface.
column3: Tincalunas was abandoned due to natural disasters that make it a marginal colony despite its Terran climate. Intense tidal forces from a nearby gas giant shattered the planet's moon and cause constant volcanism on the surface.

column2: In 2412, FWLM force invaded Tintavel. The battle escalated until both sides employed weapons of mass destruction, leading to over 300,000 casualties and abandonment of the planet. The tragedy caused all sides to meet and form the Ares convention.
column3: In 2412, FWLM force invaded Tintavel. The battle escalated until both sides employed weapons of mass destruction, leading to over 300,000 casualties and abandonment of the planet. The tragedy caused all sides to meet and form the Ares convention.

column2: Tirabad was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War.
column3: Tirabad was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War.

column2: Tiruchchirappalli was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War.
column3: Tiruchchirappalli was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War.

column2: An extremely hot planet. Mostly desert but with some small seas in the northern and southern hemispheres. The equatorial regions are too hot for most species, and so the only settlements are situated in the extreme polar regions.
column3: An extremely hot planet. Mostly desert but with some small seas in the northern and southern hemispheres. The equatorial regions are too hot for most species, and so the only settlements are situated in the extreme polar regions.

column2: A hot prison world with a nitrogen/oxygen atmosphere. This planet was once covered with lush rainforest, but was burnt away during the First Succession War.
column3: A hot prison world with a nitrogen/oxygen atmosphere. This planet was once covered with lush rainforest, but was burnt away during the First Succession War.

column2: A large rocky planet with high gravity and a thin atmosphere. The atmosphere only extends about 1 mile above sea level, and many mountain tops are exposed to the vacuum of space. Habitable areas are in the deep valleys between mountain ranges.
column3: A large rocky planet with high gravity and a thin atmosphere. The atmosphere only extends about 1 mile above sea level, and many mountain tops are exposed to the vacuum of space. Habitable areas are in the deep valleys between mountain ranges.

column2: Tiverton is a lush water world, with archipelagos of volcanic islands strewn all around the surface. Fishing and algae farming are the backbone industries, but it's also known for being a haven for organized crime and piracy.
column3: Tiverton is a lush water world, with archipelagos of volcanic islands strewn all around the surface. Fishing and algae farming are the backbone industries, but it's also known for being a haven for organized crime and piracy.

column2: An enormous gas giant at the outer edge of its star's habitable zone. It supports a system of small to medium-sized moons. One of the moons has a breathable nitrogen/oxygen atmosphere but is not considered habitable due to extremes of temperature.
column3: An enormous gas giant at the outer edge of its star's habitable zone. It supports a system of small to medium-sized moons. One of the moons has a breathable nitrogen/oxygen atmosphere but is not considered habitable due to extremes of temperature.

column2: Toffen is an arid world with a meagre population largely made up of isolationist loners living on scattered farms.
column3: Toffen is an arid world with a meagre population largely made up of isolationist loners living on scattered farms.

column2: During the Star League era, Togura was rich in much-needed industrial metals and rare earths which turned it into a heavily industrialised world. Even now, numerous companies such as Stellar Trek and Osaka Heavy Metrics maintain shipyards in orbit.
column3: During the Star League era, Togura was rich in much-needed industrial metals and rare earths which turned it into a heavily industrialised world. Even now, numerous companies such as Stellar Trek and Osaka Heavy Metrics maintain shipyards in orbit.

column2: A small world with extremely low gravity, about the size of Earth's moon. The planet is home to the 'Jump-World Low Gravity Theme Park', which is situated inside a giant glass dome for the safety and breathing-comfort of its visitors.
column3: A small world with extremely low gravity, about the size of Earth's moon. The planet is home to the 'Jump-World Low Gravity Theme Park', which is situated inside a giant glass dome for the safety and breathing-comfort of its visitors.

column2: A small Earth-like planet with oceans and several large continents typified by open grassland regions. The planet serves as an agricultural colony, with large farms covering much of its surface.
column3: A small Earth-like planet with oceans and several large continents typified by open grassland regions. The planet serves as an agricultural colony, with large farms covering much of its surface.

column2: Tokasha's most notable feature is the high levels of oxygen in its atmosphere. The planet has wide ranges of oceans and lush wilderness of forests and jungles. The native animal life is highly hostile to terrestrial based life.
column3: Tokasha's most notable feature is the high levels of oxygen in its atmosphere. The planet has wide ranges of oceans and lush wilderness of forests and jungles. The native animal life is highly hostile to terrestrial based life.

column2: A vastly populated jungle world with many untapped resources. Alshain Weapons is headquartered on Tok Do and produces light BattleMechs for the Draconis Combine.
column3: A vastly populated jungle world with many untapped resources. Alshain Weapons is headquartered on Tok Do and produces light BattleMechs for the Draconis Combine.

column2: Toland was settled by a mixture of artists and craftsmen fleeing from the First Succession War. Toland has three moons, expanses of jungle and natural resources that include rare minerals.
column3: Toland was settled by a mixture of artists and craftsmen fleeing from the First Succession War. Toland has three moons, expanses of jungle and natural resources that include rare minerals.

column2: Deep within the Hanseatic League, Tomalov exports many foodstuffs to other Hanseatic Worlds.
column3: Deep within the Hanseatic League, Tomalov exports many foodstuffs to other Hanseatic Worlds.

column2: Tomans is home to the Lyran Biomaterials Complex, a vast research complex that researches and manufactures new materials.
column3: Tomans is home to the Lyran Biomaterials Complex, a vast research complex that researches and manufactures new materials.

column2: Tongatapu is an arid world that is rich in high grade ores and material. It's surface is dotted with mines owned by Technicron Manufacturing which produce raw material which is then shipped to Tamarind, their JumpShip shipyard.
column3: Tongatapu is an arid world that is rich in high grade ores and material. It's surface is dotted with mines owned by Technicron Manufacturing which produce raw material which is then shipped to Tamarind, their JumpShip shipyard.

column2: Tordenskjold was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War.
column3: Tordenskjold was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War.

column2: Torgvei was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was wiped out during the First Succession War.
column3: Torgvei was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was wiped out during the First Succession War.

column2: An Earth-like planet with an unusually large axial tilt causing extreme seasonal changes. Both the northern and southern hemispheres experience harsh winters, with cold nights that can last for weeks or months at a time depending on latitude.
column3: An Earth-like planet with an unusually large axial tilt causing extreme seasonal changes. Both the northern and southern hemispheres experience harsh winters, with cold nights that can last for weeks or months at a time depending on latitude.

column2: An icy world with vast underground caverns and unique fauna, Torrence is home to military manufacturer Veridian Dynamics and one of the largest pharmaceutical companies in the Suns, Vinson Pharmaceuticals.
column3: An icy world with vast underground caverns and unique fauna, Torrence is home to military manufacturer Veridian Dynamics and one of the largest pharmaceutical companies in the Suns, Vinson Pharmaceuticals.

column2: The Tortuga Prime system was settled by the remains of the 237th Light Cavalry Regiment in the closing stages of the Reunification War. It is the Capital of the bandit kingdom known as the Tortuga Dominions.
column3: Система Тортуга Прайм была заселена остатками 237-го полка легкой кавалерии на завершающих этапах Войны за воссоединение. Это столица бандитского королевства, известного как Доминионы Тортуги.

column2: Toten was settled during the Star League era due to it's asteroid field rich in germanium, a vital material for JumpShip construction. As such a vital target, it was destroyed utterly during the violence of the First Succession War.
column3: Toten was settled during the Star League era due to it's asteroid field rich in germanium, a vital material for JumpShip construction. As such a vital target, it was destroyed utterly during the violence of the First Succession War.

column2: Totness was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War.
column3: Totness was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War.

column2: Tottori was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was devastated and abandoned during the Second Succession War.
column3: Tottori was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was devastated and abandoned during the Second Succession War.

column2: Tovetin (Tovetine) was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was destroyed entirely during the Third Succession War.
column3: Tovetin (Tovetine) was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was destroyed entirely during the Third Succession War.

column2: Towne is a slightly cooler Terran world which boasts good mineral and lumber wealth. The many active volcanoes and other geological activities continue to give the impression that the world is bigger than it actually is.
column3: Towne is a slightly cooler Terran world which boasts good mineral and lumber wealth. The many active volcanoes and other geological activities continue to give the impression that the world is bigger than it actually is.

column2: A small Earth-like planet with approximately half the gravity of Earth. The planet is dotted with many small islands and a large continent covers the northern polar region. Much of the exports from Trasjkis are in the form of aquatic food.
column3: A small Earth-like planet with approximately half the gravity of Earth. The planet is dotted with many small islands and a large continent covers the northern polar region. Much of the exports from Trasjkis are in the form of aquatic food.

column2: Traussin was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War.
column3: Traussin was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War.

column2: Winfield was originally named Treeline, but was gifted to the commander of the Stealths, Colonel Raymond Winfield, by Archon Elizabeth Steiner after their destruction in the conquest of Sakhalin in 2863 and renamed \"Winfield\" in his honour.
column3: Winfield was originally named Treeline, but was gifted to the commander of the Stealths, Colonel Raymond Winfield, by Archon Elizabeth Steiner after their destruction in the conquest of Sakhalin in 2863 and renamed "Winfield" in his honour.

column2: A planetary year on Trellwan is only 45 standard days, while a planetary day is 30.5 standard days due to the planet's slow rotation. As a result, vulcanism and earthquakes are common and the climatic changes are quite abrupt and severe.
column3: Планетарный год на Треллване составляет всего 45 стандартных дней, в то время как планетарный день составляет 30,5 стандартных дней из-за медленного вращения планеты. В результате вулканизм и землетрясения являются обычным явлением, а климатические изменения довольно резкими и серьезными.

column2: SURVEY DATA INCOMPLETE
column3: SURVEY DATA INCOMPLETE

column2: Trellisane was settled by rabid democrats with the excitement to enact a direct democracy. It did not last until a novel solution was found only allowing a third of the population to vote on a rotating basis.
column3: Trellisane was settled by rabid democrats with the excitement to enact a direct democracy. It did not last until a novel solution was found only allowing a third of the population to vote on a rotating basis.

column2: An enormous super-earth planet with a breathable nitrogen/oxygen atmosphere but extremely high gravity. One large continent stretches from the north pole to the south pole. Forests of carnivorous plants cover much of the landmass.
column3: An enormous super-earth planet with a breathable nitrogen/oxygen atmosphere but extremely high gravity. One large continent stretches from the north pole to the south pole. Forests of carnivorous plants cover much of the landmass.

column2: An ocean world with few large landmasses but thousands of tiny islands. The islands of Northern Trentham are famous for their petrified forests. Nearby islands are used for training, weapons testing, and secretive research facilities.
column3: An ocean world with few large landmasses but thousands of tiny islands. The islands of Northern Trentham are famous for their petrified forests. Nearby islands are used for training, weapons testing, and secretive research facilities.

column2: Tresspass was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War after substantial bombardment.
column3: Tresspass was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War after substantial bombardment.

column2: An industrialised world during the Star League, Triesting was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison. In the First Succession War the factories were erased from existence, leaving only scant remains which still exist today.
column3: An industrialised world during the Star League, Triesting was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison. In the First Succession War the factories were erased from existence, leaving only scant remains which still exist today.

column2: A lifeless planet with an economy centered around gambling. Aside from a few uranium mines, gambling is the only industry on the planet. Loose gaming laws are the only reason this backwater colony exists.
column3: A lifeless planet with an economy centered around gambling. Aside from a few uranium mines, gambling is the only industry on the planet. Loose gaming laws are the only reason this backwater colony exists.

column2: Trinidad has three heavily populated continents: Arawak, Galibi, and Raleigh. The capital city, Warao, is located on Raleigh.
column3: Trinidad has three heavily populated continents: Arawak, Galibi, and Raleigh. The capital city, Warao, is located on Raleigh.

column2: SURVEY DATA INCOMPLETE
column3: SURVEY DATA INCOMPLETE

column2: A terrestrial planet with an extremely slow axial rotation. Forests of giant fungal organisms dominate much of the surface. In orbit are three heavily fortified moons.
column3: A terrestrial planet with an extremely slow axial rotation. Forests of giant fungal organisms dominate much of the surface. In orbit are three heavily fortified moons.

column2: An almost lifeless rock with no atmosphere, about the size of Earth's moon. A few uranium mines are the only signs of life here, and they're mostly automated. Rumours of Star League caches hidden under the surface keep the population busy though.
column3: An almost lifeless rock with no atmosphere, about the size of Earth's moon. A few uranium mines are the only signs of life here, and they're mostly automated. Rumours of Star League caches hidden under the surface keep the population busy though.

column2: A former Combine world that is now a key planet in the Free Rasalhague Republic.  Recent vulcanic activity has brought a plethora of mineral deposits to the surface, making this an important mining planet for the FRR.
column3: A former Combine world that is now a key planet in the Free Rasalhague Republic. Recent vulcanic activity has brought a plethora of mineral deposits to the surface, making this an important mining planet for the FRR.

column2: Trondheim is home to some of the JàrnFòlk's few heavy industries, concentrated around the capital city of Narvik, and is where all of the parts for their various starships are manufactured and shuttled to orbiting dry docks.
column3: Трондхейм является домом для некоторых из немногих предприятий тяжелой промышленности Ярнфолка, сосредоточенных вокруг города-столицы Нарвик, и именно здесь производятся все детали для их различных звездолетов, которые после доставляются в доки на орбите для сборки.

column2: Primarily an iron and processed steel heavy goods manufacturing world, Trondheimal is a vital part of the growing Illyrian Palatinate economy. Habitable areas are restricted to the mountain sides.
column3: Primarily an iron and processed steel heavy goods manufacturing world, Trondheimal is a vital part of the growing Illyrian Palatinate economy. Habitable areas are restricted to the mountain sides.

column2: Once a desert planet with vast irrigated flood plains, Truth was devastated in the Third Succession War. Most of the populated die of famine, leaving only a few token hardy survivors on the surface.
column3: Once a desert planet with vast irrigated flood plains, Truth was devastated in the Third Succession War. Most of the populated die of famine, leaving only a few token hardy survivors on the surface.

column2: The Trznadel Cluster is a quaternion system, containing numerous mineral rich planets, which are mined to power the Magistracy of Canopus's industrial base.
column3: The Trznadel Cluster is a quaternion system, containing numerous mineral rich planets, which are mined to power the Magistracy of Canopus's industrial base.

column2: Originally named Tsunami, Tsamma was settled as an agricultural world. The many turbulent oceans have a low salt content which make it easy to create potable water. This has made Tsamma the largest exporter of drinking water in fifty light years.
column3: Originally named Tsunami, Tsamma was settled as an agricultural world. The many turbulent oceans have a low salt content which make it easy to create potable water. This has made Tsamma the largest exporter of drinking water in fifty light years.

column2: An ocean world with a breathable nitrogen/oxygen atmosphere. Only a single island-continent rises above sea-level. While the ocean is teeming with complex life, only single-celled organisms have ventured onto the land.
column3: An ocean world with a breathable nitrogen/oxygen atmosphere. Only a single island-continent rises above sea-level. While the ocean is teeming with complex life, only single-celled organisms have ventured onto the land.

column2: A small rocky planet in the Lagrange point of a gas giant. The planet has no atmosphere, but incredibly there is life here, living in large underground reservoirs of water.
column3: A small rocky planet in the Lagrange point of a gas giant. The planet has no atmosphere, but incredibly there is life here, living in large underground reservoirs of water.

column2: A small, flat, muddy planet. There are no oceans, instead the surface is covered with a shallow layer of water. A single moon creates a strong tidal effect, making the entire planet a tidal mudflat - perfect for certain crops and brewing of beer.

column2: Tsitsang's warm and temperate climate allows the colonists are able to enjoy three full growing seasons on each of the three continents on the planet, all of which were located on the equator.

column2: From orbit this tropical paradise looks idyllic, however the wildlife draws energy from nitrogen rather than oxygen, and are completely inedible. All food must be imported to Tsukude but the vast amounts of rare gases are a major export.
