column2: A small Earth-like planet with a thin nitrogen/oxygen atmosphere. A long, narrow continent follows the line of the equator, stretching half way around the planet. The most successful creatures on the planet are large protomammals.
column3: A small Earth-like planet with a thin nitrogen/oxygen atmosphere. A long, narrow continent follows the line of the equator, stretching half way around the planet. The most successful creatures on the planet are large protomammals.

column2: Tuat was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but it was abandoned before the Third Succession War. It was once host to a large SLDF garrison, which means rumours of LosTech caches are rampant.

column2: This picturesque world offers a multitude of different terrain, with many religious monasteries dotting it's surface. Pretty unremarkable and will be resigned to be forgotten in the history books...
column3: Тукайид представляет из себя засушливый мир, состоящий в основном из больших травянистых равнин, которыми владеют сельскохозяйственные компании. Несколько религиозных течений построили свои монастыри в изолированных местах по всей планете. На протяжении веков на планете было небольшое население без централизованного управления.

column2: The surface of Untran is an endless bleak desert, with scouring winds and sand. It's honeycombed with caves, where the original Capellan colonists harvested precious stones and ores. The planet has no agriculture at all; when it was abandoned, the colonies withered and died.

column3: Vega is a world rich in minerals, metallic ores, and fresh water. It is home to numerous manufacturers and research complexes such as Cosby Myomer Research Firm

column2: The Velhas system was colonized at some point during the Star League era after the end of the Reunification War. The Fourth Donegal Guards have a large training range amongst the mudflats and have often been sighted in the area.
column3: The Velhas system was colonized at some point during the Star League era after the end of the Reunification War. The Fourth Donegal Guards have a large training range amongst the mudflats and have often been sighted in the area.

column2: The Venaria system was colonized either during or shortly before the Age of War. During the final years of the Star League, Venaria was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison.
column3: The Venaria system was colonized either during or shortly before the Age of War. During the final years of the Star League, Venaria was the host to a Star League Defense Force garrison.

column2: Vendrell has two moons named Ying and Yang and is been home to manufacturing facilities operated by the noted defense manufacturer Mountain Wolf BattleMechs.
column3: Vendrell has two moons named Ying and Yang and is been home to manufacturing facilities operated by the noted defense manufacturer Mountain Wolf BattleMechs.

column2: The Ventabren system was colonised during the First Exodus from Terra. During the Third Succession War, it suffered a Scorched Earth campaign which resulted in a hefty rebuilding effort after the war.
column3: The Ventabren system was colonised during the First Exodus from Terra. During the Third Succession War, it suffered a Scorched Earth campaign which resulted in a hefty rebuilding effort after the war.

column2: The Verde system was colonised during the First Exodus from Terra. Whilst the planetside population is poor, the lucrative mining facilities on the asteroid belt provide heavy raw materials to Galtor Naval Yards in the Exeter System.
column3: The Verde system was colonised during the First Exodus from Terra. Whilst the planetside population is poor, the lucrative mining facilities on the asteroid belt provide heavy raw materials to Galtor Naval Yards in the Exeter System.

column2: The Verdigreis system was colonized at some point prior to the end of the Age of War, and by the eve of the Reunification War was a member of the Taurian Concordat, but fell to the Federated Suns during the First Succession War.
column3: The Verdigreis system was colonized at some point prior to the end of the Age of War, and by the eve of the Reunification War was a member of the Taurian Concordat, but fell to the Federated Suns during the First Succession War.

column2: The Verdinge system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and was a member of the Federated Suns until it was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War.
column3: The Verdinge system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and was a member of the Federated Suns until it was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War.

column2: The Vereeniging system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War due to famine.
column3: The Vereeniging system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War due to famine.

column2: Constant earthquakes and volcanic eruptions shake the surface of Verlo, a highly volatile world. Rich mineral deposits exist here for those brave enough to endure the harsh climate.
column3: Constant earthquakes and volcanic eruptions shake the surface of Verlo, a highly volatile world. Rich mineral deposits exist here for those brave enough to endure the harsh climate.

column2: The Vermezzo system settled during or shortly before the Age of War, and remained Lyran for centuries. It is known the Óleo Reserve, a very rich deposit of petroleum, notable for being the largest in the local region of space.
column3: The Vermezzo system settled during or shortly before the Age of War, and remained Lyran for centuries. It is known the Óleo Reserve, a very rich deposit of petroleum, notable for being the largest in the local region of space.

column2: Settled during the Star League era, Versailles vanished from maps during the First Succession War, which suggests that the system had been abandoned or depopulated, though there is evidence that the system was removed from most maps by ComStar.
column3: Settled during the Star League era, Versailles vanished from maps during the First Succession War, which suggests that the system had been abandoned or depopulated, though there is evidence that the system was removed from most maps by ComStar.

column2: Vestallas was known to hold the Capellan Confederation's treasure. Its underground vaults contained priceless works of art; precious stones; bars of gold, silver, and germanium; and hard currency from the Confederation and other Successor States.
column3: Vestallas was known to hold the Capellan Confederation's treasure. Its underground vaults contained priceless works of art; precious stones; bars of gold, silver, and germanium; and hard currency from the Confederation and other Successor States.

column2: Viborg itself is described as a \"garden world\", and the population preferred to import ores and steel from the abundant asteroid belts via the Penance mining habitat over mining the planet itself.
column3: Viborg itself is described as a "garden world", and the population preferred to import ores and steel from the abundant asteroid belts via the Penance mining habitat over mining the planet itself.

column2: The Vibrunum system was settled during or shortly before the Age of War. The system mainly provides agricultural produce to nearby manufacturing worlds.
column3: The Vibrunum system was settled during or shortly before the Age of War. The system mainly provides agricultural produce to nearby manufacturing worlds.

column2: The Vicente system settled during or shortly before the Age of War. The system mainly provides agricultural produce to nearby manufacturing worlds.
column3: The Vicente system settled during or shortly before the Age of War. The system mainly provides agricultural produce to nearby manufacturing worlds.

column2: The Vicksland system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War.
column3: The Vicksland system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War.

column2: The administrative capital of its Capellan Confederation Commonality, Victoria is famous for its violently bad weather, underground cities, and beautiful domed parks. Many industries take advantage of the local natural resources.
column3: The administrative capital of its Capellan Confederation Commonality, Victoria is famous for its violently bad weather, underground cities, and beautiful domed parks. Many industries take advantage of the local natural resources.

column2: The Victralla system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War.
column3: The Victralla system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War.

column2: The Vihtijarvi system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. The system mainly provides agricultural produce to nearby manufacturing worlds.
column3: The Vihtijarvi system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. The system mainly provides agricultural produce to nearby manufacturing worlds.

column2: The Vikindu system was settled during or shortly before the Age of War and by the end of that era was a part of the Free Worlds League. The harsh desert climate prevents growth of most crops, requiring large amounts of imports for the population.
column3: The Vikindu system was settled during or shortly before the Age of War and by the end of that era was a part of the Free Worlds League. The harsh desert climate prevents growth of most crops, requiring large amounts of imports for the population.

column2: Villanueva is a lightly-settled, extremely humid water planet. Most of the inhabitants are engaged in food production and processing, and live in small settlements around automated facilities.
column3: Villanueva is a lightly-settled, extremely humid water planet. Most of the inhabitants are engaged in food production and processing, and live in small settlements around automated facilities.

column2: The Villuisk system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and was part of the short lived Finmark Free Republic until it was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War.
column3: The Villuisk system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and was part of the short lived Finmark Free Republic until it was abandoned entirely during the Second Succession War.

column2: Vindemiatrix is best known for the Vindemiatrix Observatory, a university that focuses almost completely on stellar life cycles and planetology.
column3: Vindemiatrix is best known for the Vindemiatrix Observatory, a university that focuses almost completely on stellar life cycles and planetology.

column2: The Vinstra system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and was part of the Outworlds Alliance until it was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War.
column3: The Vinstra system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and was part of the Outworlds Alliance until it was abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War.

column2: The Vinton system was colonized during the Golden Century. In 3011 a comet passed close enough to the Diamond Shark naval cache in the system to damage the WarShips significantly enough to prevent them being restored to active service.
column3: The Vinton system was colonized during the Golden Century. In 3011 a comet passed close enough to the Diamond Shark naval cache in the system to damage the WarShips significantly enough to prevent them being restored to active service.

column2: The Vintru system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. Vintru was conquered by the Federated Suns during the Second Succession War and abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War
column3: The Vintru system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. Vintru was conquered by the Federated Suns during the Second Succession War and abandoned entirely during the Third Succession War

column2: One of the founding worlds of the Rasalhague Consortium, Vipaava enjoys a temperate climate and a healthy industry.
column3: One of the founding worlds of the Rasalhague Consortium, Vipaava enjoys a temperate climate and a healthy industry.

column2: The Virentofta system was colonised at some point prior to the end of the Reunification War by colonists of Scandinavian descent, who settled into the arctic conditions admirably well.
column3: The Virentofta system was colonised at some point prior to the end of the Reunification War by colonists of Scandinavian descent, who settled into the arctic conditions admirably well.

column2: The airless world of Viribium was a critical military base, defending Liao's border from the Free Worlds League. The League seized the base in the Second Succession War, and then abandoned it, detonating nuclear devices inside the facilities before leaving.
column3: The airless world of Viribium was a critical military base, defending Liao's border from the Free Worlds League. The League seized the base in the Second Succession War, and then abandoned it, detonating nuclear devices inside the facilities before leaving.

column2: The Viroflay system was settled during the Star League era, and was a known pirate haven with a large human trafficking operation, until it was destroyed in the Succession Wars.
column3: The Viroflay system was settled during the Star League era, and was a known pirate haven with a large human trafficking operation, until it was destroyed in the Succession Wars.

column2: The capital city of Redlight on Virtue is the headquarters of Virtue Cartographers Unlimited, the premier starmap makers in the Lyran Commonwealth, rivaling the expertise of even the ComStar Cartographic Corps.
column3: The capital city of Redlight on Virtue is the headquarters of Virtue Cartographers Unlimited, the premier starmap makers in the Lyran Commonwealth, rivaling the expertise of even the ComStar Cartographic Corps.

column2: An oceanic planet filled with islands, Visby offers fresh aquatic life to nearby worlds.
column3: An oceanic planet filled with islands, Visby offers fresh aquatic life to nearby worlds.

column2: Depopulated in the Succession Wars, a small consortium of Canopian corporations have resettled the world as a skiing and winter sports resort for wealthy patrons.
column3: Depopulated in the Succession Wars, a small consortium of Canopian corporations have resettled the world as a skiing and winter sports resort for wealthy patrons.

column2: The Voehn system was settled during the Star League era, and was a minor colony on the periphery of the Outworlds Alliance, until the Third Succession War when it was abandoned along with many other worlds.
column3: The Voehn system was settled during the Star League era, and was a minor colony on the periphery of the Outworlds Alliance, until the Third Succession War when it was abandoned along with many other worlds.

column2: The Volders system was settled shortly after the First Exodus from Terra. During the Fourth Succession War a massive cache of Star League Mechs and weapons were discovered by Snords Irregulars.
column3: The Volders system was settled shortly after the First Exodus from Terra. During the Fourth Succession War a massive cache of Star League Mechs and weapons were discovered by Snords Irregulars.

column2: The Vonja system was settled during the Star League era, and became a minor colony on the periphery of the Outworlds Alliance, until the Third Succession War when it was abandoned.
column3: The Vonja system was settled during the Star League era, and became a minor colony on the periphery of the Outworlds Alliance, until the Third Succession War when it was abandoned.

column2: The Vorarlberg system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra and by the end of the Age of War was a part of the Lyran Commonwealth. It was heavily damaged during the Second Succession War, and is an contested world thanks to it's factories.
column3: The Vorarlberg system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra and by the end of the Age of War was a part of the Lyran Commonwealth. It was heavily damaged during the Second Succession War, and is an contested world thanks to it's factories.

column2: The Vortalcoy system was either settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned after the main colony was destroyed during the First Succession War in a chemical weapons strike.
column3: The Vortalcoy system was either settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned after the main colony was destroyed during the First Succession War in a chemical weapons strike.

column2: The Vorzel system was settled at some point during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the Protectorate of Donegal prior to the formation of the Lyran Commonwealth.
column3: The Vorzel system was settled at some point during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the Protectorate of Donegal prior to the formation of the Lyran Commonwealth.

column2: The Vosloorus system was settled at some point during the Age of War, and was a member of the Free Worlds League by the end of that era. Pharmaceuticals are researched produced in vast amounts here, thanks to the unique fungi growing on the planet.
column3: The Vosloorus system was settled at some point during the Age of War, and was a member of the Free Worlds League by the end of that era. Pharmaceuticals are researched produced in vast amounts here, thanks to the unique fungi growing on the planet.

column2: The Vulcan system was colonised by the Lyran Commonwealth during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. The arid and rocky climate of the world leaves it quite defensible.
column3: The Vulcan system was colonised by the Lyran Commonwealth during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. The arid and rocky climate of the world leaves it quite defensible.

column2: The Vulture's Nest system was either settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned during the Second Succession War after pirates conquered and pillaged the system.
column3: The Vulture's Nest system was either settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned during the Second Succession War after pirates conquered and pillaged the system.

column2: The Waddesdon system was settled before the Reunification War, and has remained part of the Draconis Combine for centuries. It's vast mudflats cover a large collection of Star League era vaults, many of which are still being found to this day.
column3: The Waddesdon system was settled before the Reunification War, and has remained part of the Draconis Combine for centuries. It's vast mudflats cover a large collection of Star League era vaults, many of which are still being found to this day.

column2: The Waimalu system was settled before the Age of War, and has remained part of the Federated Suns for centuries. It is a lagely agricultural world with the finest meats cut from the avian creatures that inhabit the second continent.
column3: The Waimalu system was settled before the Age of War, and has remained part of the Federated Suns for centuries. It is a lagely agricultural world with the finest meats cut from the avian creatures that inhabit the second continent.

column2: The Waina Point system was either settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned during the Second Succession War after the capital city was destroyed in a nuclear attack.
column3: The Waina Point system was either settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned during the Second Succession War after the capital city was destroyed in a nuclear attack.

column2: The Waipahu system was settled before the Age of War, and has remained part of the Federated Suns for centuries. It has a low tech but heavy industrial base which continues to churn out parts for ground forces, and a growing narcotics trade.
column3: The Waipahu system was settled before the Age of War, and has remained part of the Federated Suns for centuries. It has a low tech but heavy industrial base which continues to churn out parts for ground forces, and a growing narcotics trade.

column2: The Waitur system was either settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned during the Third Succession War as famine struck.
column3: The Waitur system was either settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but was abandoned during the Third Succession War as famine struck.

column2: The Waldheim system was settled before or during the Reunification War. A high gravity world known for it's rugged nature, many ground forces train here to simulate mountainous battles.
column3: The Waldheim system was settled before or during the Reunification War. A high gravity world known for it's rugged nature, many ground forces train here to simulate mountainous battles.

column2: Waldorff is the second planet in the system and has a single moon named Nikola. The capital of Waldorff City is known for it's cavernous storm drains used for illegal racing, a dangerous pursuit in light of the savage storms that can hit the world.
column3: Waldorff is the second planet in the system and has a single moon named Nikola. The capital of Waldorff City is known for it's cavernous storm drains used for illegal racing, a dangerous pursuit in light of the savage storms that can hit the world.

column2: The Wallacia system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and had a training ground amongst the vast mudflats created for the Second Oriente Hussars.
column3: The Wallacia system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and had a training ground amongst the vast mudflats created for the Second Oriente Hussars.

column2: Wallis is the sixth planet in the system and has a single moon. Wallis is home to factories belonging to at least one significant defense manufacturer, Ronin Incorporated. Vuzar, the seventh planet, is an icy retreat for wealthier citizens.
column3: Wallis is the sixth planet in the system and has a single moon. Wallis is home to factories belonging to at least one significant defense manufacturer, Ronin Incorporated. Vuzar, the seventh planet, is an icy retreat for wealthier citizens.

column2: The Wantorill system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but suffered famine during the Third Succession War, leaving it depopulated.
column3: The Wantorill system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but suffered famine during the Third Succession War, leaving it depopulated.

column2: Wapakoneta is an oceanic world, with the local economy largely based around exporting aquaculture-grown marine life, although the planet had many small, beautiful islands suitable for tourism.
column3: Wapakoneta is an oceanic world, with the local economy largely based around exporting aquaculture-grown marine life, although the planet had many small, beautiful islands suitable for tourism.

column2: Large canyons and heavy seismic activity make mining activities dangerous on Wappingers - but also highly lucrative. High risk, high reward is often their motto.
column3: Large canyons and heavy seismic activity make mining activities dangerous on Wappingers - but also highly lucrative. High risk, high reward is often their motto.

column2: Ward is a warm water planet with one small continent. The utopian ideals of Ward's original settlers remain strong in its population of 1.5 billion, and the planet thrives based on their reputation for solid construction work.
column3: Ward is a warm water planet with one small continent. The utopian ideals of Ward's original settlers remain strong in its population of 1.5 billion, and the planet thrives based on their reputation for solid construction work.

column2: Located relatively close to the Deep Periphery systems known as Cambridge and Trinity, the Wark system primary is a type G0V star.
column3: Located relatively close to the Deep Periphery systems known as Cambridge and Trinity, the Wark system primary is a type G0V star.

column2: Warlock is the third planet in the system and has a single moon named Blackguard. Warlock is the home to at least one facility operated by Ceres Metals Industries while Blackguard is the site of a substantial naval repair base.
column3: Warlock is the third planet in the system and has a single moon named Blackguard. Warlock is the home to at least one facility operated by Ceres Metals Industries while Blackguard is the site of a substantial naval repair base.

column2: An unremarkable agro world, it's capital city of Hutch contains a massive memorial hall dedicated to the Third Dragonlords regiment, of whom lost many members centuries ago in a tragic dropship accident.
column3: An unremarkable agro world, it's capital city of Hutch contains a massive memorial hall dedicated to the Third Dragonlords regiment, of whom lost many members centuries ago in a tragic dropship accident.

column2: The Warrumbungle system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but the atmosphere was boiled away during the fighting in the Second Succession War, leaving it depopulated.
column3: The Warrumbungle system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but the atmosphere was boiled away during the fighting in the Second Succession War, leaving it depopulated.

column2: The Wasat system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra and was a major industrial world for the Star League. The ruins of many Castle Brian's can be found across the planet, a source of LosTech.
column3: The Wasat system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra and was a major industrial world for the Star League. The ruins of many Castle Brian's can be found across the planet, a source of LosTech.

column2: The Washburn system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra. Washburn II is the second planet in the Washburn system and has three moons named Cephas, Elihu and Israel. Washburn has been home to a refit facility operated by Irian Technologies.
column3: The Washburn system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra. Washburn II is the second planet in the Washburn system and has three moons named Cephas, Elihu and Israel. Washburn has been home to a refit facility operated by Irian Technologies.

column2: The Watermael system was settled during the Age of War and then became a member of the Free Worlds League. The 21st Royal Division of the SLDF fought on this world centuries ago, and rumours exist of Star League weapons caches hidden away here.
column3: The Watermael system was settled during the Age of War and then became a member of the Free Worlds League. The 21st Royal Division of the SLDF fought on this world centuries ago, and rumours exist of Star League weapons caches hidden away here.

column2: Waunakee was liberated by the Federated Suns during the first majorcounter-offensive of the First Succession War against the Draconis Combine. Centuries later, the industrial base has still not recovered to Star League era levels.
column3: Waunakee was liberated by the Federated Suns during the first majorcounter-offensive of the First Succession War against the Draconis Combine. Centuries later, the industrial base has still not recovered to Star League era levels.

column2: The Waxell system was settled during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra. Since the Third Succession War, it's factories and industrial base have been exporting large amounts of polymers to nearby worlds.
column3: The Waxell system was settled during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra. Since the Third Succession War, it's factories and industrial base have been exporting large amounts of polymers to nearby worlds.

column2: The Waycross system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but the atmosphere was boiled away during the fighting in the Second Succession War, leaving it depopulated.
column3: The Waycross system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, but the atmosphere was boiled away during the fighting in the Second Succession War, leaving it depopulated.

column2: The Waypoint system was settled during the Star League era, but the population eked out a meager living until recently. They have recently signed a deal for a HPG with Comstar however.
column3: The Waypoint system was settled during the Star League era, but the population eked out a meager living until recently. They have recently signed a deal for a HPG with Comstar however.

column2: Waypoint 531 consists of a red giant sun and \"The Brothers\", four large asteroids in varying orbits around the star. The THS Yosemite, a Terran Hegemony colony JumpShip, was lost here over five hundred years ago.
column3: Waypoint 531 consists of a red giant sun and "The Brothers", four large asteroids in varying orbits around the star. The THS Yosemite, a Terran Hegemony colony JumpShip, was lost here over five hundred years ago.

column2: An oft traded world, Wazan is nevertheless full of surprises with it's deep mines amongst it's rocky terrain.
column3: An oft traded world, Wazan is nevertheless full of surprises with it's deep mines amongst it's rocky terrain.

column2: The Weatogue system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. Ignored during the Succession Wars, Weatogue is an perma-frost agricultural world known for it's Ice Cold Beer.
column3: The Weatogue system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. Ignored during the Succession Wars, Weatogue is an perma-frost agricultural world known for it's Ice Cold Beer.

column2: The Wedderborg system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War and survived the first two Succession Wars, until it was struck by famine during the Third and abandoned.
column3: The Wedderborg system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War and survived the first two Succession Wars, until it was struck by famine during the Third and abandoned.

column2: The Wedgefield system was settled during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra, and is known for it's pastures and cloth industries.
column3: The Wedgefield system was settled during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra, and is known for it's pastures and cloth industries.

column2: The Weekapaug system was settled during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the St. Ives Mercantile League prior to the formation of the Capellan Confederation in the mid-twenty-fourth century.
column3: The Weekapaug system was settled during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the St. Ives Mercantile League prior to the formation of the Capellan Confederation in the mid-twenty-fourth century.

column2: During the Fourth Succession War a repository of Star League chemical weaponry and nerve agents was discovered and unleashed on the population of this world, killing almost a billion citizens. Wei is still in recovery now.
column3: During the Fourth Succession War a repository of Star League chemical weaponry and nerve agents was discovered and unleashed on the population of this world, killing almost a billion citizens. Wei is still in recovery now.

column2: Weingarten is best known for its vast wine industry. The mild weather and long growing seasons make Weingarten ideal for growing crops, particularly grapes. Wine from the world is highly prized which leads to large profit margins for exporters.
column3: Weingarten is best known for its vast wine industry. The mild weather and long growing seasons make Weingarten ideal for growing crops, particularly grapes. Wine from the world is highly prized which leads to large profit margins for exporters.

column2: Weippe is best known for it's fine grain sands and glassblowing industries, which are unique to the planet.
column3: Weippe is best known for it's fine grain sands and glassblowing industries, which are unique to the planet.

column2: A binary star system, the fifth world is nicknamed \"Brimstone\" by the natives; it has a large satellite world called Fire. The temperature range at the polar capital of Port Erebus can vary over 70 degrees in one day.
column3: A binary star system, the fifth world is nicknamed "Brimstone" by the natives; it has a large satellite world called Fire. The temperature range at the polar capital of Port Erebus can vary over 70 degrees in one day.

column2: The Weistheimer system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the Reunification War, but has been abandoned and resettled numerous times over the centuries as mineral deposits are found and depleted.
column3: The Weistheimer system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the Reunification War, but has been abandoned and resettled numerous times over the centuries as mineral deposits are found and depleted.

column2: This grim and bleak ball of mud was only colonized for its central position in rimward Capellan space. The outpost was eventually abandoned in favor of refueling stations at the jump points, and the planet-side colony buildings sunk into the mud.
column3: This grim and bleak ball of mud was only colonized for its central position in rimward Capellan space. The outpost was eventually abandoned in favor of refueling stations at the jump points, and the planet-side colony buildings sunk into the mud.

column2: The Weiz system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the Reunification War. Weiz vanished from maps at some point after the end of the First Succession War after the atmosphere became too irradiated for the colonists.
column3: The Weiz system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the Reunification War. Weiz vanished from maps at some point after the end of the First Succession War after the atmosphere became too irradiated for the colonists.

column2: The Weldon system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and is home to a galaxy famous author who often writes about the heroic tales of MechWarriors.
column3: The Weldon system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and is home to a galaxy famous author who often writes about the heroic tales of MechWarriors.

column2: Weldry is a cold world with a thin atmosphere that's only breathable in the lowlands and valleys. The highlands are barren, windswept, uninhabited ice. The highest form of life is a vicious stinging insect that can form mile-wide swarms.
column3: Weldry is a cold world with a thin atmosphere that's only breathable in the lowlands and valleys. The highlands are barren, windswept, uninhabited ice. The highest form of life is a vicious stinging insect that can form mile-wide swarms.

column2: Weldry is a cold world with a thin atmosphere that's only breathable in the lowlands and valleys. The highlands are barren, windswept, uninhabited ice. The highest form of life is a vicious stinging insect that can form mile-wide swarms.

column2: The Werfer system was settled during or shortly before the Age of War by the Taurian Concordat, but was abandoned during the Third Succession War.
column3: The Werfer system was settled during or shortly before the Age of War by the Taurian Concordat, but was abandoned during the Third Succession War.

column2: Wernke is the third planet in the Wernke system and has a single inhabited and heavily-industrialized moon named Talon, which oft confuses stellar cartographers and map makers alike.
column3: Wernke is the third planet in the Wernke system and has a single inhabited and heavily-industrialized moon named Talon, which oft confuses stellar cartographers and map makers alike.

column2: Westerhand is the second planet in the system and has three moons named Delsia, Ralston and Vannora. Known for it's Star League era mech repair facilities, which are renown throughout the Sian Commonality.
column3: Westerhand is the second planet in the system and has three moons named Delsia, Ralston and Vannora. Known for it's Star League era mech repair facilities, which are renown throughout the Sian Commonality.

column2: The Westerstede system was settled during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the Protectorate of Donegal prior to the founding of the Lyran Commonwealth.
column3: The Westerstede system was settled during or shortly after the First Exodus from Terra and was a member of the Protectorate of Donegal prior to the founding of the Lyran Commonwealth.

column2: The Westfield system was settled during the Star League era but was devastated during the First Succession War, leaving the planet a molten uninhabitable ruin.
column3: The Westfield system was settled during the Star League era but was devastated during the First Succession War, leaving the planet a molten uninhabitable ruin.

column2: Westover is the fourth planet in the Westover system and has a single moon named Duban. Westover is been home to facilities belonging to numerous defense manufacturers, most notably Andurien AeroTech.
column3: Westover is the fourth planet in the Westover system and has a single moon named Duban. Westover is been home to facilities belonging to numerous defense manufacturers, most notably Andurien AeroTech.

column2: The Westphalia system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the Reunification War, and conquered by the Federated Suns during the Second Succession War. The system was later abandoned in the fighting of the Third Succession War.
column3: The Westphalia system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the Reunification War, and conquered by the Federated Suns during the Second Succession War. The system was later abandoned in the fighting of the Third Succession War.

column2: The Wetumpka system was settled before or during the Age of War and was a part of the Federated Suns by the end of the era. Wetumpka is known for it's massive rumbling waters from it's many rivers and waterfalls.
column3: The Wetumpka system was settled before or during the Age of War and was a part of the Federated Suns by the end of the era. Wetumpka is known for it's massive rumbling waters from it's many rivers and waterfalls.

column2: Named \"Wheel\" after the massive recharge station and habitat at its zenith jump point (featuring a wheel-shaped gravdeck around a needle-shaped core) that also serves as administrative center for the asteroid facilities in the system.
column3: Named "Wheel" after the massive recharge station and habitat at its zenith jump point (featuring a wheel-shaped gravdeck around a needle-shaped core) that also serves as administrative center for the asteroid facilities in the system.

column2: The Whittington system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. The planet is mostly barren, with small patches of fertile land surrounding the extensive volcanic activity.
column3: The Whittington system was settled during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. The planet is mostly barren, with small patches of fertile land surrounding the extensive volcanic activity.

column2: Wildwood is a lush and sparsely populated planet nearing the outer edge of the Magistracy of Canopus. In spite of a small population, Wildwood was the largest producer of wine and other agricultural products in the Magistracy.
column3: Wildwood is a lush and sparsely populated planet nearing the outer edge of the Magistracy of Canopus. In spite of a small population, Wildwood was the largest producer of wine and other agricultural products in the Magistracy.

column2: The Wilkes system was settled before or during the First Exodus from Terra, and has a thriving industrial base thanks to the thermal boreholes that descend deep into the planets mantle.
column3: The Wilkes system was settled before or during the First Exodus from Terra, and has a thriving industrial base thanks to the thermal boreholes that descend deep into the planets mantle.

column2: The Willowick system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra and became during the Age of War a member of the Federated Suns. It's large lakes and watersports are tourist hotspots for nearby worlds.
column3: The Willowick system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra and became during the Age of War a member of the Federated Suns. It's large lakes and watersports are tourist hotspots for nearby worlds.

column2: The Willunga system was originally a part of the Finmark Province by the Rim Worlds Republic, but joined the Lyran Commonwealth when the Star League fell.
column3: The Willunga system was originally a part of the Finmark Province by the Rim Worlds Republic, but joined the Lyran Commonwealth when the Star League fell.

column2: The Wiltshire system was settled by the Rim Worlds Republic during the Star League era, but fell into Lyran hands during the fall of the Star League.
column3: The Wiltshire system was settled by the Rim Worlds Republic during the Star League era, but fell into Lyran hands during the fall of the Star League.

column2: The Windhoek system was colonised prior to the Age of War, but was abandoned during the Third Succession War.
column3: The Windhoek system was colonised prior to the Age of War, but was abandoned during the Third Succession War.

column2: The Windsor system was colonised during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. Grand palaces and country seats dot the pristine landscape of Windsor, known for it's aristocratic nature.
column3: The Windsor system was colonised during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. Grand palaces and country seats dot the pristine landscape of Windsor, known for it's aristocratic nature.

column2: Winfield was originally named Treeline, but was gifted to the commander of the Stealths, Colonel Raymond Winfield, by Archon Elizabeth Steiner after their destruction in the conquest of Sakhalin in 2863 and renamed \"Winfield\" in his honour.
column3: Winfield was originally named Treeline, but was gifted to the commander of the Stealths, Colonel Raymond Winfield, by Archon Elizabeth Steiner after their destruction in the conquest of Sakhalin in 2863 and renamed "Winfield" in his honour.

column2: Wing was settled not for the world itself, but because its four moons have extensive amounts of titanium, bauxite, and germanium. The Capital of Crow's Nest is situated high in the mountains, providing Line of Sight to facilities on the moons.
column3: Wing was settled not for the world itself, but because its four moons have extensive amounts of titanium, bauxite, and germanium. The Capital of Crow's Nest is situated high in the mountains, providing Line of Sight to facilities on the moons.

column2: The Wingzar system was colonised during the Star League era, but was destroyed during the Second Succession War.
column3: The Wingzar system was colonised during the Star League era, but was destroyed during the Second Succession War.

column2: Little is Known about this system, only that it was under the control of the Escorpión Imperio in 3140
column3: Little is Known about this system, only that it was under the control of the Escorpión Imperio in 3140

column2: Once the site of a major Displass Technologies industrial hub, Winter was devastated during the Amaris Civil War. Many facilities were completely destroyed and now only a moderate industrial base remains.
column3: Once the site of a major Displass Technologies industrial hub, Winter was devastated during the Amaris Civil War. Many facilities were completely destroyed and now only a moderate industrial base remains.

column2: The Wisconsin system was colonized by the Free Worlds League during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and maintains strong links with neighbouring worlds.
column3: The Wisconsin system was colonized by the Free Worlds League during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War, and maintains strong links with neighbouring worlds.

column2: Ruled by the Council of Merchants, Wismar is an agricultural world that provides food sources for the trade hubs across the Hanseatic League. There are also rumours of a black market in narcotics thanks to the hallucinogenic plants native to Wismar.

column3: The Wittington system was annexed by the Draconis Combine during the Star League era, then conquered by the Federated Suns during the Second Succesion War before being eventually destroyed during the Third Succession War.

column2: The Wokha system was settled at some time during the Star League era, but the colony died out sometime during the First Succession War.
column3: The Wokha system was settled at some time during the Star League era, but the colony died out sometime during the First Succession War.

column2: The Wolcott system was colonised at some point during or prior to the Age of War, with the capital of Farmingbury being the muddy jewel of the entire system. The Succession Wars have succeeded in causing Wolcott to maintain a low profile.
column3: The Wolcott system was colonised at some point during or prior to the Age of War, with the capital of Farmingbury being the muddy jewel of the entire system. The Succession Wars have succeeded in causing Wolcott to maintain a low profile.

column2: Wolf Orbital 82 is an orbital fleet base stationed at the Zenith jump point of a G6IV type star. Dense asteroid fields hurtle around this system, causing major navigational hazards.
column3: Wolf Orbital 82 is an orbital fleet base stationed at the Zenith jump point of a G6IV type star. Dense asteroid fields hurtle around this system, causing major navigational hazards.

column2: The Wonju system was annexed by the Draconis Combine during the Star League era, but was destroyed in the fighting during the First Succesion War.
column3: The Wonju system was annexed by the Draconis Combine during the Star League era, but was destroyed in the fighting during the First Succesion War.

column2: The Woodbine system was colonized by the Federated Suns during the Age of War. A world known for it's vast planetwide forests and large mineral content, Woodbine's population is still hindered by the high gravity of their world.
column3: The Woodbine system was colonized by the Federated Suns during the Age of War. A world known for it's vast planetwide forests and large mineral content, Woodbine's population is still hindered by the high gravity of their world.

column2: The Woodstock system was colonized in the second half of the twenty-second century. During the Amaris Civil War, chemical weapons rendered an entire continent uninhabitable. Still uninhabitable today, it is used for research purposes.

column2: The Wotan system is home to numerous industries such as Krauss-Lieman Incorporated and Wotan Mining Systems, making it a key industrial location. It also houses the remains of Hevrol Aero Base, a Star League era facility.
column3: The Wotan system is home to numerous industries such as Krauss-Lieman Incorporated and Wotan Mining Systems, making it a key industrial location. It also houses the remains of Hevrol Aero Base, a Star League era facility.

column2: Wrentham is a minor industrial world that is notable only for the volcanic activity caused by its proximity to its gas giant primary. Tidal forces flex and stress the crust of the world, but the extreme ocean tides have led to flourishing sea life.
column3: Wrentham is a minor industrial world that is notable only for the volcanic activity caused by its proximity to its gas giant primary. Tidal forces flex and stress the crust of the world, but the extreme ocean tides have led to flourishing sea life.

column3: The Wrociaw system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra, and is known for it's heavy tank track production facilities.

column2: The Wroxeter system was colonized during or shortly before the Age of War, and is located near the Crucis March. Deep boreholes allow for mining petroleum and other fuels from deep within the mantle of the planet.

column2: Wyatt is a planet of deserts and strange rock formations, perfect for defensive purposes. Bowie Industries maintains manufacturing facilities on the planet, producing mech and dropship parts.

column2: The colony of Thamel was abandoned after several battles left the surface irradiated and uninhabitable. The Capellans have made several attempts to re-establish an outpost on the world, renaming it Wyeth's Glory after one of the MechWarriors killed in battle there.
column3: The colony of Thamel was abandoned after several battles left the surface irradiated and uninhabitable. The Capellans have made several attempts to re-establish an outpost on the world, renaming it Wyeth's Glory after one of the MechWarriors killed in battle there.

column2: This minor agricultural world once had an inhabited moon, but during the late Star League era, a terrorist attack sent an orbital fueling station crashing into the moon, rendering it uninhabitable.

column2: A icy planet with a large population, Xhosa is known for it's Aerospace Academy. The nearby Aerospace industry is however somewhat depressed by war.

column2: Xinyang is the capital world of the Xinyang Prefecture. If Xinyang had anything other than a large amount of fresh water, it could be an industrial powerhouse. Unfortunately the water is the only resource the planet really offers.

column2: Yorii was a major trading hub throughout most of the peacetime years, whilst maintaining a sizeable industrial complex too. Neo-Tokyo, the capital city, often has citizens of dual-nationalities within it's boundaries.
column3: Йорк – это крупный торговый хаб используемый на протяжении большей части мирного времени. Так же на планете имеется значительный промышленный комплекс. В столице Нео-Токио часто проживают люди с двойным гражданством.

column2: York is a large and warm planet with relatively intense tectonic activity. The planet had large mountain ranges with several volcanoes reaching the stratosphere. Most of the planet's population was concentrated near the shorelines.

column3: Zangul is a cold water-world with chains of rocky islands and sprawling archipelagos. Most of the population lives on a single island, which is entirely covered with the slowly-decaying hulk of the original Capellan spaceport.

column2: Though Zaniah has some light commercial industry and is known for its exported civilian vehicles, it is best known for the Mechwarrior sanctuary named St. Marinus House, which is located deep in one of its deserts.

column2: The Zaprudy system was colonized by the Lyran Commonwealth during the Star League era at some point after the end of the Reunification War. Known for it's massive tar and mudflats, many scavengers often comb them for Lostech or other remains.

column2: The planet is noted for its rich mineral deposits and slight heavy gravity. Massive water processing plants dominate the landscape, to support cities and their agricultural settlements on the planet due to the toxic taint in the water.

column2: Zathras was a Magistracy system that broke away and declared its independence. The new state styles itself an 'Empire', and has made aggressive moves towards the newly-independent Aquagea.

column2: Settled in the early years of the Star League, Zdice is known for it's prestigious universities. Beautiful rings encircle the planet, providing a boost to tourism.
column3: Settled in the early years of the Star League, Zdice is known for it's prestigious universities. Beautiful rings encircle the planet, providing a boost to tourism.

column2: Deposits of silicon and precious gemstones ensure Zebebelgenubi has a bright future as a major manufacturer and research complex. Rumours abound of Lostech caches hidden in the mountains, but few have been found.
column3: Deposits of silicon and precious gemstones ensure Zebebelgenubi has a bright future as a major manufacturer and research complex. Rumours abound of Lostech caches hidden in the mountains, but few have been found.

column2: The mountainous icy terrain of Zebenescamali houses billions of citizens, who enjoy the security offered by the wealth from the mining resources of the planet.  The low gravity also makes winter sports particularly favourable for tourism.
column3: The mountainous icy terrain of Zebenescamali houses billions of citizens, who enjoy the security offered by the wealth from the mining resources of the planet. The low gravity also makes winter sports particularly favourable for tourism.

column2: The Zebrenaski system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.
column3: The Zebrenaski system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.

column2: The Zebuluraskai system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Second Succession War.
column3: The Zebuluraskai system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Second Succession War.

column2: The Zelmag system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned shortly thereafter due to plague.
column3: The Zelmag system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned shortly thereafter due to plague.

column2: The Zelmag system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.
column3: The Zelmag system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.

column2: The Zelski system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.

column2: The Zempoatlepetl system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.
column3: The Zempoatlepetl system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.

column2: The Zertarum system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.
column3: The Zertarum system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.

column2: The Zetang system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.
column3: The Zetang system was colonised in the Star League era, but abandoned during the Third Succession War.

column2: Colonised during the Star League, Zhongshan hosted a Star League Defense Force garrison for many years. Treasure hunters often search the highlands in search of rumours of hidden caches.
column3: Colonised during the Star League, Zhongshan hosted a Star League Defense Force garrison for many years. Treasure hunters often search the highlands in search of rumours of hidden caches.

column2: A harsh Capellan world, Ziliang had two industries: Mining and prisons. The mining facilities were run by prisoners, who often died in the dangerous environment. After the Federated Suns took over, labour was a much more hospitable affair.
column3: A harsh Capellan world, Ziliang had two industries: Mining and prisons. The mining facilities were run by prisoners, who often died in the dangerous environment. After the Federated Suns took over, labour was a much more hospitable affair.

column2: Zinal was founded during the Star League era, but cataclysmic earthquakes destroyed the colony and swallowed it whole. It has been abandoned since.
column3: Zinal was founded during the Star League era, but cataclysmic earthquakes destroyed the colony and swallowed it whole. It has been abandoned since.

column2: Zindao was destroyed during the Second Succession War, and is home to very few settlers ekeing out a miserable existence.
column3: Zindao was destroyed during the Second Succession War, and is home to very few settlers ekeing out a miserable existence.

column2: An oft fought over border world, Zion is known for it's arid climates and Star League ruins.
column3: An oft fought over border world, Zion is known for it's arid climates and Star League ruins.

column2: The Zlatousi system joined the Outworlds Alliance at some point during the Age of War. It's volcanic past provides extremely fertile soils for agricultural needs.
column3: The Zlatousi system joined the Outworlds Alliance at some point during the Age of War. It's volcanic past provides extremely fertile soils for agricultural needs.

column2: Colonised at some point after the Reunification Era, Zoetermeer II is the second planet in the Zolfo system and has a single moon named Zegwaard.
column3: Colonised at some point after the Reunification Era, Zoetermeer II is the second planet in the Zolfo system and has a single moon named Zegwaard.

column2: Originally a dry dusty world barely able to feed itself, recent discoveries by BP Interstellar of massive deposits of petroleum, coal and other minerals have reinvigorated investment in the entire planet.
column3: Originally a dry dusty world barely able to feed itself, recent discoveries by BP Interstellar of massive deposits of petroleum, coal and other minerals have reinvigorated investment in the entire planet.

column2: Zollikofen is the first planet of eleven in the Zollikofen system. The surface of Zollikofen is home to at least one industrial manufacturer, Acme Widgets, and a host of mining concerns.
column3: Zollikofen is the first planet of eleven in the Zollikofen system. The surface of Zollikofen is home to at least one industrial manufacturer, Acme Widgets, and a host of mining concerns.

column2: The Zorn's Keep system was settled during the Succession Wars and became significant enough for Inner Sphere nations to record its position. It is unremarkable, except for a small mining presence.
column3: The Zorn's Keep system was settled during the Succession Wars and became significant enough for Inner Sphere nations to record its position. It is unremarkable, except for a small mining presence.

column2: The Zortman system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra, and subsequently joined the Free Worlds League. The Center for Technology Research is renown across many systems.
column3: The Zortman system was settled during the First Exodus from Terra, and subsequently joined the Free Worlds League. The Center for Technology Research is renown across many systems.

column2: Zosma is a rocky, arid world with a thin atmosphere; subject to brutal levels of year-round heat from the system primary star and possessing nutrient poor soil, there are few species of native flora on the planet.
column3: Zosma is a rocky, arid world with a thin atmosphere; subject to brutal levels of year-round heat from the system primary star and possessing nutrient poor soil, there are few species of native flora on the planet.

column2: Zuhbehr was devastated during the Third Succession War and abandoned shortly thereafter.
column3: Zuhbehr was devastated during the Third Succession War and abandoned shortly thereafter.

column2: Zumbo was devastated during the Third Succession War and abandoned shortly thereafter.
column3: Zumbo was devastated during the Third Succession War and abandoned shortly thereafter.

column2: Zurich was one of Maximilian Liao's favorite worlds, receiving favourable trade agreements and tax breaks. Though it lacks economic resources and position, the presence of Star League era BattleMechs increased the tourist trade to the world.
column3: Zurich was one of Maximilian Liao's favorite worlds, receiving favourable trade agreements and tax breaks. Though it lacks economic resources and position, the presence of Star League era BattleMechs increased the tourist trade to the world.

column2: The Zvolen system was settled at some point before the mid-twenty-fourth century and joined the Lyran Commonwealth during the Age of War. During the final years of the Star League, Zvolen was the site of a Star League Defense Force garrison.
column3: The Zvolen system was settled at some point before the mid-twenty-fourth century and joined the Lyran Commonwealth during the Age of War. During the final years of the Star League, Zvolen was the site of a Star League Defense Force garrison.

column2: Fighting on Zwenkau was part of the initial skirmishes that resulted in the commencement of the Second Succession War. It's factories still produce a substantial amount of armaments.
column3: Fighting on Zwenkau was part of the initial skirmishes that resulted in the commencement of the Second Succession War. It's factories still produce a substantial amount of armaments.

column2: Settled during the Star League, the fourth planet in the Zwipadze system is known for it's pharmaceutical and narcotics trade.
column3: Settled during the Star League, the fourth planet in the Zwipadze system is known for it's pharmaceutical and narcotics trade.
